original: gzhal bya nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhal bya nyid bzhin no //
translated: Like the object of comprehension itself.

original: gnyis ka la brten pa yang 'di lta bu ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis ka la brten pa yang 'di lta bu ma yin no //
translated: Also, it is not like the case of the two supports.

original: de'i phyir 'di rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs so zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this is the reason for the exclusion.

original: de'i phyir 'di kho na la gcig smos ba'i bya'o zhes gnas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di kho na la gcig smos ba'i bya'o zhes gnas so //
translated: Therefore, it is appropriate to mention only this one.üîΩNow, in order to demonstrate that it is not correct to say that the negative concord of the negation of the hypothetical is not dependent on the negation of the hypothetical, he says, ‚ÄúThe negative concord of the negation of the hypothetical is not dependent on the negation of the hypothetical,‚Äù and so on.

original: da ni gang brtag pa bkag pa la mi ltos par ma yin par dgag pa'i 'jug pas zhes pa la sogs ba smras pa de mi rigs pa nyid du bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /üîΩma yin pa dgag pa yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni gang brtag pa bkag pa la mi ltos par ma yin par dgag pa'i 'jug pas zhes pa la sogs ba smras pa de mi rigs pa nyid du bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa / ma yin pa dgag pa yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: In order to demonstrate that this is incorrect, he says, ‚ÄúThe negative concord of the negation of the hypothetical is not dependent on the negation of the hypothetical,‚Äù and so on.üîΩSince the negation of the non-difference of the object is the expression of the difference of the object, the negative concord is applied. If it is not dependent on the negation, then how could the negative concord of the negation of the hypothetical be a little bit of the negation of the non-difference?

original: don gzhan ma yin bar dgag bas don gzhan mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro yin par dgag pa sbyor te dgag pa la mi ltos na ni ma yin par dgag pa ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: don gzhan ma yin bar dgag bas don gzhan mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro yin par dgag pa sbyor te dgag pa la mi ltos na ni ma yin par dgag pa ma yin pa ni /
translated: Otherwise, if the negation of the hypothetical is not dependent on the negation, then how could the negative concord of the negation of the hypothetical be a little bit of the negation of the non-difference?

original: ma yin bar dgag ba cung zad du ji ltar 'gyur /üîΩgzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma yin bar dgag ba cung zad du ji ltar 'gyur / gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If the negation of the hypothetical is not dependent on the negation, then how could the negative concord of the negation of the hypothetical be a little bit of the negation of the non-difference?üîΩIf the negation of the hypothetical is not dependent on the negation, then how could the negative concord of the negation of the hypothetical be a little bit of the negation of the non-difference?üîΩIf the negation of the hypothetical is not dependent on the negation, then how could the negative concord of the negation of the hypothetical be a little bit of the negation of the non-difference?üîΩIf the negation of the hypothetical is not dependent on the negation, then how could the negative concord of the negation of the hypothetical be a little bit of the negation of the non-difference?üîΩIf the negation of the hypothetical is not dependent on the negation, then how could the negative concord of the negation of the hypothetical be a little bit of the negation of the non-difference?

original: gal te rtag pa dgag bar byed pas mi rtag pa brjod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te rtag pa dgag bar byed pas mi rtag pa brjod pa ma yin na /
translated: If the negation of the hypothetical is not dependent on the negation, then how could the negative concord of the negation of the hypothetical be a little bit of the negation of the non-difference?

original: rang gi tshig gis brjod par bya ba kho nar 'gyur ro zhes pa /
analyzed: rang gi tshig gis brjod par bya ba kho nar 'gyur ro zhes pa /
translated: It would be only something that is expressed by its own words.

original: rang gi tshig ni bdag gi ba'i brjod pa bum pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i khyad bar gyi sgra'o //
analyzed: rang gi tshig ni bdag gi ba'i brjod pa bum pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i khyad bar gyi sgra'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIts own words‚Äù are the words that are the expressions of ‚Äúmine,‚Äù such as ‚Äúpot.‚Äù

original: de kho nas bum pa la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de kho nas bum pa la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Only that expresses a pot and so on.

original: mi rtag pa zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa dgag sgra'i nye bar bsgyur ba can gyi sgra yis ni dgag par bya ba med na /
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa dgag sgra'i nye bar bsgyur ba can gyi sgra yis ni dgag par bya ba med na /
translated: In the case of ‚Äúimpermanent,‚Äù and so on, the words that have a negative prefix do not express a negation if the object of negation does not exist.

original: dgag sgra dgag pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi spyor pa 'thad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dgag sgra dgag pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi spyor pa 'thad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not tenable that the compound has the reason of a negative word.

original: gal te 'di la yang dgag pa la ltos na 'o na ma yin dgag ni med dgag las khyad bar ci yod ce na /
analyzed: gal te 'di la yang dgag pa la ltos na 'o na ma yin dgag ni med dgag las khyad bar ci yod ce na /
translated: If it depends on a negation in this case as well, then what is the difference between an implicative negation and a nonimplicative negation?

original: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù and so on.

original: rtag pa dgag pa la zhes pa rtag pa bkag pas nye bar mtshon ba'i bum pa la sogs pa'i @182b don la bsgrub par bya bzhin pa'i bya ba brjod bar 'dod ba ni mi rtag bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rtag pa dgag pa la zhes pa rtag pa bkag pas nye bar mtshon ba'i bum pa la sogs pa'i @182b don la bsgrub par bya bzhin pa'i bya ba brjod bar 'dod ba ni mi rtag bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúpot‚Äù and so on, which is illustrated by the negation of permanence, is expressed as the action of being established while the negation of permanence is being expressed.

original: ma yin par dgag ba la dgag sgra ni bya ba dang 'brel pa med pa kho na ste /
analyzed: ma yin par dgag ba la dgag sgra ni bya ba dang 'brel pa med pa kho na ste /
translated: In the case of a nonimplicative negation, the negative term is not related to an action.

original: de'i phyir de la bya ba dgag pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir de la bya ba dgag pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that an action is negated in that context.

original: 'o na ci zhe na bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: What is it then? It is affirmed.

original: rtogs pa can kho na ni dgag sgra dang 'brel zhing /
analyzed: rtogs pa can kho na ni dgag sgra dang 'brel zhing /
translated: Only the understood is related to the negative term.

original: rtogs pa can gyi don yang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dgag par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa can gyi don yang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dgag par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the meaning of the understood is the perfected nature, so it is not tenable to negate it.

original: de las bzlog pa rtogs par byed pa'i don can kho nar bsdu ba shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa rtogs par byed pa'i don can kho nar bsdu ba shes par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that the meaning of the negative term is only to bring about the understanding of the opposite of that.

original: de'i phyir yang de las bzlog pa'i dngos po nges par gnas pa kho na la /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang de las bzlog pa'i dngos po nges par gnas pa kho na la /
translated: Therefore, the opposite of that, the thing that definitely abides,

original: bya ba rnam bar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: bya ba rnam bar shes par bya ste /
translated: is to be understood as the action.

original: mi rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: It is impermanent.

original: med pa dgag pa la ni ti nga'i mtha' kho na dang dgag sgra 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: med pa dgag pa la ni ti nga'i mtha' kho na dang dgag sgra 'brel pa ste /
translated: In the case of an implicative negation, the negative term is related only to the suffix ti and the negative term.

original: rtag par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa /
analyzed: rtag par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa /
translated: It is not permanent.

original: bya ba dang 'brel pa kho nar dgag sgra brjod par 'dod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bya ba dang 'brel pa kho nar dgag sgra brjod par 'dod par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is only the negative term that is asserted to be related to an action.

original: de dper brjod kyis ston to //
analyzed: de dper brjod kyis ston to //
translated: An example of that is shown.

original: sgra ni rtag par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgra ni rtag par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Sound is not permanent,

original: reg par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes so //
analyzed: reg par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes so //
translated: because it is touchable.

original: ci'i phyir 'dir med par dgag pa yin zhing /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'dir med par dgag pa yin zhing /
translated: Why is it a non-affirming negation here?

original: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'dir ni ma yin par dgag pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'dir ni ma yin par dgag pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it an affirming negation here, in ‚ÄúSound is impermanent because of being produced‚Äù?

original: 'dir ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said,

original: gang gi phyir sbyor ba 'dir the tshom la ltos ba'i dgag pa ste /üîΩci reg bya ma yin pa nyid las rtag pa 'grub pa yod dam med ces the tshom du gyur pa na brjod pa reg bya ma yin pa las rtag par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa la rtag pa byed pa bo ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sbyor ba 'dir the tshom la ltos ba'i dgag pa ste / ci reg bya ma yin pa nyid las rtag pa 'grub pa yod dam med ces the tshom du gyur pa na brjod pa reg bya ma yin pa las rtag par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa la rtag pa byed pa bo ste /
translated: ‚ÄúHere, because of the doubt in this syllogism, it is a negation that depends on doubt.

original: 'gyur ro kho na dgag tshig dang mngon par 'brel par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ro kho na dgag tshig dang mngon par 'brel par bya'o //
translated: When there is doubt, ‚ÄòIs permanence established from being intangible or not?‚Äô, the expression, ‚ÄòIt does not become permanent from being intangible‚Äô, is to be connected with the negative particle ‚Äònot‚Äô.

original: snga ma ni bzlog pa la ltos pa zhes pa sgra mi rtag ste byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'dir ni bzlog pa la ltos pas te /
analyzed: snga ma ni bzlog pa la ltos pa zhes pa sgra mi rtag ste byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'dir ni bzlog pa la ltos pas te /
translated: The former is called ‚Äòdepending on the opposite‚Äô. In ‚ÄòSound is impermanent because of being produced‚Äô, it is a negation that depends on the opposite.

original: nges pa la ltos pa'o zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: nges pa la ltos pa'o zhes pa'i don te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúin reliance on a negation‚Äù is this:

original: byas pa nyid kyis sgra 'jig pa nyid du nges par byas nas rtag pa nyid bkag pas pha rol po rnams la mi rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyis sgra 'jig pa nyid du nges par byas nas rtag pa nyid bkag pas pha rol po rnams la mi rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Having ascertained that sound is impermanent by virtue of being produced, one refutes its permanence, and thus one proves to the opponent that sound is impermanent.

original: gang gi tshe 'o na zhes smras te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'o na zhes smras te /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIn that case,

original: ma yin par dgag par bya ba yod na ma yin par dgag par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: ma yin par dgag par bya ba yod na ma yin par dgag par 'gyur mod /
translated: a nonimplicative negation would be a nonimplicative negation only if there were something to be negated.

original: gang gi tshe rtag pa'i dngos po nyid khas mi len pa de'i tshe ci ltar ma yin par dgag pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rtag pa'i dngos po nyid khas mi len pa de'i tshe ci ltar ma yin par dgag pa yin zhe na /
translated: But when one does not accept the existence of permanent things, how could there be a nonimplicative negation?‚Äù

original: de'i tshe gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: The response to that is, ‚ÄúBecause of the imputation by others.‚Äù

original: gzhan rnams kyis gang gi phyir rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams yongs su brtag pa de'i @183a * //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyis gang gi phyir rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams yongs su brtag pa de'i @183a * //
translated: Because others impute permanent things such as space,

original: phyir de bkag pas sgra mi rtag pa'o zhes sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: phyir de bkag pas sgra mi rtag pa'o zhes sgrub par byed de /
translated: the refutation of those imputations proves that sound is impermanent.

original: ji ltar gzhan rnams kyis yongs su brtags pa'i nam mkha' la sogs pa de ltar sgra 'di mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan rnams kyis yongs su brtags pa'i nam mkha' la sogs pa de ltar sgra 'di mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that this sound is not like the space, etc., that others imagine.

original: de'i dus su yod pa bzhin du zhes pa /
analyzed: de'i dus su yod pa bzhin du zhes pa /
translated: As for ‚Äúexisting as at the time,‚Äù

original: ji ltar nye bar dmigs pa'i dus na yod par gyur pa de ltar de las sngar dang phyis kyang ngo zhes pha rol po rnams kyis rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: ji ltar nye bar dmigs pa'i dus na yod par gyur pa de ltar de las sngar dang phyis kyang ngo zhes pha rol po rnams kyis rtogs par bya ste /
translated: it should be understood that others think that just as it exists at the time of perception, so it existed before and will exist after.

original: de bas na gang de shin tu gnas par yongs su rtogs pa de'i blo la sgro btags pa ma yin par dgag pas shin tu yod pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid can mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o zhes pas skyon med do //
analyzed: de bas na gang de shin tu gnas par yongs su rtogs pa de'i blo la sgro btags pa ma yin par dgag pas shin tu yod pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid can mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o zhes pas skyon med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault in saying that the impermanence of sound, which is characterized by nonexistence, should be established by a negation that is not superimposed on the cognition of one who understands that sound is a very stable phenomenon.

original: sngar lhag ma rnam gsum ltos pa yis zhes bshad pa de la byas pa nyid dang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid dag yang dgag pa'i shes pa la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid du bshad la /
analyzed: sngar lhag ma rnam gsum ltos pa yis zhes bshad pa de la byas pa nyid dang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid dag yang dgag pa'i shes pa la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid du bshad la /
translated: As for the explanation above, ‚ÄúThe remainder of the three is seen in dependence,‚Äù the state of being a product and the state of arising immediately after effort were explained as the cause of cognition, etc.

original: gnyis ka la brten pa lhag ma rnams ni gtan tshigs kyi 'khor lor the tshom gyi rgyu rnams kho nar bshad de /
analyzed: gnyis ka la brten pa lhag ma rnams ni gtan tshigs kyi 'khor lor the tshom gyi rgyu rnams kho nar bshad de /
translated: The remaining ones that depend on both are explained only as causes of doubt in the wheel of reasoning.

original: gzhan ni nges par ma byas pa'i tshig las so //
analyzed: gzhan ni nges par ma byas pa'i tshig las so //
translated: The others are not ascertained, because of the words.

original: de'i phyir de la ci ltar rnam pa gsum yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de la ci ltar rnam pa gsum yin te /
translated: Therefore, how can there be three kinds?

original: gang yang rung ba'i rnam pa nyid bstan pa na yang /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i rnam pa nyid bstan pa na yang /
translated: Even when one kind is taught,

original: lhag ma'i yang rtogs par bya ba'o zhes sems pas smras pa /
analyzed: lhag ma'i yang rtogs par bya ba'o zhes sems pas smras pa /
translated: the other two are also understood.üîΩThus, it is said:

original: gal te thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: If all are taught,

original: 'di yang zhes pas snga ma dag dang 'di mtshungs pa nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes pas snga ma dag dang 'di mtshungs pa nyid du gsungs so //
translated: then this is also said to be the same as the previous ones.

original: gang la ltos pas zhes pa /
analyzed: gang la ltos pas zhes pa /
translated: In dependence on which?

original: gang la 'jug pa nam mkha' dang las la sogs pa de la ltos pa kho nas the tshom gyi rgyu ste /
analyzed: gang la 'jug pa nam mkha' dang las la sogs pa de la ltos pa kho nas the tshom gyi rgyu ste /
translated: In dependence on just that which is engaged, such as space and karma, it is a cause of doubt.

original: de las gzhan pa las rnam par gcod do zhes pa /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa las rnam par gcod do zhes pa /
translated: From that, it is distinguished from the other.

original: bum pa dang rdul phra rab la sogs pa gzugs can gyi dngos po rnams las te /
analyzed: bum pa dang rdul phra rab la sogs pa gzugs can gyi dngos po rnams las te /
translated: From things that have form, such as pots and atoms,

original: de las log pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de las log pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the opposite of that.

original: ci ltar rnam par byed pa shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar rnam par byed pa shes par bya zhe na /
translated: How is it to be known that it is a differentiator?

original: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú Thus, etc.‚Äù

original: gnyis ka la 'jug pa nyid na yang zhes pa /
analyzed: gnyis ka la 'jug pa nyid na yang zhes pa /
translated: ‚Äú Even though it is engaged in both‚Äù means

original: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la 'jug pa nyid na yang ngo //
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la 'jug pa nyid na yang ngo //
translated: even though it is engaged in both the permanent and the impermanent.

original: de'i phyir 'di gzugs can rnams las chos gzhan bsgrub par bya ba nyid na ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di gzugs can rnams las chos gzhan bsgrub par bya ba nyid na ste /
translated: Therefore, it is a differentiator when it is established as a property of the subject that is different from the physical,

original: bya ba med pa la sogs pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba nyid na rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bya ba med pa la sogs pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba nyid na rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: i.e., when it is established as a property of the subject that is devoid of activity, etc.

original: sgra bya ba med ba'am bya ba dang bcas pa zhes sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: sgra bya ba med ba'am bya ba dang bcas pa zhes sgrub par byed do //
translated: One establishes that sound is devoid of activity or that it is endowed with activity.

original: de la bya ba med pa nyid la yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: de la bya ba med pa nyid la yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs te /
translated: In that regard, it is a correct reason for the property of the subject that it is devoid of activity.

original: bya ba dang bcas pa nyid la log pa'i shes pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: bya ba dang bcas pa nyid la log pa'i shes pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: It is a cause of erroneous cognition when it is endowed with activity,

original: bya ba @183b dang bcas pa thams cad las ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba @183b dang bcas pa thams cad las ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the opposite of all that is endowed with activity.

original: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa la ni rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa la ni rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: It is not a differentiator when it establishes the permanent and the impermanent.

original: cis she na /
analyzed: cis she na /
translated: What is the reason?

original: thams cad las mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad las mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not turn away from all.

original: mi rtag pa'i phyogs sam rtag pa'i phyogs thams cad las mi ldog pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyogs sam rtag pa'i phyogs thams cad las mi ldog pa'i phyir te /
translated: It does not turn away from all the positions of impermanence or permanence.

original: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa na'o //üîΩde 'dra ba dang med na mi 'byung ba'i chos nye bar ston pa gtan tshigs so zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa na'o // de 'dra ba dang med na mi 'byung ba'i chos nye bar ston pa gtan tshigs so zhes pa ni /
translated: When proving permanence and impermanence, respectively.üîΩThe reason is the teaching of a phenomenon that is similar to and invariably concomitant with.

original: don gang sgra mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba de 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: don gang sgra mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba de 'dra ba ste /
translated: The object to be established is impermanence, etc. That is similar to it.

original: de'i rigs can med na don gang zhig 'gar yang 'byung ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rigs can med na don gang zhig 'gar yang 'byung ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: If it does not exist, the object never occurs.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid lta bu dang du ba ni me lta bu'o zhes pa de ni de 'dra ba med na mi 'byung ba'i chos can te /
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid lta bu dang du ba ni me lta bu'o zhes pa de ni de 'dra ba med na mi 'byung ba'i chos can te /
translated: For example, impermanence arises from effort, and smoke arises from fire. That is a phenomenon that is invariably concomitant with it.

original: de nye bar ston pa ni 'dis nye bar bstan par bya'o zhes pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: de nye bar ston pa ni 'dis nye bar bstan par bya'o zhes pa'i tshig go //
translated: The teaching of that is the statement, ‚ÄúThis teaches it.‚Äù

original: dper na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa ste de ni gtan tshigs so//
analyzed: dper na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa ste de ni gtan tshigs so//
translated: For example, ‚Äúbecause it arises immediately upon being sought,‚Äù and so on. That is the reason.

original: gang gis nye bar ston pa ma yin pa de ni gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gis nye bar ston pa ma yin pa de ni gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: That which does not teach is not a reason.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ste mig gis gzung bya nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ste mig gis gzung bya nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent because of being perceptible by the eye,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dir ngag gis nges par gzung ba'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir ngag gis nges par gzung ba'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Here, because it has the result of being ascertained by speech.

original: nges par gzung ba kho na re zhig rnam par dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba kho na re zhig rnam par dpyad par bya'o //
translated: Ascertainment itself should be analyzed first.

original: 'di la nges par gzung ba rnam pa gsum srid de /
analyzed: 'di la nges par gzung ba rnam pa gsum srid de /
translated: Here, ascertainment is possible in three ways:

original: de 'dra med na mi 'byung ba kho na dang / de 'dra med pa kho nar mi 'byung ba dang / de 'dra ba kho na med na mi 'byung ba zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dra med na mi 'byung ba kho na dang / de 'dra med pa kho nar mi 'byung ba dang / de 'dra ba kho na med na mi 'byung ba zhes pa'o //
translated: only not arising without that, only not arising without that, and only not arising without that.

original: thams cad la yang skyon te /
analyzed: thams cad la yang skyon te /
translated: There is a fault in all of them.

original: de la re zhig nges par gzung ba snga ma'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la re zhig nges par gzung ba snga ma'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: First, with respect to the first ascertainment, it is said:

original: gal te de 'dra med na ni //
analyzed: gal te de 'dra med na ni //
translated: If it does not exist in that way,

original: med nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: med nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNonexistence‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dir 'gal ba dang thun mong ba'i ma nges pa tsam rnam par gcod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir 'gal ba dang thun mong ba'i ma nges pa tsam rnam par gcod pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, in order to eliminate mere non-ascertainment that is common to contradictions,

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir sgra rtag go zhes pa 'di yang gtan tshigs su 'thob bo //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir sgra rtag go zhes pa 'di yang gtan tshigs su 'thob bo //
translated: ‚ÄúSound is permanent because it is audible‚Äù is also established as a logical reason.üîΩBecause it is only the case that such permanence does not occur without audibility.

original: gang gi phyir de 'dra ba'i rtag pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba kho na'o zhes ha cang khyab pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de 'dra ba'i rtag pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba kho na'o zhes ha cang khyab pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Thus, the characteristic of over-pervasion.

original: 'o na rtag pa nyid med pa la mnyan par bya ba nyid 'gyur ba kho na ma yin na /
analyzed: 'o na rtag pa nyid med pa la mnyan par bya ba nyid 'gyur ba kho na ma yin na /
translated: Well, if audibility does not occur without permanence,

original: de ltar mi rtag pa kho na mnyan par ba ba nyid du 'thad kyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhes pa 'di bsgrubs zin pas so //
analyzed: de ltar mi rtag pa kho na mnyan par ba ba nyid du 'thad kyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhes pa 'di bsgrubs zin pas so //
translated: then it is established that only impermanence is tenable as audibility, not the other.

original: 'di ci ltar skyon du thal bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ci ltar skyon du thal bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does this lead to the fault?

original: 'di bsam par bya ste /üîΩ@184a * // med pa kho nar zhes pa 'di la ni /
analyzed: 'di bsam par bya ste / @184a * // med pa kho nar zhes pa 'di la ni /
translated: This should be considered.üîΩRegarding ‚Äúonly nonexistence,‚Äù

original: gang de 'dra med pa kho nar mi 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: gang de 'dra med pa kho nar mi 'byung ba ste /
translated: that which does not occur only as nonexistent is

original: ltan cig kyang ni ma yin pa de gtan tshigs zhes pas mnyan par bya ba nyid la thal bar 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: ltan cig kyang ni ma yin pa de gtan tshigs zhes pas mnyan par bya ba nyid la thal bar 'gyur ba med do //
translated: The consequence that it is to be heard does not follow.

original: de ltar ni de 'ba' zhig pa med na mi 'byung ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni de 'ba' zhig pa med na mi 'byung ba ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that it does not occur when that alone does not exist.

original: 'o na ci zhe na lhan cig pa yang ngo //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na lhan cig pa yang ngo //
translated: What is it then? It is also concomitant.

original: 'on kyang mthun phyogs la khyab pa gang yin pa byas pa la sogs pa kho na gtan tshigs 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'on kyang mthun phyogs la khyab pa gang yin pa byas pa la sogs pa kho na gtan tshigs 'gyur gyi /
translated: However, the pervasion of the similar class is that which is produced, etc. is the reason,

original: mthun phyogs la ma khyab pa brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mthun phyogs la ma khyab pa brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but that which is not pervaded by the similar class, such as arising immediately after effort, is not.

original: de ltar ni de 'dra med pa kho nar mi 'byung ba zhes pa'i nges par gzung ba 'di las /
analyzed: de ltar ni de 'dra med pa kho nar mi 'byung ba zhes pa'i nges par gzung ba 'di las /
translated: This is because this restriction is stated: ‚ÄúIt does not occur when that is not present.‚Äù

original: ji ltar mnyan par bya ba nyid mtshan nyid kyis yul du ma byas te /
analyzed: ji ltar mnyan par bya ba nyid mtshan nyid kyis yul du ma byas te /
translated: Just as being an object of hearing is not made by the definition,

original: lhan cig kyang mi 'byung ba'o zhes byas nas yin pa de ltar rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyang ste /
analyzed: lhan cig kyang mi 'byung ba'o zhes byas nas yin pa de ltar rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyang ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not concomitant and does not occur when that is not present,‚Äù so too is arising immediately after effort.

original: gang gi phyir de yang mnyan par bya ba bzhin du de 'dra bas lhan cig kyang mi 'byung ba ste glog la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de yang mnyan par bya ba bzhin du de 'dra bas lhan cig kyang mi 'byung ba ste glog la sogs pa la'o //
translated: Because that is not co-present with that, like something to be heard, in the case of lightning, etc.

original: de las kyang don gyi lhan cig 'byung ba byas pa la sogs pa 'ba' zhig kho na gtan tshigs su 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de las kyang don gyi lhan cig 'byung ba byas pa la sogs pa 'ba' zhig kho na gtan tshigs su 'gyur gyi /
translated: And from that, only the co-present object of the effect, etc. would be the logical reason.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: But not the mere arising immediately after exertion,

original: de mi rtag ba dang lhan cig 'byung ba kho na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de mi rtag ba dang lhan cig 'byung ba kho na ni ma yin no //
translated: because that is not only co-present with impermanence.

original: de ston te /
analyzed: de ston te /
translated: That is taught.

original: de mi rtag pa nyid dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de mi rtag pa nyid dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúthat impermanence‚Äù and so on.

original: 'ga' zhig gis smras pa /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis smras pa /
translated: Someone says:

original: med pa kho nar mi 'byung ba zhes brjod pa na don gyis lhan cig kho nar gang 'gyur ba de gtan tshigs so zhes brjod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: med pa kho nar mi 'byung ba zhes brjod pa na don gyis lhan cig kho nar gang 'gyur ba de gtan tshigs so zhes brjod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: When it is said that ‚Äúit does not occur without,‚Äù it is said that the logical reason is that which occurs only co-present with the object.

original: gang lhan cig 'gyur ba kho na zhes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang lhan cig 'gyur ba kho na zhes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that which occurs only co-present.

original: de'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
translated: Therefore there is no fault.

original: de mi rigs te /
analyzed: de mi rigs te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: gal te nges par gzung ba 'di la don gyis lhan cig kho nar gang 'gyur ba de gtan tshigs so zhes rtog na nges par gzung ba don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te nges par gzung ba 'di la don gyis lhan cig kho nar gang 'gyur ba de gtan tshigs so zhes rtog na nges par gzung ba don med par 'gyur te /
translated: If you think that the reason is just what is definitely ascertained in this, then the definite ascription would be pointless.

original: gal te lhan cig kyang mi 'byung pa gtan tshigs su 'gyur na nges par gzung ba'i 'bras gzhan ci zhig ces pa 'di brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te lhan cig kyang mi 'byung pa gtan tshigs su 'gyur na nges par gzung ba'i 'bras gzhan ci zhig ces pa 'di brjod par bya'o //
translated: If non-occurrence even in simultaneity were the reason, then this would have to be stated: ‚ÄúWhat is the other effect of the definite ascription?‚Äù

original: de ltar nges par gzung ba gnyis pa la ma khyab pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar nges par gzung ba gnyis pa la ma khyab pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Thus, the second definite ascription has the characteristic of non-pervasion.

original: nges par gzung ba gsum pa la ni mtshan nyid mi srid par ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: nges par gzung ba gsum pa la ni mtshan nyid mi srid par ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: With regard to the third definite ascription, it is said that the characteristic is impossible:

original: de 'dra kho zhes pa la ste /
analyzed: de 'dra kho zhes pa la ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThat very one‚Äù is the reason.

original: kyang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba la ste /
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba la ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is with regard to the definite ascription.

original: mi 'dod pa kho nar zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa kho nar zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is ‚Äúonly not accepted.‚Äù

original: nges par gzung ba snga ma dag ni cung zad 'dod pa yang 'grub cing 'dir ni 'dod pa @184b med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba snga ma dag ni cung zad 'dod pa yang 'grub cing 'dir ni 'dod pa @184b med pa kho na'o //
translated: In the former definite ascriptions, even a little acceptance is established, but here there is only non-acceptance.

original: snga ma dag la thal bar mi 'gyur ba bden mod kyi zhes pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma dag la thal bar mi 'gyur ba bden mod kyi zhes pa'o //
translated: It is true that there is no entailment in the former ones.

original: ci ltar thal bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar thal bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it that there is no fallacy?üîΩIt is said:

original: gsungs pa / de 'dra ba kho nas lhan cig mi 'byung ba zhes byas nas zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / de 'dra ba kho nas lhan cig mi 'byung ba zhes byas nas zhes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is just like that, because they do not occur together.‚Äù

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid la chos 'di yod pa yang ma yin no zhes bas de la gtan tshigs su thal ba med do //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid la chos 'di yod pa yang ma yin no zhes bas de la gtan tshigs su thal ba med do //
translated: This property does not exist in the object of hearing. Therefore, there is no fallacy of the reason.

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid la yang skyon snga ma rjes su 'brel pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid la yang skyon snga ma rjes su 'brel pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: Also, with regard to that which arises immediately after effort, the former fault does not follow.

original: skyon snga ma ni byas pa nyid la sogs pa gtan tshigs nyid du grub pa'i rjes su 'brang la /
analyzed: skyon snga ma ni byas pa nyid la sogs pa gtan tshigs nyid du grub pa'i rjes su 'brang la /
translated: The former fault follows from the establishment of the reason, such as being produced.

original: 'dir ni gtan tshigs nyid du grub pa'i dri yang med pas so //
analyzed: 'dir ni gtan tshigs nyid du grub pa'i dri yang med pas so //
translated: But here, there is not even the smell of the establishment of the reason.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBut, etc.‚Äù

original: 'o na khyod kyi'ang de mtshungs la yod pa kho na zhes pa 'dir /
analyzed: 'o na khyod kyi'ang de mtshungs la yod pa kho na zhes pa 'dir /
translated: Well, in your case, it is the same. In this case, ‚Äúonly that which exists,‚Äù

original: de dang mtshungs pa kho na la zhes nges par gzung ba'i phyir thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs te /
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa kho na la zhes nges par gzung ba'i phyir thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs te /
translated: there is the same fallacy, because of the definite exclusion of ‚Äúonly that which is similar to it.‚Äù

original: de dang mthun pa kho na la yod pa'i gtan tshigs 'ga' yang med de /
analyzed: de dang mthun pa kho na la yod pa'i gtan tshigs 'ga' yang med de /
translated: There is no reason at all why the reason must exist only in that which is similar to it.

original: dngos po thams cad rigs mi mthun gyi chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad rigs mi mthun gyi chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir zhe na /
translated: Because all things are similar to dissimilar things.

original: 'di yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: de mtshungs dang mthun phyogs zhes pa rnam grangs dag ste /
analyzed: de mtshungs dang mthun phyogs zhes pa rnam grangs dag ste /
translated: The terms ‚Äúsimilar‚Äù and ‚Äúthat which is similar to it‚Äù are synonyms.

original: mthun phyogs kyang bsgrub bya'i chos kyi spyis don mthun pa'o //
analyzed: mthun phyogs kyang bsgrub bya'i chos kyi spyis don mthun pa'o //
translated: That which is similar is that which is similar in meaning to the universal of the property of the thesis.

original: 'dir yang 'di ltar nges par gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang 'di ltar nges par gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Here, this should be ascertained:

original: gang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi dang don mthun pa kho na mthun phyogs so zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi dang don mthun pa kho na mthun phyogs so zhes pa ste /
translated: That which is similar in meaning to the universal of the property of the thesis is alone similar.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi kho nas mthun pa zhes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi kho nas mthun pa zhes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: That which is similar to the universal of the property of the thesis alone is not similar.

original: des na de mtshungs kyang gang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi mtshungs pa kho na yin pa de 'gyur bar 'os kyi /
analyzed: des na de mtshungs kyang gang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi mtshungs pa kho na yin pa de 'gyur bar 'os kyi /
translated: Therefore, that which is similar to it is suitable to be that which is similar to the universal of the property of the thesis.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi kho nas ni ma yin no zhes par thal bar 'gyur ba mi mtshungs so //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi kho nas ni ma yin no zhes par thal bar 'gyur ba mi mtshungs so //
translated: But it is not the universal of the object to be established.

original: 'o na dod zla ldan par gcod ba kho na nges bar gzung ba las rtogs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na dod zla ldan par gcod ba kho na nges bar gzung ba las rtogs pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it understood from the exclusion of the contrary?

original: chos thams cad bkag pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: chos thams cad bkag pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the exclusion of all phenomena.

original: des na ci'i phyir mtshon par bya la med pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: des na ci'i phyir mtshon par bya la med pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: So why is it not the exclusion of what is not to be indicated?

original: gang de yang dod zla ldan ba sel ba kho na la nges bar gzung ba nus pa nyid yin pa de lta yang /
analyzed: gang de yang dod zla ldan ba sel ba kho na la nges bar gzung ba nus pa nyid yin pa de lta yang /
translated: Even though it is possible to ascertain the exclusion of the contrary only in terms of the exclusion of the contrary,

original: 'dir mi rtag pa dang rtag pa la sogs pa skabs su bab pa 'ga' zhig med pa'i phyir na chos thams cad kyang phan tshun ltos pas de 'dra ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang de 'dra ba ma yin pa yang dod zla ldan ba ma yinüîΩpa nyid kyi phyir sel bar rigs so //
analyzed: 'dir mi rtag pa dang rtag pa la sogs pa skabs su bab pa 'ga' zhig med pa'i phyir na chos thams cad kyang phan tshun ltos pas de 'dra ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang de 'dra ba ma yin pa yang dod zla ldan ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir sel bar rigs so //
translated: here, because there is no impermanence or permanence, etc., that is relevant, all phenomena are mutually dependent, and therefore it is not like that. And because it is not like that, it is not the exclusion of the contrary.

original: ci 'di re zhig @185a * //
analyzed: ci 'di re zhig @185a * //
translated: What is this?

original: ces pa / ji ltar sbyor bas bstan bar bya ba de ltar 'di mtshan nyid yin nam /
analyzed: ces pa / ji ltar sbyor bas bstan bar bya ba de ltar 'di mtshan nyid yin nam /
translated: The phrase in virtue of the way in which it is related means: Is the definition the way in which the definiendum is related?

original: ci ste ji lta bur gyur pa'i don gyis yin zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ci ste ji lta bur gyur pa'i don gyis yin zhes pa ni /
translated: Or, does it mean in virtue of the way in which the object is related?

original: don dam par de 'dra ba med ba ni mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yin pa de ston pa gtan tshigs yin zhes pas na /üîΩde ni ci ste de kho na'i rnam pas sam /
analyzed: don dam par de 'dra ba med ba ni mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yin pa de ston pa gtan tshigs yin zhes pas na / de ni ci ste de kho na'i rnam pas sam /
translated: The phrase the reason is that which shows that the definiendum does not occur without the definition means that

original: rnam pa gzhan gyis yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyis yin zhes pa'o //
translated: the question is whether the definiendum is related to the definition in virtue of its being the definition or in virtue of being something other than the definition.

original: 'dir ni 'dir brjod par mi 'dod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'dir brjod par mi 'dod pa kho na'o //
translated: Here, the latter is not what is intended.

original: de bdag nyid kyis zhes pas /
analyzed: de bdag nyid kyis zhes pas /
translated: The phrase in virtue of its being that means

original: de 'dra ba med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de 'dra ba med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis zhes pa'i don to //
translated: in virtue of the fact that it does not occur without the definition.

original: gtan tshigs smras pas mi nus so zhes te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs smras pas mi nus so zhes te /
translated: The phrase it is not possible to say that the reason is stated means

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis bstan par zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis bstan par zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: in virtue of its being that, the definition is shown.

original: gtan tshigs brjod pas ni phyogs kyi chos tsam 'ba' zhig brjod kyi /
analyzed: gtan tshigs brjod pas ni phyogs kyi chos tsam 'ba' zhig brjod kyi /
translated: The statement of the reason merely states the property of the subject.

original: med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not state the relation of invariable concomitance.

original: de ni dpe'i tshig gi rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni dpe'i tshig gi rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is to be understood by means of the words of the example.

original: rnam pa cis sam ci la zhes pa /
analyzed: rnam pa cis sam ci la zhes pa /
translated: By what aspect? In what way?

original: de'i rnam pa mang po rnams srid de /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa mang po rnams srid de /
translated: There are many aspects of that.

original: dper na du ba dang bcas pa'i spyi dang khyad par gyi chos rnams lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na du ba dang bcas pa'i spyi dang khyad par gyi chos rnams lta bu'o //
translated: For example, like the general and specific properties of smoke.

original: de la rnam pa 'dis nye bar ston pa'o zhes brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la rnam pa 'dis nye bar ston pa'o zhes brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not said that it is taught by this aspect.

original: ci la ste ci bsgrub par bya ba la de ston nam /
analyzed: ci la ste ci bsgrub par bya ba la de ston nam /
translated: In what way? In what is to be accomplished, is it taught?

original: 'on te de'i gzhi la'am /
analyzed: 'on te de'i gzhi la'am /
translated: Or, is it in the basis of that?

original: 'on te bsgrub bya'i rigs mi mthun la zhes so //
analyzed: 'on te bsgrub bya'i rigs mi mthun la zhes so //
translated: Or, in the dissimilar type of what is to be accomplished?

original: de'i phyir mtshan nyid nyungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshan nyid nyungs pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, there is the fault of the brevity of the definition.

original: phyogs 'di kho na la skyon gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyogs 'di kho na la skyon gzhan gsungs pa /
translated: In just this position, another fault is stated:

original: shes byed las ni 'das pa yis //
analyzed: shes byed las ni 'das pa yis //
translated: Having gone beyond the means of knowledge,

original: 'di ltar zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes pa'o //
translated: thus.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it so? It is said:

original: ma mthong zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma mthong zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Not seeing, etc.

original: mig gis gzung sogs zhes te /
analyzed: mig gis gzung sogs zhes te /
translated: By the eye, etc.

original: b'a'i sgra ni dang gi don la'o //
analyzed: b'a'i sgra ni dang gi don la'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù has the meaning of ‚Äúand.‚Äù

original: sogs kyi sgras phyi rol nyid la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs kyi sgras phyi rol nyid la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: By the word ‚Äúetc.,‚Äù external, etc. are included.

original: de rnams mi rtag pa nyid dang lhan cig rgyu ba nyid yod pas so zhes sgra mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams mi rtag pa nyid dang lhan cig rgyu ba nyid yod pas so zhes sgra mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: This is a reason that proves sound is impermanent.

original: 'di ni ma grub pa nye bar mtshon pa'i don du'ang yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni ma grub pa nye bar mtshon pa'i don du'ang yin te /
translated: This also has the meaning of ‚Äúunproven,‚ÄùüîΩbecause the property of the subject is not stated, it is established as a part of the reason.

original: phyogs chos ma brjod pa nyid kyi phyir cha grub ba yang gtan tshigs yin pa 'thob bo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: phyogs chos ma brjod pa nyid kyi phyir cha grub ba yang gtan tshigs yin pa 'thob bo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: ma bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di /
analyzed: ma bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di /
translated: This so-called ‚Äúnot taught‚ÄùüîΩis not stated as ‚Äúwhat‚Äù and ‚Äúin what way.‚Äù

original: ci ltar ci la zhes ma brjod ces pa gang gis bstan pa zhes pa 'di tsam gyis ni rnam pa 'dis dang 'di la'i don nye bar ma bstan pa'o zhes pas khyad par rtogs pa ma yin pas so zhes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ci ltar ci la zhes ma brjod ces pa gang gis bstan pa zhes pa 'di tsam gyis ni rnam pa 'dis dang 'di la'i don nye bar ma bstan pa'o zhes pas khyad par rtogs pa ma yin pas so zhes pa'i phyir /
translated: By this alone, ‚Äúin this way‚Äù and ‚Äúin this‚Äù are not taught, so the meaning is not understood.

original: 'di ma brjod pa dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ma brjod pa dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is similar to not stating.

original: lhan cig 'byung bas bsgrub @185b byar na //
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung bas bsgrub @185b byar na //
translated: If established by co-occurrence,

original: zhes pa / 'di ltar sems te /
analyzed: zhes pa / 'di ltar sems te /
translated: it is thought like this.

original: bstan zin pa'i rnam pa kho na lhan cig 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: bstan zin pa'i rnam pa kho na lhan cig 'byung ba ste /
translated: The taught aspect is only co-occurrence.

original: rnam pa gzhan ma thob pa nyid kyi phyir dang / mtshan nyid kyi ngag la yang de 'dra ba med na mi 'byung ba nyid rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan ma thob pa nyid kyi phyir dang / mtshan nyid kyi ngag la yang de 'dra ba med na mi 'byung ba nyid rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the other forms are not obtained, and because in the case of a definition, the statement is understood to be invariably concomitant with that.

original: yul yang bsgrub par bya ba kho nar rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: yul yang bsgrub par bya ba kho nar rtogs par bya ste /
translated: And the object is to be understood as the probandum,

original: de nye ba'i phyir ro zhe'o //
analyzed: de nye ba'i phyir ro zhe'o //
translated: because it is proximate.

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pas sel bar byed de /
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pas sel bar byed de /
translated: He refutes this with ‚ÄúNo,‚Äù and so on.

original: chos mthun pa nyid dam chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis zhes pa'i dam gyi sgras gang yang rung ba yang 'brel pa ston par nus par gsungs so //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid dam chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis zhes pa'i dam gyi sgras gang yang rung ba yang 'brel pa ston par nus par gsungs so //
translated: He says that the word ‚Äúor‚Äù in ‚Äúby similarity or dissimilarity‚Äù is able to show a connection with either.

original: phyi rol gyi don nye bar bsdus bas zhes pa /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don nye bar bsdus bas zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBy the inclusion of the external object‚Äù means

original: phyogs su byas pa'i chos can gyi khyad par las gzhan du spyi la nye bar bstan pas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: phyogs su byas pa'i chos can gyi khyad par las gzhan du spyi la nye bar bstan pas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: that the universal is taught as being other than the particular subject that is the locus.

original: spyi yang khyad par yongs su mi spong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: spyi yang khyad par yongs su mi spong ba'i phyir /
translated: And because the universal does not abandon the particular,

original: bsgrub par bya pa'i chos can yang der nang du 'dus pa kho na ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya pa'i chos can yang der nang du 'dus pa kho na ste /
translated: the subject of the probandum is included in it.

original: bsgrub bya'i chos can kho na la med na /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos can kho na la med na /
translated: If it is not in the subject alone,

original: mi 'byung ba nyid ston ba bsal ba lhur len pa ni phyi rol gyi don smos ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'byung ba nyid ston ba bsal ba lhur len pa ni phyi rol gyi don smos ba'o //
translated: then the statement of the invariable concomitance is the main point, and the mention of external objects is secondary.

original: de ltar na gal te gang gis ma bstan pa de gtan tshigs ma yin na /
analyzed: de ltar na gal te gang gis ma bstan pa de gtan tshigs ma yin na /
translated: Thus, if that which is not taught is not a reason,

original: rnam pa thams cad du gtan tshigs yod pa ma yin par thal 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gtan tshigs yod pa ma yin par thal 'gyur te /
translated: then it follows that there is no reason at all.

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pas 'brel pa ston bar nus pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pas 'brel pa ston bar nus pa ma yin gyi /
translated: For, immediately after the effort, it is not possible to teach the relation by saying ‚Äúbecause of arising,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well, then, what is it?

original: dpe gnyis pos so zhe na /
analyzed: dpe gnyis pos so zhe na /
translated: It is the two examples.

original: 'di de'i ba'i tshig kho nas rtogs par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di de'i ba'i tshig kho nas rtogs par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: This is stated for the purpose of understanding the words of the root text alone.

original: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba lta bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba lta bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is like what will be explained.

original: gang brjod pa yang zhes pa 'dis bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs nye bar ston ba mi srid pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang brjod pa yang zhes pa 'dis bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs nye bar ston ba mi srid pa gsungs te /
translated: And what is stated by ‚Äúalso‚Äù is the impossibility of teaching the reason in the predicate.

original: mi rtag pa la sogs pa rnams ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bshad la /
analyzed: mi rtag pa la sogs pa rnams ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bshad la /
translated: Impermanence and so on are explained to be the predicate.

original: de rnams la gal te med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi chos nye bar ston na /
analyzed: de rnams la gal te med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi chos nye bar ston na /
translated: If they were to teach the property of the absence of which is the invariable concomitance,

original: gtan tshigs 'dzin pa'i dus kho na na bsgrub bya sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir gang sgrub pa'i ched du gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba ma grub pa gzhan ci /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'dzin pa'i dus kho na na bsgrub bya sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir gang sgrub pa'i ched du gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba ma grub pa gzhan ci /
translated: then at the very time of apprehending the reason, the probandum would be established. So what else is there to establish for the sake of which the reason would be?

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: That is so.

original: chos can ni bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: chos can ni bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: The subject is the probandum.

original: de la mthong ba'i chos kyi gtan tshigs kyi med na mi 'byung ba nyid ston pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: de la mthong ba'i chos kyi gtan tshigs kyi med na mi 'byung ba nyid ston pa'o zhe na /
translated: The invariable concomitance of the reason with respect to it is taught by the property of the subject.

original: gsungs pa / gzhan ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / gzhan ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The opponent says, ‚ÄúAnother is the probandum,‚Äù and so on.

original: bsgrub bya'i chos la tha dad pa'i bsgrub bya gzhan rtsod pa sgrub par bshad pa ma yin te /üîΩbsgrub bya'i chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub bya nyid du ma brjod @186a * //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos la tha dad pa'i bsgrub bya gzhan rtsod pa sgrub par bshad pa ma yin te / bsgrub bya'i chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub bya nyid du ma brjod @186a * //
translated: It is not explained that another probandum is the thesis to be proven.

original: pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the subject, which is qualified by the probandum, is not stated to be the probandum.

original: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa las bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes pa /
analyzed: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa las bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes pa /
translated: The reason is that which proves the probandum through the example and the similarity of properties.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid las de'i chos rtogs par byed pa'i dpe ni dpe brjod de /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid las de'i chos rtogs par byed pa'i dpe ni dpe brjod de /
translated: The example that causes one to understand the property of the probandum through similarity to the probandum is called the example.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag par bsgrub par bya ba la bum pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag par bsgrub par bya ba la bum pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, in the proof that sound is impermanent, a pot and so on are the example.

original: de dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mthun pa nyid las te mtshungs pa nyid las bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mthun pa nyid las te mtshungs pa nyid las bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: The property of the probandum is established through similarity to that, through sameness.

original: bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par byed pa ni gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par byed pa ni gtan tshigs te /
translated: The reason is that which causes one to understand the probandum.

original: dper na skye ba'i chos can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na skye ba'i chos can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, in the statement ‚Äúbecause of being a phenomenon that arises,‚Äù and so on.

original: gal te chos mthun sgrub byed na //
analyzed: gal te chos mthun sgrub byed na //
translated: If similarity is the proof,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: gal te de dang chos mthun pa skye ba'i chos can nyid la sogs pa gang yin pa de bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin gyi de'i tshig ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te de dang chos mthun pa skye ba'i chos can nyid la sogs pa gang yin pa de bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin gyi de'i tshig ma yin na /
translated: If that which is similar to the probandum, such as being a phenomenon that arises, is the reason that proves the probandum, it is not the words.

original: ngag gi yan lag gtan tshigs min par gyur na /
analyzed: ngag gi yan lag gtan tshigs min par gyur na /
translated: If the parts of speech were not reasons,üîΩand so on.

original: yan lag snga can gyi ngag gi ni gtan tshogs yan lag nyid du brjod de /
analyzed: yan lag snga can gyi ngag gi ni gtan tshogs yan lag nyid du brjod de /
translated: The statement of the reason is the first member of the syllogism.

original: dam bca' dang gtan tshigs dang dpe brjod dang nye bar spyar ba dang mjug bsdu ba rnams yan lag rnams so zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bca' dang gtan tshigs dang dpe brjod dang nye bar spyar ba dang mjug bsdu ba rnams yan lag rnams so zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said that the thesis, the reason, the example, the application, and the conclusion are the members of a syllogism.

original: don gyi mtshan nyid la ni gtan tshigs la de 'thob pa ma yin no zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams so //
analyzed: don gyi mtshan nyid la ni gtan tshigs la de 'thob pa ma yin no zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams so //
translated: But if the reason is not established for the purpose of the definition, then your assertion is contradicted.

original: ci ltar lnga pa nges par bstan par gyur pa na chos mthun pa nyid kho na gtan tshigs nyid du dogs she na /
analyzed: ci ltar lnga pa nges par bstan par gyur pa na chos mthun pa nyid kho na gtan tshigs nyid du dogs she na /
translated: Why is it suspected that the mere statement of a similar instance is the reason when the five-membered syllogism is taught?

original: gzhan thos pa med pa'i phyir dang / chos mthun pa nyid kyang bsgrub bya dang mngon par 'brel pa'i phyir te /üîΩtshig ni don gyi sgo nas bsgrub bya mngon par bsal pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: gzhan thos pa med pa'i phyir dang / chos mthun pa nyid kyang bsgrub bya dang mngon par 'brel pa'i phyir te / tshig ni don gyi sgo nas bsgrub bya mngon par bsal pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Because the other is not heard and because the similar instance is related to the probandum.üîΩThe words are suspected to be the reason because they are the cause of the ascertainment of the probandum through the meaning.

original: de kho na bsgrub par bya bsgrub par byed pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid du dogs so //
analyzed: de kho na bsgrub par bya bsgrub par byed pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid du dogs so //
translated: Because they prove the probandum just as it is.

original: tha dad du 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: tha dad du 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because they are engaged separately.

original: ngag gi yon tan ma yin pa nyid na gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: ngag gi yon tan ma yin pa nyid na gtan tshigs te /
translated: The reason is that they are not qualities of speech.

original: bya ba tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bya ba tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are different actions.

original: 'di yang brgyud pas gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang brgyud pas gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: This is also a reason by way of a consequence.

original: tha dad du 'jug pa nyid du gyur na /
analyzed: tha dad du 'jug pa nyid du gyur na /
translated: If they are engaged separately,

original: tha dad pa rnams la tha mi dad par brjod par 'dod pa ldog ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa rnams la tha mi dad par brjod par 'dod pa ldog ste /
translated: then the desire to express them as not different in those that are different is stopped.

original: de ldog pa na yang yan lag gi tha snyad do zhes pas /
analyzed: de ldog pa na yang yan lag gi tha snyad do zhes pas /
translated: When that is stopped, then the convention of parts is also stopped.

original: lhan cig ma yin pa brjod par 'dod pa kho na bar ma chod kyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: lhan cig ma yin pa brjod par 'dod pa kho na bar ma chod kyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason is that the desire to express them as not simultaneous is stopped.

original: de bstan ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bstan ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach that, he said,

original: lhan cig @186b brjod par 'dod pa ni zhes ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig @186b brjod par 'dod pa ni zhes ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe desire to express them as simultaneous‚Äù and so on.

original: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: That is explained as follows.

original: gang 'jug pa tha dad ba de rnams na lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang 'jug pa tha dad ba de rnams na lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: Those that are engaged separately are not desired to be expressed as simultaneous,

original: dper na rdza mkhan dang thags mkhan dang ba lang rdzi la sogs pa rnams bzhin /
analyzed: dper na rdza mkhan dang thags mkhan dang ba lang rdzi la sogs pa rnams bzhin /
translated: like potters, weavers, cowherds, and so on.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyang dam bca' la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'jug pa tha dad pa'o zhes pa rgyu dang 'gal pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyang dam bca' la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'jug pa tha dad pa'o zhes pa rgyu dang 'gal pa'o //
translated: The reason as explained is not co-present with the thesis, etc., because of the contradiction with the cause.

original: gang gi phyir bya ba tha mi dad pa'i nus pa shes pa'i don du sgra gcig gis lhan cig brjod par 'dod pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bya ba tha mi dad pa'i nus pa shes pa'i don du sgra gcig gis lhan cig brjod par 'dod pas so //
translated: Because the one who wishes to express the capacity of the non-different operation by one word wishes to express them together.

original: de gang zhig gang gi yan lag gzhan rnams dang lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa med pa de ni de'i yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: de gang zhig gang gi yan lag gzhan rnams dang lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa med pa de ni de'i yan lag ma yin te /
translated: That which is not wished to be expressed together with the other members is not a member of that.

original: dper na dmag gi ba lang bzhin /
analyzed: dper na dmag gi ba lang bzhin /
translated: For example, like the ox of the army.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyang dam bca' la sogs pa sgrub byed kyi ngag gi yan lag rnams dang lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa med do zhes pa ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyang dam bca' la sogs pa sgrub byed kyi ngag gi yan lag rnams dang lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa med do zhes pa ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: The reason as explained is not wished to be expressed together with the members of the speech which proves the thesis, etc. This is the non-observation of the cause.

original: de ltar ni 'di'i 'di yan lag yin no zhes pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu ni /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'di'i 'di yan lag yin no zhes pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu ni /
translated: The cause of the convention ‚ÄúThis is a member of that‚Äù is

original: de'i yan lag gzhan rnams dang lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i yan lag gzhan rnams dang lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa'o //
translated: the wish to express it together with the other members of that.

original: chos mi mthun pa'i spyor ba ni glang po che dang rta dang shing rta dang rkang thang gi dpes spyar bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa'i spyor ba ni glang po che dang rta dang shing rta dang rkang thang gi dpes spyar bar bya ba'o //
translated: The example of the elephant, horse, chariot, and foot soldier is to be applied to the dissimilar performance.

original: 'o na sgrub byed ma log pa dpe ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na sgrub byed ma log pa dpe ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the non-deviating proof the example?

original: glang po la sogs pa rnams kyang 'jug pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: glang po la sogs pa rnams kyang 'jug pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the elephants, etc., are different in their engagement?

original: ma yin te der ni lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te der ni lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because there is no desire to express them together there.

original: glang po myos pa rnams la sde myos so zhes brjod par bya ba'am /
analyzed: glang po myos pa rnams la sde myos so zhes brjod par bya ba'am /
translated: One should say, ‚ÄúThe intoxicated elephants are intoxicated,‚Äù or

original: rta rnams skad 'don pa na dmag sde rnams skad 'don no zhes pa ni ma yin pas so //
analyzed: rta rnams skad 'don pa na dmag sde rnams skad 'don no zhes pa ni ma yin pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe neighing horses are neighing,‚Äù but not ‚ÄúThe army is intoxicated‚Äù or ‚ÄúThe army is neighing.‚Äù

original: 'jug pa gang gi dbang du byas nas lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa de'i tha dad pa med pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ldog pa med de /
analyzed: 'jug pa gang gi dbang du byas nas lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa de'i tha dad pa med pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ldog pa med de /
translated: Because there is no difference in the engagement in terms of which there is a desire to express them together, the proof does not deviate.

original: dper na dmag sde rnams go cha gyon no 'khrug go //
analyzed: dper na dmag sde rnams go cha gyon no 'khrug go //
translated: For example, ‚ÄúThe army dons armor,‚Äù ‚ÄúThe army fights,‚Äù

original: rnam par rgyal lo zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal lo zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe army is victorious.‚Äù

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pas gtan tshigs grub par mjug sdud par byed do //
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pas gtan tshigs grub par mjug sdud par byed do //
translated: The phrase not so, etc., concludes the proof.

original: ci ltar na 'jug pa tha mi dad par 'gyur ba ma yin zhe na gsungs pa don ma brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: ci ltar na 'jug pa tha mi dad par 'gyur ba ma yin zhe na gsungs pa don ma brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ste /
translated: How is it that the engagement is not undifferentiated? He says, because the meaning is not expressed.

original: dam bca' la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams ni don brjod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: dam bca' la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams ni don brjod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'jug pa ste /
translated: The members such as the thesis have the characteristic of expressing the meaning, and the engagement.

original: de yang dper brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi don la yod pa ma yin te /üîΩdes na don @187a * //
analyzed: de yang dper brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi don la yod pa ma yin te / des na don @187a * //
translated: Moreover, that does not exist in the meaning which has the characteristic of the example and the similarity.

original: brjod par bya ba ni ma yin pas so //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ni ma yin pas so //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is not to be expressed.

original: ci'i phyir dper brjod dang chos mthun pa las zhes pa'i lnga pa 'di mi rigs she na ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir dper brjod dang chos mthun pa las zhes pa'i lnga pa 'di mi rigs she na ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Why is the fifth case, from the example and the similarity, not appropriate here? He says, not so, etc.

original: tha dad yod na 'byung khungs brjod par 'dod pa na lnga par 'gyur te /
analyzed: tha dad yod na 'byung khungs brjod par 'dod pa na lnga par 'gyur te /
translated: If there were a difference, then the fifth case would be used when one wishes to express the source,

original: grong nas 'ongs so zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: grong nas 'ongs so zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: like, for example, he comes from the village.

original: 'dir ni tha dad pa med de /
analyzed: 'dir ni tha dad pa med de /
translated: Here there is no difference.

original: dper brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid kho na sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dper brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid kho na sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is only the example and the similarity that are accepted as the proof.

original: 'o na tha mi dad pa la yang lnga pa nye bar dmigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na tha mi dad pa la yang lnga pa nye bar dmigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the fifth case, the locative, also observed in the case of non-difference?

original: nags nas shing gcod do zhes pa lta bu'o zhe na /
analyzed: nags nas shing gcod do zhes pa lta bu'o zhe na /
translated: For example, ‚ÄúHe cuts the tree in the forest.‚Äù

original: 'di yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not the case,

original: nags dang shing dag tshogs pa dang yan lag nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nags dang shing dag tshogs pa dang yan lag nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the forest and the tree are different by way of collection and by way of parts.

original: gal te yang nags dang shing dag dngos por tha mi dad pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te yang nags dang shing dag dngos por tha mi dad pa de lta na yang /
translated: Even if the forest and the tree are not different in reality,

original: blo'i snang bas byas pa'i tha dad yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: blo'i snang bas byas pa'i tha dad yod pa kho na'o //
translated: there is a difference made by the appearance of the mind.

original: gzhan yang pha rol po dngos po'i dbang kho na las sgra'i don rnam par gzhag par 'dod do zhes pas de kho na la 'di skyon yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang pha rol po dngos po'i dbang kho na las sgra'i don rnam par gzhag par 'dod do zhes pas de kho na la 'di skyon yin no //
translated: Moreover, the opponent asserts that the meaning of the word is established only by the power of the thing, so this is a fault only for him.

original: khyad par dang khyad par can dag gi zhes pa /
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par can dag gi zhes pa /
translated: The words ‚Äúof the qualifier and the qualified‚Äù are added.

original: sngon po dang autpala la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po yod na /
analyzed: sngon po dang autpala la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po yod na /
translated: If there were a real distinction between the blue and the utpala, etc.,

original: gzhi mthun pa rnams la rnam dbye tha dad pa nyid mthong ba med do //
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa rnams la rnam dbye tha dad pa nyid mthong ba med do //
translated: then one would not see the difference in the case of the common locus.

original: 'dir yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa gzhi mthun pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa gzhi mthun pa ste /
translated: Here, the probandum and the probans are the common locus.

original: chos mthun pa nyid ni khyad par du 'dod do //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid ni khyad par du 'dod do //
translated: The similarity is asserted to be the distinction.

original: de'i phyir rnam dbye tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam dbye tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, there would not be a difference in the case of the case.

original: gang zhig klog par byed pa /
analyzed: gang zhig klog par byed pa /
translated: What is it that is being read?

original: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid 'di'i zhes 'bru mang po pas chos can brjod par bya zhing /
analyzed: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid 'di'i zhes 'bru mang po pas chos can brjod par bya zhing /
translated: The example and the similarity are this, and so on. The many words express the subject.

original: de'i phyir dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las te /
translated: Therefore, from the example and the similarity,

original: chos can las gang chos mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ba de gtan tshigs so zhe'o //
analyzed: chos can las gang chos mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ba de gtan tshigs so zhe'o //
translated: that which becomes the similarity of the subject is the reason.

original: de'i chos mthun pa nyid khyad par du ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir chos mthun pa nyid tsam gtan tshigs su thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i chos mthun pa nyid khyad par du ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir chos mthun pa nyid tsam gtan tshigs su thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because that similarity is not distinguished, it follows that mere similarity is the reason.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed par gzung pa ni de'i khyad par du 'thad pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed par gzung pa ni de'i khyad par du 'thad pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not tenable that the object to be established and the means of establishment are grasped as its particularities,

original: de kho na yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de kho na yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir te /
translated: because that is not fully understood,

original: yan lag thams cad kyang bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad kyang bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because all the parts are also the object to be established and the means of establishment.

original: 'dir chos mthun pa nyid smos pa yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir chos mthun pa nyid smos pa yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Here, the similarity is not mentioned.

original: gang yod pa de ni chos can gyi khyad par ro zhes pa 'di mi rigs so //üîΩngag ce na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang yod pa de ni chos can gyi khyad par ro zhes pa 'di mi rigs so // ngag ce na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This is not tenable: ‚ÄúThat which exists is the particularity of the subject.‚ÄùüîΩIf it is asked, ‚ÄúWhat is that?‚Äù it is said, ‚Äúspeech,‚Äù and so on.

original: @187b ngag gi sgras 'dir byas pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig tsam po brjod par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: @187b ngag gi sgras 'dir byas pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig tsam po brjod par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Here, the mere words ‚Äúbecause of being produced‚Äù and so on are asserted.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'grel par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'grel par gsungs pa /
translated: For that reason, it is said in the commentary:

original: tshig gang zhig ces pa'o //
analyzed: tshig gang zhig ces pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat words?‚Äù

original: 'o na yang dag par sbyor ba la sogs pa rnams las sgra 'byung gi / chos mthun pa nyid las ni ma yin zhes smras pa /
analyzed: 'o na yang dag par sbyor ba la sogs pa rnams las sgra 'byung gi / chos mthun pa nyid las ni ma yin zhes smras pa /
translated: But it is said that sound arises from correct application and so on, not from similarity.

original: brgyud pas zhes pa ste /
analyzed: brgyud pas zhes pa ste /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúindirectly.‚Äù

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa nye bar dmigs pa na /
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa nye bar dmigs pa na /
translated: When the perception of the act, etc.

original: de brjod par 'dod par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de brjod par 'dod par 'gyur zhing /
translated: is desired to be expressed,

original: de las rtsol ba'o de las dang 'bad pa las kyang byed pa bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: de las rtsol ba'o de las dang 'bad pa las kyang byed pa bskyod pa'o //
translated: from that, from the effort, the agent is moved.

original: de las kyang las so //
analyzed: de las kyang las so //
translated: From that, also, action.

original: de las yang dag par sbyor ba dang rnam par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: de las yang dag par sbyor ba dang rnam par 'byed pa'o //
translated: From that, the correct application and the analysis.

original: de rnams las sgra'o zhes pa 'di ni brgyud pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams las sgra'o zhes pa 'di ni brgyud pa'o //
translated: From those, the sound. This is the indirect.

original: gal te dngos su zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te dngos su zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: If directly, etc.

original: dngos su ste gang las gzhan gyis mchod par rjes su dpag par bya ba nges pa skye ba yin na /
analyzed: dngos su ste gang las gzhan gyis mchod par rjes su dpag par bya ba nges pa skye ba yin na /
translated: If directly, from which the inference of the worship of another is produced,

original: de yang nyan pa po'i med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa dran pa ste /
analyzed: de yang nyan pa po'i med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa dran pa ste /
translated: that is also the recollection of the relation of the invariable concomitance of the hearer.

original: de las de ma thag tu rjes su dpag par bya ba nges so zhes pas de kho na gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las de ma thag tu rjes su dpag par bya ba nges so zhes pas de kho na gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: From that, immediately, the inference is ascertained. Thus, that alone would be the reason.

original: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If, etc.

original: gang bar du chod kyang med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pa de brgyud pas te /üîΩnyan pa po'i gtan tshigs shes pa yang rnam pa 'di lta bu'o zhes pas de gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang bar du chod kyang med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pa de brgyud pas te / nyan pa po'i gtan tshigs shes pa yang rnam pa 'di lta bu'o zhes pas de gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Because if there is no obstruction, it does not occur.üîΩThe knowledge of the reason of the listener is also like this.

original: phyogs chos kyi shes pa yang chos mthun pa nyid las brgyud pas rjes su dpog pa'i rgyur 'gyur mod /
analyzed: phyogs chos kyi shes pa yang chos mthun pa nyid las brgyud pas rjes su dpog pa'i rgyur 'gyur mod /
