translated: The knowledge of the property of the subject is also indirectly the cause of inference from the similar instance.

original: de chos mthun nyid gtan tshigs min //
analyzed: de chos mthun nyid gtan tshigs min //
translated: The similar instance is not the reason.

original: zhes pa / nyan pa po'i gang chos mthun pa nyid kyi shes pa de ni /
analyzed: zhes pa / nyan pa po'i gang chos mthun pa nyid kyi shes pa de ni /
translated: The knowledge of the similar instance of the listener is

original: de'i tshig las bar ma chad par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de'i tshig las bar ma chad par 'gyur gyi /
translated: uninterrupted by the words of the reason.

original: chos mthun pa nyid las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid las ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not from the similar instance.

original: tshig ni de kho na las zhes pa bsam pa'o //
analyzed: tshig ni de kho na las zhes pa bsam pa'o //
translated: The words are from that alone.üîΩBecause it is the present topic, it is not specified.üîΩThe statement of the probandum is the thesis.

original: skabs su bab pa'i phyir khyad par du bya ba ma yin no zhes pa bsgrub bya ston pa dam bca'o zhes pa 'di las ston pa smos pa rjes su 'jug ste /
analyzed: skabs su bab pa'i phyir khyad par du bya ba ma yin no zhes pa bsgrub bya ston pa dam bca'o zhes pa 'di las ston pa smos pa rjes su 'jug ste /
translated: This is stated from the statement of the thesis.

original: des na 'di ltar 'brel par bya ste /
analyzed: des na 'di ltar 'brel par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, the connection should be made in this way.

original: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las gang ston pa de gtan tshigs so zhes par te /
analyzed: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las gang ston pa de gtan tshigs so zhes par te /
translated: The reason is that which is taught from the example and similarity.

original: de'i phyir khyad par du bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par du bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not to be specified.

original: skabs nyid yin na gzhan la srid ces pa ni /
analyzed: skabs nyid yin na gzhan la srid ces pa ni /
translated: If it is the occasion itself, it is possible for another.

original: ston pa skabs nyid du brten par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: ston pa skabs nyid du brten par bya ba yin na /
translated: If the teacher is to be relied upon as the occasion itself,

original: gtan tshigs nyid du mngon par 'dod pa ston pa las gzhan pa ston pa'i yang gtan tshigs @188a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid du mngon par 'dod pa ston pa las gzhan pa ston pa'i yang gtan tshigs @188a * //
translated: it is possible that the reason is also the reason for the teacher other than the one who is manifestly accepted as the reason.

original: nyid du srid do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: nyid du srid do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of ‚Äúit is possible for another.‚Äù

original: ci ltar gzhan srid ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar gzhan srid ce na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it possible for another? It is stated:

original: skabs su bab ba nyid la yang zhes pa la sogs pa sta /
analyzed: skabs su bab ba nyid la yang zhes pa la sogs pa sta /
translated: Even in the case of the occasion itself, etc.

original: gal te yang ston pa skabs su bab pa yin pa de lta na yang lnga pas ston pa nyid las dpe brjod dang chos mthun ba nyid las gang nges par ston pa de gtan tshigs zhes pa 'di rtogs kyi dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa'i gang ston pa
analyzed: gal te yang ston pa skabs su bab pa yin pa de lta na yang lnga pas ston pa nyid las dpe brjod dang chos mthun ba nyid las gang nges par ston pa de gtan tshigs zhes pa 'di rtogs kyi dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa'i gang ston pa
translated: Even if the teacher is the occasion itself, in that case, from the teaching of the example and similarity, that which is ascertained is the reason. This is understood. The teaching of the example and similarity

original: de gtan tshigs so zhes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de gtan tshigs so zhes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: That is the reason.

original: de las kyang ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And from that, there is an absurd consequence.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: That may be so, but

original: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa las de kho na ston pa ni 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa las de kho na ston pa ni 'gyur gyi //
translated: the teaching of that very thing from the example and the similarity of the property is possible,

original: gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: but not from anything else.

original: des ni skyon 'di med do zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des ni skyon 'di med do zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If you say, That way, this fault does not exist, it is said:

original: 'gyur te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'gyur te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is possible, etc.

original: gang kho na bsgrub par bya ba'i dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid kho na bsgrub bya dang chos mthun pa nyid las de'i chos rtogs pa'i dpe ni dpe brjod do zhes pa 'dir bsgrub bya dang chos mthun pa'i sgras brjod do //
analyzed: gang kho na bsgrub par bya ba'i dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid kho na bsgrub bya dang chos mthun pa nyid las de'i chos rtogs pa'i dpe ni dpe brjod do zhes pa 'dir bsgrub bya dang chos mthun pa'i sgras brjod do //
translated: In this, the expression the similarity of the property to be proven is expressed by the words the similarity of the property to be proven.

original: de'i phyir dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa la ltos nas dpe ston pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa la ltos nas dpe ston pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the example is taught in dependence on the example and the similarity of the property.

original: de lta bu ni nye bar sbyar ba ston pa yang ste /
analyzed: de lta bu ni nye bar sbyar ba ston pa yang ste /
translated: That is also the teaching of the application,

original: gang gi phyir des ni dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid kho nar bsgrub bya nye bar gtod do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir des ni dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid kho nar bsgrub bya nye bar gtod do //
translated: because by that, only the similarity of the example and the property to be proven is taught.

original: nyes pa 'di ni med de zhes pa /
analyzed: nyes pa 'di ni med de zhes pa /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: This is what is thought.

original: dper na bram ze rnams la zho byin cig / kun di na'i bu la dar ba byin cig ces pa la /
analyzed: dper na bram ze rnams la zho byin cig / kun di na'i bu la dar ba byin cig ces pa la /
translated: For example, when it is said, ‚ÄúGive curd to the Brahmins, give ghee to the son of Kunti,‚Äù

original: spyir thob pa'i zho sbyin pa ni /üîΩkhyad par byas pa'i dar ba spyin pas 'gog pa de ltar yang lag phyi ma rnams la gtan tshigs nyid ni /
analyzed: spyir thob pa'i zho sbyin pa ni / khyad par byas pa'i dar ba spyin pas 'gog pa de ltar yang lag phyi ma rnams la gtan tshigs nyid ni /
translated: the giving of curd, which is obtained in general,üîΩis stopped by the giving of ghee, which is made special.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ston pas so zhe'o //üîΩma yin rnam brtags sogs srid phyir //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ston pas so zhe'o // ma yin rnam brtags sogs srid phyir //
translated: The reason for this is shown by the words, ‚Äúbecause of the teaching of its own characteristics.‚Äù

original: zhes pa ste /üîΩde la rnam par brtag pa ni lhas byin khar ba'i snod dam /üîΩdngul gyi 'am /
analyzed: zhes pa ste / de la rnam par brtag pa ni lhas byin khar ba'i snod dam / dngul gyi 'am /
translated: Because of the possibility of the other, the imagined, etc.

original: gser gyi ru za ru chug ces pa ste /
analyzed: gser gyi ru za ru chug ces pa ste /
translated: Therein, the imagined is, for example, when it is said, ‚ÄúDevadatta should eat from a vessel of brass, or silver, or gold.‚Äù

original: rnam par brtag pas gzhi'i dngos po 'dir rnam par shes par bya'o //üîΩbsdu ba ni lhas byin mar sar dang lo ma dang / lan tshvas za ru chug /'gegs pa ni dper na bram ze rnams la zho byin /
analyzed: rnam par brtag pas gzhi'i dngos po 'dir rnam par shes par bya'o // bsdu ba ni lhas byin mar sar dang lo ma dang / lan tshvas za ru chug /'gegs pa ni dper na bram ze rnams la zho byin /
translated: The imagined is to be understood here as the basis, the thing.üîΩThe included is, for example, when it is said, ‚ÄúDevadatta should eat sugar, leaves, and salt.‚Äù

original: kun di na'i bu la dar ba byin zhes pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: kun di na'i bu la dar ba byin zhes pa lta bu ste /
translated: The excluded is, for example, when it is said, ‚ÄúGive curd to the Brahmins, give ghee to the son of Kunti.‚Äù

original: de ltar gang gi phyir gcig tu thob pa rnams la ni gnod pa bzhin du rnam par brtag pa dang bsdu ba dag kyang 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar gang gi phyir gcig tu thob pa rnams la ni gnod pa bzhin du rnam par brtag pa dang bsdu ba dag kyang 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, just as the obtainment of one thing is harmed, so too would the investigation and collection of one thing be harmed.

original: de las the tshom mo //
analyzed: de las the tshom mo //
translated: From that, there is doubt.

original: de phyir the tshom yongs su spang ba'i don du drug par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de phyir the tshom yongs su spang ba'i don du drug par 'gyur mod /
translated: Therefore, in order to completely abandon doubt, it would be the sixth.

original: 'o na spyir btang la dmigs @188b bsal gnod byed do zhes rab tu grags pa 'di kho na rigs pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na spyir btang la dmigs @188b bsal gnod byed do zhes rab tu grags pa 'di kho na rigs pa ste /
translated: But it is well known that in general, exceptions harm the general statement. This alone is logical.

original: des na 'di la the tshom za ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'di la the tshom za ba ci zhe na /
translated: So why is there doubt about this?

original: 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: It is thought like this.

original: rigs pa 'di la pha rol po rjes su mi 'jug go //
analyzed: rigs pa 'di la pha rol po rjes su mi 'jug go //
translated: The opponent does not engage with this logic.

original: gal te 'jug na dper brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: gal te 'jug na dper brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa gtan tshigs so //
translated: If they did engage, then the reason would be to prove the probandum from the mere similarity of the example.

original: de bzhin du chos mi mthun pa nyid las zhes pa 'dir sgrub par byed pa smos pa mi byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos mi mthun pa nyid las zhes pa 'dir sgrub par byed pa smos pa mi byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, here the statement of the probandum would not be made from the mere dissimilarity.

original: de ltar ni 'di gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i bdag nyid gang chos mthun pa nyid dam mi mthun pa nyid de rnam par gcod pa'i ched du de las bzlog pas nye bar blangs pas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'di gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i bdag nyid gang chos mthun pa nyid dam mi mthun pa nyid de rnam par gcod pa'i ched du de las bzlog pas nye bar blangs pas so //
translated: In this way, the nature of a fallacious reason is either similarity or dissimilarity. In order to eliminate that, the opposite is taken up.

original: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: gang chos mthun pa nyid dam mi mthun pa nyid yin zhing gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams ma yin pa de gtan tshigs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang chos mthun pa nyid dam mi mthun pa nyid yin zhing gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams ma yin pa de gtan tshigs so zhes pa'o //
translated: That which is either similar or dissimilar and is not a fallacious reason is a reason.

original: rigs pa 'di 'dod pa na ni /
analyzed: rigs pa 'di 'dod pa na ni /
translated: When this principle is accepted,

original: gang chos mthun pa nyid dam mi mthun pa nyid gtan tshigs ltar snang yin pa de gtan tshigs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gang chos mthun pa nyid dam mi mthun pa nyid gtan tshigs ltar snang yin pa de gtan tshigs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: it is not the case that it follows that whatever is either similar or dissimilar and is a fallacious reason is a reason.

original: dmigs bsal gyi yul la spyir btang gi skabs med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs bsal gyi yul la spyir btang gi skabs med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no opportunity for a general statement in the case of a specific object.

original: sgrub par byed pa smos pa yang byas te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa smos pa yang byas te /
translated: Having mentioned the proof,

original: des na rigs pa 'di 'da' bar byas nas 'jug go //
analyzed: des na rigs pa 'di 'da' bar byas nas 'jug go //
translated: therefore, this principle is accepted and engaged.

original: des na the tshom mo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: des na the tshom mo zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is doubt.

original: skyon med pa kho na ni ma yin te zhes pa mi srid pa'i khyad par nye bar blangs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde bzhin du don gyi khyad par bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: skyon med pa kho na ni ma yin te zhes pa mi srid pa'i khyad par nye bar blangs pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin du don gyi khyad par bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: But not only faultless, because a special impossibility is taken up.

original: don kho nas don rtogs par byed kyi sgras ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don kho nas don rtogs par byed kyi sgras ni ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, the proof of the probandum is by a special meaning, saying the meaning alone makes known the meaning, not the word.

original: 'o na yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: But still, etc.

original: 'di la bsam pa ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la bsam pa ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: The thought here is as will be explained.

original: yang ci ltar de khyad par gyi don nyid du brtag par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci ltar de khyad par gyi don nyid du brtag par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Again, how is that to be regarded as the meaning of the qualifier? It is said:

original: ngag ni chos mthun pa thams cad kyi gtan tshigs ma yin zhes pa ste /üîΩdper na gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa'i lta bu'o //
analyzed: ngag ni chos mthun pa thams cad kyi gtan tshigs ma yin zhes pa ste / dper na gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa'i lta bu'o //
translated: Speech is not the reason for all similar properties.

original: gang 'dod de ni khyad par gyis //
analyzed: gang 'dod de ni khyad par gyis //
translated: For example, like the property of being an object of knowledge, etc.

original: zhes pa / dper brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid ma 'khrul pa'i tshig gtan tshigs so zhes par ro //
analyzed: zhes pa / dper brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid ma 'khrul pa'i tshig gtan tshigs so zhes par ro //
translated: What is asserted is that the nonerroneous statement of the example and the similar property is the reason.

original: tshig gi khyad par gyis don ci zhig yin zhes pa /
analyzed: tshig gi khyad par gyis don ci zhig yin zhes pa /
translated: What is the meaning of the qualifier word?

original: cung zad kyang med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: cung zad kyang med pa kho na'o //
translated: It is nothing at all.

original: khyad par brgya phrag ldan yang tshig ni bsgrub par bya ba'i don la mi 'khrul bar 'gyur ba ma yin pas so //üîΩ'o na yang zhes pa la sogs pas bsam pa gang gis /üîΩ'o na yang de khang par byed @189a * //
analyzed: khyad par brgya phrag ldan yang tshig ni bsgrub par bya ba'i don la mi 'khrul bar 'gyur ba ma yin pas so // 'o na yang zhes pa la sogs pas bsam pa gang gis / 'o na yang de khang par byed @189a * //
translated: Even if it has a hundred distinctions, the word does not become non-erroneous with respect to the object to be established.

original: pa'i don du 'gyur te zhes bshad pa de gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: pa'i don du 'gyur te zhes bshad pa de gsal bar byed do //
translated: But still, etc. explains the intention with which it was said that it would be for the purpose of making a house.

original: dper na dam bca' dang gtan tshigs dag 'gal ba zhes pa ste /
analyzed: dper na dam bca' dang gtan tshigs dag 'gal ba zhes pa ste /
translated: For example, the thesis and reason are contradictory, etc.

original: 'dir ni tshig dag 'gal ba srid pa ma yin no zhes pas don dag kho na rnam par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni tshig dag 'gal ba srid pa ma yin no zhes pas don dag kho na rnam par shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, it is said that the words are not contradictory, so the meaning alone should be understood.

original: dgos pa med pa 'dod ma yin //
analyzed: dgos pa med pa 'dod ma yin //
translated: It is not accepted that it is without purpose.

original: zhes pa / dgos pa las nye bar btags pa'i sgras brjod pa la brten par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes pa / dgos pa las nye bar btags pa'i sgras brjod pa la brten par bya ste /
translated: The word that is designated from the purpose should be relied upon,

original: dper na bram ze'i khye'u la ser ge zhes pa bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na bram ze'i khye'u la ser ge zhes pa bzhin te /
translated: for example, the Brahmin boy is a lion, etc.

original: dpa' ba nyid phul du byung ba go pa'i ched du seng ge'i sgras brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' ba nyid phul du byung ba go pa'i ched du seng ge'i sgras brjod pa'o //
translated: For the purpose of expressing the excellence of bravery, he is called a lion.

original: 'dir yang bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi sgra'i gtso bo'i don ni chos mthun pa nyid kho na'o zhes pas de kho na la khyad par bya'i /
analyzed: 'dir yang bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi sgra'i gtso bo'i don ni chos mthun pa nyid kho na'o zhes pas de kho na la khyad par bya'i /
translated: Here, too, the primary meaning of the words of the probandum and the probans is only the similarity. Therefore, it is that alone which is to be distinguished,

original: don ni sgra'i khyad par gyis ma yin no //
analyzed: don ni sgra'i khyad par gyis ma yin no //
translated: not the meaning by the distinction of the words.

original: de ltar khyad par bya'o zhes pa /
analyzed: de ltar khyad par bya'o zhes pa /
translated: Thus, it is to be distinguished.

original: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa ni sgrub byed ma yin pa yang yod do //
analyzed: dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa ni sgrub byed ma yin pa yang yod do //
translated: There is also a probans which is not an example, and a similarity which is not an example.üîΩJust as it is to be distinguished from that, so it is to be distinguished.

original: de'i ji ltar de las khyad par du 'gyur ba de ltar khyad par du gyis shig 'o na zhes pa sgrub byed ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa ni sgrub byed kyi sgras byed de /
analyzed: de'i ji ltar de las khyad par du 'gyur ba de ltar khyad par du gyis shig 'o na zhes pa sgrub byed ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa ni sgrub byed kyi sgras byed de /
translated: The exclusion of the non-probans is done by the word probans.

original: des na ci ltar sgrub byed ma yin pa las khyad par du byas pa ma yin par 'gyur zhes sems pa'o //
analyzed: des na ci ltar sgrub byed ma yin pa las khyad par du byas pa ma yin par 'gyur zhes sems pa'o //
translated: Therefore, how can it be that it is not distinguished from the non-probans?

original: 'di khyad par du byas pa ma yin te /üîΩrnam grangs tsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di khyad par du byas pa ma yin te / rnam grangs tsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is not distinguished,üîΩbecause it is only a synonym.

original: yan lag thams cad rnams kho na bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i ched du 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: yan lag thams cad rnams kho na bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i ched du 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: It is only for the sake of understanding the probandum that all the parts are employed.

original: bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa'o zhes pas 'di rnam grangs te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa'o zhes pas 'di rnam grangs te /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is a synonym for ‚Äúthat which is to be established is established by that.‚Äù

original: de kho na ni de rnams kyi bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa'i dngos por so so la ji ltar rigs pa de ltar khyad par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na ni de rnams kyi bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa'i dngos por so so la ji ltar rigs pa de ltar khyad par brjod par bya'o //
translated: That reality is the thing which establishes what is to be established by each of them, and it should be described as a particular in that way.

original: de kho na ni yan lag thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i ngo bo ma yin no //
analyzed: de kho na ni yan lag thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i ngo bo ma yin no //
translated: That reality is not the common nature of all the parts.

original: de sgrub pas ni khyad par rtogs pa'i ched du nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de sgrub pas ni khyad par rtogs pa'i ched du nus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it possible to understand the particular by establishing that,

original: yongs su mi shes pa nyid kyi phyir yang de khyad par nyid du mi 'thad do //
analyzed: yongs su mi shes pa nyid kyi phyir yang de khyad par nyid du mi 'thad do //
translated: because it is not completely known, it is not tenable that it is a particular.

original: ci ltar na yan lag thams cad la bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi sgra rnam grangs par rigs /
analyzed: ci ltar na yan lag thams cad la bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi sgra rnam grangs par rigs /
translated: How is it that the words ‚Äúthat which is to be established‚Äù and ‚Äúthat which establishes‚Äù are synonyms for all the parts?

original: spyi dang khyad par gyi sgra dag rnam grangs pa nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par gyi sgra dag rnam grangs pa nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: The words ‚Äúuniversal‚Äù and ‚Äúparticular‚Äù are not synonyms,

original: shing dang shing sha pa'i sgra bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: shing dang shing sha pa'i sgra bzhin no zhe na /
translated: like the words ‚Äútree‚Äù and ‚Äú≈õi·πÉ≈õapƒÅ.‚Äù

original: rnam par gcod par mi byed pa po nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: rnam par gcod par mi byed pa po nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Because it does not perform the function of exclusion,

original: rnam grangs dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir rnam grangs kyi sgras brjod do zhes pas skyon med do //
analyzed: rnam grangs dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir rnam grangs kyi sgras brjod do zhes pas skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault, because it is said that it is expressed by the word 'enumeration' because of being synonymous with enumeration.

original: de lta na 'o na zhes pa /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na zhes pa /
translated: In that case, then, it is said, If that is so,

original: rnam grangs pa nyid yongs su spong par byed do //
analyzed: rnam grangs pa nyid yongs su spong par byed do //
translated: one abandons enumeration itself.

original: sgrub byed ma yin @189b pa'i chos mthun pa nyid dang chos ma mthun pa nyid las bzlog pas bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa smos pa 'di byas so //
analyzed: sgrub byed ma yin @189b pa'i chos mthun pa nyid dang chos ma mthun pa nyid las bzlog pas bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa smos pa 'di byas so //
translated: This is because the proof is stated by the opposite of non-establishing similarity and dissimilarity.

original: don gyi skabs kyi dbang las spyi'i sgra rnams kyang khyad par gyi rnam par gcod pa'i rgyu rnams su mthong ste /
analyzed: don gyi skabs kyi dbang las spyi'i sgra rnams kyang khyad par gyi rnam par gcod pa'i rgyu rnams su mthong ste /
translated: From the power of the context of the meaning, even general words are seen to be the causes of the exclusion of particularities.

original: dper na glang po rnams go bskon par bya pa nyid la sgrub par byed pa'o zhes pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na glang po rnams go bskon par bya pa nyid la sgrub par byed pa'o zhes pa lta bu ste /
translated: For example, in the proof of the statement the elephants are to be adorned,

original: glang po che rnams kho na sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa dang bral ba rnam par gcod par byed kyi shing rta la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang ngo //
analyzed: glang po che rnams kho na sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa dang bral ba rnam par gcod par byed kyi shing rta la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang ngo //
translated: only the elephants are excluded as being devoid of the ability to prove, but not chariots and so on. It is the same here as well.

original: dper brjod dang chos mthun pa'am mi mthun pa nyid bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa gtan tshigs so zhes brjod pa na chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid kho na sgrub byed yin pa sel te /
analyzed: dper brjod dang chos mthun pa'am mi mthun pa nyid bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa gtan tshigs so zhes brjod pa na chos mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid kho na sgrub byed yin pa sel te /
translated: When it is said that an example is a reason that proves a property to be established by means of similarity or dissimilarity, it excludes that similarity and dissimilarity alone are the proof.

original: de'i phyir 'di khyad par du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di khyad par du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, this is a distinction.

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid smos pa ni /
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid smos pa ni /
translated: The mention of dissimilarity is

original: de bzhin du chos mi mthun pa las zhes gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid nye bar ston pa las so //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos mi mthun pa las zhes gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid nye bar ston pa las so //
translated: because the definition of a reason is taught as ‚Äúfrom that which is similar and dissimilar.‚Äù

original: yang sgrub byed ma yin pa ci yin zhes pa /
analyzed: yang sgrub byed ma yin pa ci yin zhes pa /
translated: Again, what is not a proof?

original: sgrub par byed pa nges par mi shes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nges par mi shes pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not ascertained as a proof.

original: sgrub byed ma yin pa yang de las bzlog par shes par mi nus zhes pa'i dri ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub byed ma yin pa yang de las bzlog par shes par mi nus zhes pa'i dri ba'o //
translated: The question is: ‚ÄúIt cannot be understood that a non-proof is the opposite of that.‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid du nges par bstan pa las sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa kho na'o zhes sems so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid du nges par bstan pa las sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa kho na'o zhes sems so //
translated: It is thought that it is only understood to be a non-proof from the teaching that it is a seemingly correct reason.

original: gang gi phyir spyir btang ni zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir spyir btang ni zhes pa ste /
translated: Because of the general statement,

original: spyir bsgrub pa ni spyir btang ngo //
analyzed: spyir bsgrub pa ni spyir btang ngo //
translated: The general statement is the general rule.

original: de 'thob pa sel ba ni dmigs bsal lo //
analyzed: de 'thob pa sel ba ni dmigs bsal lo //
translated: The elimination of its obtainment is the exception.

original: de la dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa gtan tshigs so zhes pa ni spyir bsgrub pa'i phyir btang ngo //
analyzed: de la dpe brjod dang chos mthun pa gtan tshigs so zhes pa ni spyir bsgrub pa'i phyir btang ngo //
translated: Therein, the example and the similarity of attributes are the reason, this is for the sake of the general statement.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid ni dmigs bsal lo //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid ni dmigs bsal lo //
translated: The definition of the apparent reason is the exception.

original: spyir btang ni /
analyzed: spyir btang ni /
translated: The general statement is:

original: dmigs kyis bsal la yod srid min //
analyzed: dmigs kyis bsal la yod srid min //
translated: There cannot be an exception to what is possible.

original: yang spyi'i 'jug pa'i spyir btang ba ni khyad par thams cad la 'jug pas na ci ltar dmigs kyis bsal ba'i yul yongs su spong zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang spyi'i 'jug pa'i spyir btang ba ni khyad par thams cad la 'jug pas na ci ltar dmigs kyis bsal ba'i yul yongs su spong zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, the general statement of the engagement of the general is: Since it engages all particulars, how does it completely abandon the object of the exception?

original: sngar dmigs kyis bsal ba zhes pa la sogs pas te /
analyzed: sngar dmigs kyis bsal ba zhes pa la sogs pas te /
translated: It is said: Previously, the exception... and so forth.

original: spyi la spyir btang ba ste /
analyzed: spyi la spyir btang ba ste /
translated: The general statement is in regard to the general.

original: de yang spyi'i nang du 'dus pa'i khyad par ram yongs su bor ba'i khyad par yin /
analyzed: de yang spyi'i nang du 'dus pa'i khyad par ram yongs su bor ba'i khyad par yin /
translated: Moreover, it is either a particular included within the general or a particular that is completely abandoned.

original: gang gi tshe rtog pa snga ma yin pa /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rtog pa snga ma yin pa /
translated: When it is the former conception,

original: de'i tshe yul rnam par dbye ba mi shes pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe yul rnam par dbye ba mi shes pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: at that time, because the division of the object is not understood,

original: dmigs kyis bsal ba'i 'jug pa re zhig blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs kyis bsal ba'i 'jug pa re zhig blta bar bya'o //
translated: The engagement of the exception should be seen for the time being.

original: phyis de las gzhan pa'i yul la rang nyid gnas so //
analyzed: phyis de las gzhan pa'i yul la rang nyid gnas so //
translated: Later, one remains in one‚Äôs own country, which is different from that.

original: 'di'i dbang du byas nas gsungs @190a * //
analyzed: 'di'i dbang du byas nas gsungs @190a * //
translated: With respect to this, it is said:

original: pa / sngar dmigs kyis bsal ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pa / sngar dmigs kyis bsal ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe exception was previously mentioned, etc.‚Äù

original: gang gi tshe gnyis pa yin pa de'i tshe dmigs kyis bsal ba'i yul spangs pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi yul la sngar spyir btang 'jug go //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gnyis pa yin pa de'i tshe dmigs kyis bsal ba'i yul spangs pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi yul la sngar spyir btang 'jug go //
translated: When it is the second, then, because the exceptional country is abandoned, one engages in one‚Äôs own country, having previously given a general indication.

original: de'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: With respect to that, it is said:

original: dmigs bsal gyi yul brtags nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs bsal gyi yul brtags nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving examined the exceptional country, etc.‚Äù

original: da ni khyad par gnyis khas blangs nas kyang thal bar 'gyur ba ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni khyad par gnyis khas blangs nas kyang thal bar 'gyur ba ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, having accepted the two differences, the consequence is stated:

original: gtan tshigs 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: ‚ÄúThe reason changes, etc.‚Äù

original: rigs pa can pas brjod pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bas stong pa yang mtshungs pa'i chos nyid de /
analyzed: rigs pa can pas brjod pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bas stong pa yang mtshungs pa'i chos nyid de /
translated: The emptiness of the reason that appears to be stated by the NaiyƒÅyika is also the same property.

original: dper brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid dang gzhan gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: dper brjod dang chos mthun pa nyid dang gzhan gyi chos nyid de /
translated: The example, the property of the similar instance, and the property of the dissimilar instance,

original: chos mi mthun pa nyid gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa nyid gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The dissimilar property itself is the reason.

original: dpe brjod kyis ston te /
analyzed: dpe brjod kyis ston te /
translated: An example is given:

original: sgra rtag ste mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgra rtag ste mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Sound is permanent, because it is audible.

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni mi mthun pa'i zla bo'i gtan tshigs gzhan dang bcas pa /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni mi mthun pa'i zla bo'i gtan tshigs gzhan dang bcas pa /
translated: Audibility is a reason that has another dissimilar property.

original: rigs pa can pas brjod pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba gang gi'ang nang du 'du ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs pa can pas brjod pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba gang gi'ang nang du 'du ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not included in any of the fallacious reasons stated by the NaiyƒÅyikas.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not a fallacious reason,

original: the tshom gyi rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cause of doubt.

original: dpe sgra nyid dang yang mtshungs pa'i chos yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: dpe sgra nyid dang yang mtshungs pa'i chos yin pa nyid de /
translated: It is a property of the example itself, sound.

original: des na gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is a reason.

original: gzhan gyi chos nyid yang na ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi chos nyid yang na ste /
translated: Or, it is the property of another,

original: 'di kho na la bum pa la sogs pa chos mi mthun pas so //
analyzed: 'di kho na la bum pa la sogs pa chos mi mthun pas so //
translated: because the pot, etc., are dissimilar properties in this very case.

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni /
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni /
translated: Arising immediately after effort

original: gzhan gyi chos nyid kho na ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi chos nyid kho na ste /
translated: is the property of another alone,

original: glog la sogs pa chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis te /
analyzed: glog la sogs pa chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis te /
translated: because lightning, etc., are dissimilar properties.

original: sgra rtag ste rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: sgra rtag ste rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Sound is permanent because it arises immediately after effort.

original: mi rtag pa glog la sogs pa ni rtsol ma thag tu byung pa ma yin pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa glog la sogs pa ni rtsol ma thag tu byung pa ma yin pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The impermanent, such as lightning, does not arise immediately after effort.

original: 'di yang nge bzhin du chos mi mthun pa nyid las zhes pa mtshan nyid gnyis pa la ltos nas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang nge bzhin du chos mi mthun pa nyid las zhes pa mtshan nyid gnyis pa la ltos nas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is also like the dissimilar example, which was explained in terms of the second characteristic.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod /
translated: This is possible.

original: 'di yang ji skad bshad pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'du ba kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'di yang ji skad bshad pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'du ba kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But this is included only among the fallacies of reason as explained.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This is not included among the fallacies of reason as explained.

original: 'khrul pa dang bcas pa dang 'gal ba dang skabs dang mtshungs pa dang / bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pa dang dus las 'das pa rnams ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o zhes yongs su ba grangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'khrul pa dang bcas pa dang 'gal ba dang skabs dang mtshungs pa dang / bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pa dang dus las 'das pa rnams ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o zhes yongs su ba grangs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the fallacies of reason are enumerated as: having error, contradiction, irrelevance, and similarity to the probandum, and being untimely.

original: 'di ni ji skad bshad @190b pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang pa'i nang du 'du ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni ji skad bshad @190b pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang pa'i nang du 'du ba ma yin no //
translated: This is not included among the fallacies of reason as explained.

original: 'gal ba yang der rnam pa gzhan kho nar brjod de /
analyzed: 'gal ba yang der rnam pa gzhan kho nar brjod de /
translated: Contradiction is also stated in that way, but in a different way.

original: grub mtha' dang khas blangs dang 'gal ba ni 'gal ba'o zhes so //
analyzed: grub mtha' dang khas blangs dang 'gal ba ni 'gal ba'o zhes so //
translated: Contradiction is contradiction with tenets and assertions.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni khyad par mad pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni khyad par mad pa ste /
translated: Therefore, this is not a distinction,

original: mi 'dod pa thams cad las rnam par mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa thams cad las rnam par mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not eliminate all that is not wanted.

original: gzhan rnams ni zhes pa la sogs pa yan lag ston pa thams cad ni bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni zhes pa la sogs pa yan lag ston pa thams cad ni bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: With respect to ‚Äúthe others,‚Äù etc., all the statements of the branches are proofs of the probandum.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa gtan tshigs so zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa gtan tshigs so zhes brjod pa na /
translated: Therefore, when it is said that the reason is the proof of the probandum,

original: 'dir gtan tshigs yin zhes mi shes pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir gtan tshigs yin zhes mi shes pa de'i phyir /
translated: one does not know what the reason is here. Therefore,

original: sems khyad par du byed de /
analyzed: sems khyad par du byed de /
translated: the mind is distinguished,

original: chos mthun nyid ston pas so /
analyzed: chos mthun nyid ston pas so /
translated: because it teaches the similarity of attributes.

original: de ni mdo'i snga ma'i cha nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de ni mdo'i snga ma'i cha nyid kyi phyir /
translated: That is because of the former part of the s≈´tra.

original: snga ma ste de khyad par dang / bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa khyad par can zhes pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma ste de khyad par dang / bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa khyad par can zhes pa'o //
translated: The former is the reason, and the probandum is the distinguished probandum.

original: 'di brjod par 'gyur zhes pas /
analyzed: 'di brjod par 'gyur zhes pas /
translated: With ‚Äúthis is said,‚Äù

original: khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po 'dod pa de ston to //üîΩdper brjod dang chos mthun ba las gang ston pa yin pa'i bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa de ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po 'dod pa de ston to // dper brjod dang chos mthun ba las gang ston pa yin pa'i bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa de ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: It shows the thing that is qualified and the thing that qualifies it.üîΩThe reason is that which proves the probandum by showing the example and the similarity.

original: gang zhig bsgrub bya dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa nges par ston pa de dpe'o //
analyzed: gang zhig bsgrub bya dang chos mthun pa nyid las bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa nges par ston pa de dpe'o //
translated: The example is that which shows the proof of the probandum by means of the similarity with the probandum.

original: gang dper brjod la ltos par bya ba de lta bu 'am de lta bu ma yin no zhes pa mjug sdud do //
analyzed: gang dper brjod la ltos par bya ba de lta bu 'am de lta bu ma yin no zhes pa mjug sdud do //
translated: The conclusion is that which refers to the example and says ‚Äúit is like that‚Äù or ‚Äúit is not like that.‚Äù

original: bsgrub bya la nye bar gtod pa zhes pa la sogs pa thams cad brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya la nye bar gtod pa zhes pa la sogs pa thams cad brjod par bya'o //
translated: All of these should be stated, beginning with ‚Äúthe application to the probandum.‚Äù

original: de rnams kyi yang drug par rigs pa'i ngo bo zhes pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyi yang drug par rigs pa'i ngo bo zhes pa /
translated: The nature of the sixth is reasonable.

original: lnga pas ston pa skabs su byas pa nyid la ni gzhan mi srid do zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: lnga pas ston pa skabs su byas pa nyid la ni gzhan mi srid do zhes bshad zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that the fifth is the one that is made the topic, and that another is not possible.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las ldog pa la yang zhes pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las ldog pa la yang zhes pa /
translated: The opposite of the fallacious reason is also.

original: der snang ma gtogs mtshungs pa dang // gzhan gyi chos nyid gtan tshigs 'gyur //
analyzed: der snang ma gtogs mtshungs pa dang // gzhan gyi chos nyid gtan tshigs 'gyur //
translated: It is not the same as that appearance,üîΩBut the nature of the other.üîΩ

original: zhes gang bshad pa'i skyon de phyogs 'di la yang g-yo ba med pa kho na'o zhes sten to //üîΩde ldan pa'i chos kyi gtan tshigs so zhes pa de 'di la yod do zhes pa de dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gang bshad pa'i skyon de phyogs 'di la yang g-yo ba med pa kho na'o zhes sten to // de ldan pa'i chos kyi gtan tshigs so zhes pa de 'di la yod do zhes pa de dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The fault that was explained there is also unshaken in this position.üîΩThe reason is the property of that which possesses it.

original: de dang ldan pa'i chos ni de ldan chos so //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i chos ni de ldan chos so //
translated: The reason is the property of that which possesses it.üîΩThe reason is the property of that which possesses it.

original: 'brel pa can nyid tsam gyi gtan tshigs nyid la thal bar 'gyur na de gcad pa'i ched du gsungs pa /üîΩbrjod pa zhes 'jug go zhes pa /
analyzed: 'brel pa can nyid tsam gyi gtan tshigs nyid la thal bar 'gyur na de gcad pa'i ched du gsungs pa / brjod pa zhes 'jug go zhes pa /
translated: If it follows that mere relatedness is a reason, in order to eliminate that, it is said:üîΩThe statement is the engagement.

original: bsgrub bya brjod pa dam bca'o zhes pa'i dkyus ma'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya brjod pa dam bca'o zhes pa'i dkyus ma'o //
translated: The statement of the probandum is the thesis.

original: des na ngag gi don 'di yin te /
analyzed: des na ngag gi don 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the statement is this:

original: de ldan pa'i chos brjod pa gtan tshigs so zhes pa'o //üîΩgal te bsgrub bya @191a * //
analyzed: de ldan pa'i chos brjod pa gtan tshigs so zhes pa'o // gal te bsgrub bya @191a * //
translated: The statement of the property of that which possesses it is the reason.

original: brjod pa 'brel par byed na zhes pa de gtso bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod pa 'brel par byed na zhes pa de gtso bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: If the statement of the probandum is the connection, then that is the principal one.

original: des kyang bsgrub bya kho na de dang ldan pas zhes pa /
analyzed: des kyang bsgrub bya kho na de dang ldan pas zhes pa /
translated: And that which is to be established is only that which possesses it,

original: 'brel pa can gyi sgra nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi sgra nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because it is a term that is related to it.

original: brjod pa'i brjod par bya ba kho na des de dang ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: brjod pa'i brjod par bya ba kho na des de dang ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: The expressed object of the expression is only that which possesses it.

original: de ltar ni bu dang ldan ba zhes brjod pa na pha kho na de dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar ni bu dang ldan ba zhes brjod pa na pha kho na de dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, when one says ‚Äúhe who possesses a son,‚Äù only the father possesses him.

original: nam mkha' yang des de dang ldan par 'gyur pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: nam mkha' yang des de dang ldan par 'gyur pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt space also that which possesses it?

original: de ni de dang 'phrod pa 'du ba can nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ni de dang 'phrod pa 'du ba can nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is the receptacle of it.

original: bden te de lta na yang bstan bcos kyis nam mkha'i chos 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa rnams kyang tshig gi rgyu nyid du nye bar blangs pa'i phyir nam mkha'i yang bsgrub pa byas pa kho na'o zhes sems so //
analyzed: bden te de lta na yang bstan bcos kyis nam mkha'i chos 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa rnams kyang tshig gi rgyu nyid du nye bar blangs pa'i phyir nam mkha'i yang bsgrub pa byas pa kho na'o zhes sems so //
translated: That is true, but even so, since the treatise takes the qualities of space, such as being the effect of the result, as the reason for the expression, it is only that which is to be established in regard to space.

original: tshogs pa la chos gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: tshogs pa la chos gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: There is no other property in the collection.

original: tshogs pa'i ni bsdus pa tsam yin zhing /
analyzed: tshogs pa'i ni bsdus pa tsam yin zhing /
translated: The collection is merely a combination of them.

original: blos kun rtogs pa kho na ste //
analyzed: blos kun rtogs pa kho na ste //
translated: The cognition is only the cognition of the collection.

original: khang bzangs kyi phreng ba bzhin no //
analyzed: khang bzangs kyi phreng ba bzhin no //
translated: Like a row of houses.

original: de tshogs pa can las tha dad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tshogs pa can las tha dad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not different from the collection.

original: ci'i phyir byas pa nyid la sogs pa chos yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir byas pa nyid la sogs pa chos yin zhe na /
translated: Why are such properties as being produced properties of the collection?

original: tshogs pa can kho na'i chos gang yin pa de ni de'i phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir de'i zhes tha snyad du bya bar nus te /
analyzed: tshogs pa can kho na'i chos gang yin pa de ni de'i phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir de'i zhes tha snyad du bya bar nus te /
translated: Because whatever property belongs to the collection alone is a part of it, so it can be conventionally designated as ‚Äúits.‚Äù

original: dper na khang pa'i mdzod mig lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na khang pa'i mdzod mig lta bu'o //
translated: For example, like the eye of a house.

original: de'i phyir tshogs pa can kho na gtan tshigs su 'thob cing /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshogs pa can kho na gtan tshigs su 'thob cing /
translated: Therefore, the collection alone is established as the reason.

original: de yang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid kyi phyir ma grub bo //
analyzed: de yang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid kyi phyir ma grub bo //
translated: And that is not established because it is a part of the meaning of the thesis.

original: 'o na tshogs pa ni chos gzhan med cing /
analyzed: 'o na tshogs pa ni chos gzhan med cing /
translated: Well, the collection is not a different property,

original: de'i phyogs gcig pa chos can sgra la sogs pa'i ni byas pa nyid la sogs pa chos srid de /
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig pa chos can sgra la sogs pa'i ni byas pa nyid la sogs pa chos srid de /
translated: and it is possible that such properties as being produced are the property of the subject, sound, etc., which is a part of it.

original: de las kyang de kho na brjod pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de las kyang de kho na brjod pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: And from that, it would be a reason that expresses only that.

original: rva can yin pa de'i phyir rta'o zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rva can yin pa de'i phyir rta'o zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúBecause it has horns, it is a horse,‚Äù etc.

original: gang snang du rung ba'i rva can gyi gong bu 'di rta yin te /üîΩrva can nyid kyi phyir zhes 'dir bsgrub bya'i chos rta nyid kyis khyad par du byas pa'i gong bu chos can gyi chos rva can nyid yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: gang snang du rung ba'i rva can gyi gong bu 'di rta yin te / rva can nyid kyi phyir zhes 'dir bsgrub bya'i chos rta nyid kyis khyad par du byas pa'i gong bu chos can gyi chos rva can nyid yin no zhes pa /
translated: This horn-possessor, which is suitable to appear as a horse, is a horse.üîΩHere, the property of the subject, horn-possessor, is the property of the thesis, horse, qualified by the property, horn-possessor.

original: rang gi bstan bcos su brjod pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ni gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi bstan bcos su brjod pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ni gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The apparent reason, ‚Äúbecause of having horns,‚Äù is a reason.

original: de la la byas pa nyid la sogs pa srid pa ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: de la la byas pa nyid la sogs pa srid pa ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: In that regard, it is not possible that ‚Äúbeing a product‚Äù and so on are properties of the subject.

original: chos rnams ni chos can gyi gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: chos rnams ni chos can gyi gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyi phyir /
translated: This is because the properties are dependent on the subject.

original: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos la byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos rnams 'chad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos la byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos rnams 'chad pa ma yin no //
translated: The properties of impermanence and so on are not explained as properties of the subject, ‚Äúbeing a product‚Äù and so on.

original: de ni grub pa nyid kyi phyir @191b ro zhes pa /
analyzed: de ni grub pa nyid kyi phyir @191b ro zhes pa /
translated: That is established.

original: grub pa ni bsgrub bya nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa ni bsgrub bya nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not tenable that what is established is the thesis.

original: mtshan nyid yul med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid yul med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The definition would be without an object.

original: chos la yang skyon 'di mtshungs so zhes pas de la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: chos la yang skyon 'di mtshungs so zhes pas de la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same fault applies to the property.

original: mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o zhes na zhes pa /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o zhes na zhes pa /
translated: The response to that is: ‚ÄúIt should be established as impermanent.‚Äù

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyad par du byas pa bsgrub bya nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyad par du byas pa bsgrub bya nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the property to be established is qualified by impermanence.

original: rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because it has the effect of exclusion.

original: sgra'i sgra ni gnas skabs thams cad kyi sgra yongs su bzung nas 'jug cing /
analyzed: sgra'i sgra ni gnas skabs thams cad kyi sgra yongs su bzung nas 'jug cing /
translated: The word ‚Äúsound‚Äù occurs by taking up the sound of all the states.

original: de bzhin du mi rtag pa'i sgra ni sgra la sogs pa mi rtag pa'i dngos po thams cad nye bar bzung nas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi rtag pa'i sgra ni sgra la sogs pa mi rtag pa'i dngos po thams cad nye bar bzung nas so //
translated: And similarly, the word ‚Äúimpermanent‚Äù occurs by taking up all the impermanent things such as sound.

original: de dag phan tshun du rnam par gcod de /
analyzed: de dag phan tshun du rnam par gcod de /
translated: They exclude each other.

original: mi rtag pa'i sgras sgra'i gnas skabs gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i phyir dang / sgra'i sgras kyang mi rtag pa nyid kyi rten gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i sgras sgra'i gnas skabs gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i phyir dang / sgra'i sgras kyang mi rtag pa nyid kyi rten gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the word ‚Äúimpermanent‚Äù excludes the other states of sound, and the word ‚Äúsound‚Äù also excludes the other bases of impermanence.

original: de'i phyir yang phan tshun rnam par gcod pas bsres par gyur pa'i phyir tshogs pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang phan tshun rnam par gcod pas bsres par gyur pa'i phyir tshogs pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because of mutual exclusion, the collection itself would be the probandum.

original: yon tan du gyur pa yang zhes pa brjod pa'i khyad par nyid yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba ni yon tan du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan du gyur pa yang zhes pa brjod pa'i khyad par nyid yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba ni yon tan du gyur pa'o //
translated: And the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is a specification of the statement, so the probandum is only the property.

original: de lta na yang brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang las nus pa yod na sgra rnams brjod par 'dod pa rjes su sgrub par byed ces pas /
analyzed: de lta na yang brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang las nus pa yod na sgra rnams brjod par 'dod pa rjes su sgrub par byed ces pas /
translated: However, if there is the capacity, then, due to the power of the desire to express, the words accomplish the desire to express.

original: de'i sgras bsgrub par bya ba kho na la snyegs par byed do //
analyzed: de'i sgras bsgrub par bya ba kho na la snyegs par byed do //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is applied to the probandum.

original: tshogs pa'am chos can gyis gzhan de dang ldan pa med do zhes pa chos can dang tshogs pa dag rang dbang can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa'am chos can gyis gzhan de dang ldan pa med do zhes pa chos can dang tshogs pa dag rang dbang can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The property possessor and the collection are not independent.

original: 'o na tshogs pa can las de dang ldan pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na tshogs pa can las de dang ldan pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the property possessor the collection?

original: des na 'di lta bu ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'di lta bu ci yin zhe na /
translated: So what is this?

original: 'di 'di ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'di ltar ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: 'dir chos ni tshogs pas de dang ldan par 'gyur ra ma /
analyzed: 'dir chos ni tshogs pas de dang ldan par 'gyur ra ma /
translated: Here, the property is the collection, and it is endowed with that.

original: yang na chos can yin /
analyzed: yang na chos can yin /
translated: Or, it is the property-possessor.

original: gal te chos mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te chos mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa yin na /
translated: If the property is impermanence, etc.,

original: gang brjod pa gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba de'i chos med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gang brjod pa gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba de'i chos med pa kho na'o //
translated: then the property of that which is expressed as the reason is nonexistent.

original: ci ste chos can yin na /
analyzed: ci ste chos can yin na /
translated: But if it is the property-possessor,

original: de la chos can tsam bsgrub bya yin pa la gang skyon yin pa de 'thob pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de la chos can tsam bsgrub bya yin pa la gang skyon yin pa de 'thob pa kho na'o //
translated: then the mere property-possessor is the object to be established, and whatever fault there is, that is obtained.

original: de'i phyir tshogs pa'am chos can gyis gzhan de dang ldan pa med do zhes pa 'di la ji skad bshad pa'i skyon mi 'jug ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshogs pa'am chos can gyis gzhan de dang ldan pa med do zhes pa 'di la ji skad bshad pa'i skyon mi 'jug ste /
translated: Therefore, the collection or the property-possessor does not have another property. This is not subject to the fault explained above.

original: de med do zhes dgongs pa'o zhes pas skyon med do //
analyzed: de med do zhes dgongs pa'o zhes pas skyon med do //
translated: The meaning is that it does not exist. Thus there is no fault.

original: khyad par bsgrub bya dang ldan chos //
analyzed: khyad par bsgrub bya dang ldan chos //
translated: The property endowed with the object to be established

original: 'thob ste zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'thob ste zhes pa ste /
translated: is obtained.

original: bsgrub bya dang ldan pa kho na'i zhes nges pa gzung ba las zhes pa'i @192a * //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang ldan pa kho na'i zhes nges pa gzung ba las zhes pa'i @192a * //
translated: From the restriction that it is only endowed with the object to be established,

original: dgongs pa gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: dgongs pa gsal bar byed do //
translated: the intention is clarified.

original: rgyu ci'i phyir na 'di ltar nges par gzung zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: rgyu ci'i phyir na 'di ltar nges par gzung zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it that it is restricted in this way?

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNo,‚Äù etc.

original: chos can la thal bar mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: chos can la thal bar mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause there is no entailment in regard to the subject.‚Äù

original: bsgrub bya dang ldan pa'i chos can la chos can srid pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang ldan pa'i chos can la chos can srid pa ni ma yin te /
translated: In regard to the subject that possesses the probandum, the subject is not possible,

original: de ni rang dbang can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang dbang can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is independent.

original: nye ba nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: nye ba nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of proximity.‚Äù

original: gzhan dang 'phrod pa 'dus pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir de nye ba nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan dang 'phrod pa 'dus pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir de nye ba nyid do //
translated: Because it is not combined with another, it is proximate.

original: smad pa'i don can no //
analyzed: smad pa'i don can no //

original: 'o na phyogs chos med pa bzlog pa'i don du de'i chos kyi tshig ma yin nam /

analyzed: de ltar yang de dang ldan pa kho na'i zhes nges par gzung ba med pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa gtan tshigs su thal bar 'gyur ba med do zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar sems te /

analyzed: phyogs chos med pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: de bzlog pa'i ched du 'bad pa don med pa ste /

analyzed: de la gal te bsgrub par byang kho na'i chos zhes nges par gzung na /

original: zhes pa 'dis so //

original: gal te'i sgras dam bca' gzhan te /
analyzed: gal te'i sgras dam bca' gzhan te /
translated: the word if is another thesis.

original: de yang gang gcig ma yin pa de snyed kyi phyogs 'god par byed do //
analyzed: de yang gang gcig ma yin pa de snyed kyi phyogs 'god par byed do //
translated: and that is not one, but as many as there are positions.

original: de ltar ni gtso bo yod do zhes brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar ni gtso bo yod do zhes brjod nas /
translated: Thus, having stated that the primal substance exists,

original: gang las gtan tshigs kyi yul 'dri ba kun nas slong bar byed de /
analyzed: gang las gtan tshigs kyi yul 'dri ba kun nas slong bar byed de /
translated: one is asked to state the reason for that,

original: de'i phyir gtso bo yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtso bo yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: and therefore one should understand that the existence of the primal substance is what is to be established.

original: nye bar gtod pa'i sbyor ba ni khyad par rnams kho na la gtso bo yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: nye bar gtod pa'i sbyor ba ni khyad par rnams kho na la gtso bo yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes rtogs par bya ste /
translated: The application of the demonstration should be understood to be the establishment of the existence of the primal substance in the particulars alone.

original: de lta ni bshad pa /
analyzed: de lta ni bshad pa /
translated: Thus, it is said:

original: nang gi bdag nyid dang phyi rol gyi khyad par rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba 'di ni yod de /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid dang phyi rol gyi khyad par rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba 'di ni yod de /
translated: ‚ÄúThe internal and external particulars have a single type that is common to all.

original: des na 'di rnams sngar tha dad pa las 'ga' zhig tu spyir gyur par sems so zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: des na 'di rnams sngar tha dad pa las 'ga' zhig tu spyir gyur par sems so zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, we think that these, previously different, have become a universal in some way.‚Äù

original: de ltar rnam par rtog pa gnyis srid de /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par rtog pa gnyis srid de /
translated: Thus, two types of conceptualization are possible.

original: gal te gtso bo yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin na de yang dag pa ma yin te mi rigs so //
analyzed: gal te gtso bo yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin na de yang dag pa ma yin te mi rigs so //
translated: If the existence of the primal substance is to be established, that is not correct.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gsungs pa / tshad ma'i yul mi shes pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: gsungs pa / tshad ma'i yul mi shes pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúBecause the object of valid cognition is not known.‚Äù

original: tshad ma'i sgras 'dir rjes su dpag pa brjod par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ma'i sgras 'dir rjes su dpag pa brjod par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Here, by the word ‚Äúvalid cognition,‚Äù inference is intended.

original: de'i yul spyi ste /
analyzed: de'i yul spyi ste /
translated: Its object is the universal.

original: de mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is not known.

original: spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin pa zhes pa rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can no //üîΩbstan zin to zhes pa rlung gi rab @194a * //
analyzed: spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin pa zhes pa rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can no // bstan zin to zhes pa rlung gi rab @194a * //
translated: ‚ÄúNot having the characteristic of a universal‚Äù means having the characteristic of an individual.

original: tu byed par rtogs par byas zin pa'o //üîΩbsgrub bya'i chos kyang sgrub par byed //
analyzed: tu byed par rtogs par byas zin pa'o // bsgrub bya'i chos kyang sgrub par byed //
translated: ‚ÄúAlready explained‚Äù means that the function of wind has already been understood.

original: ces pa la sogs pas gang bsgrub bya'i chos su mi 'gyur ba de sgrub byed du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pas gang bsgrub bya'i chos su mi 'gyur ba de sgrub byed du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe property to be established is also the proof‚Äù means that whatever is not the property to be established is not the proof.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag par bsgrub par bya ba la me sreg par byed pa nyid bzhin /
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag par bsgrub par bya ba la me sreg par byed pa nyid bzhin /
translated: For example, in the proof that sound is impermanent, fire is not a proof.

original: gtso bo yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la khyad par rnams la rjes su 'gro ba yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes khyad par byed pa med pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gtso bo yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la khyad par rnams la rjes su 'gro ba yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes khyad par byed pa med pa gsungs so //
translated: In the proof of the existence of the principal, the particulars are not the probandum, which is the pervasion. Thus, he states that there is no distinction.

original: rgyas pa'i tshig min gtan tshigs su rigs pa zhes pa ngag gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa'i tshig min gtan tshigs su rigs pa zhes pa ngag gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúit is not an extended expression‚Äù is the reason. The word ‚Äúproper‚Äù is the remainder of the sentence.

original: gtso bo yod de khyad par rnams la rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtso bo yod de khyad par rnams la rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The principal exists because the particulars are seen to pervade it.

original: nang gi bdag nyid kyi khyad par 'bras bu dang rgyur gyur pa rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro bar mthong ste /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid kyi khyad par 'bras bu dang rgyur gyur pa rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro bar mthong ste /
translated: The particulars that are internal are seen to pervade the same type of result and cause.

original: ji srid du sgra dang reg pa dang / gzugs dang ro dang dri ste lnga po rnams ni /
analyzed: ji srid du sgra dang reg pa dang / gzugs dang ro dang dri ste lnga po rnams ni /
translated: As long as the five‚Äîsound, touch, form, taste, and smell‚Äî

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang rmongs pa rnams te gsum po rnams kyi bkod pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang rmongs pa rnams te gsum po rnams kyi bkod pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: are the particulars of the arrangement of the three‚Äîpleasure, pain, and delusion.

original: ci'i phyir lnga po rnams kyi zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir lnga po rnams kyi zhe na /
translated: Why are there five?

original: lnga po rnams la 'bras bu gcig yod pa'i phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas pa'i tshig ni gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lnga po rnams la 'bras bu gcig yod pa'i phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas pa'i tshig ni gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The extensive words are not a reason.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgrub byed bsdus pa'i tshig gi phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: sgrub byed bsdus pa'i tshig gi phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because it is a summary of the proof.

original: sgrub byed bsdus pa'i tshigs gtan tshigs so zhes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub byed bsdus pa'i tshigs gtan tshigs so zhes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a summary of the proof, it is a reason.

original: 'o na khyad par rnams la rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa 'di tsam kho na'i ngag ni 'dir gtan tshigs ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na khyad par rnams la rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa 'di tsam kho na'i ngag ni 'dir gtan tshigs ma yin nam /
translated: Well then, isn't just this much statement, Because the pervasion of the particulars is seen, a reason here?

original: 'di yang bsdus pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'di yang bsdus pa kho na ste /
translated: This is also a summary.

original: yang 'dir gzhung lhag ma ni gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa ston pa'i ched du dang / ma grub pa nyid yongs su spang ba'i ched du bkod pa'o zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang 'dir gzhung lhag ma ni gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa ston pa'i ched du dang / ma grub pa nyid yongs su spang ba'i ched du bkod pa'o zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Here, the remaining text is set forth for the purpose of teaching the pervasion of the reason and for the purpose of completely abandoning nonestablishment.

original: de yang ma brjod do zhes pa /
analyzed: de yang ma brjod do zhes pa /
translated: That also is not stated.

original: sgrub byed bsdus pa'i tshig gtan tshigs so zhes brjod kyi sgrub byed ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub byed bsdus pa'i tshig gtan tshigs so zhes brjod kyi sgrub byed ni ma yin te /
translated: The words that are a summary of the proof are a reason, but the proof is not.

original: de ma brjod na de'i tshigs kyang gtan tshigs nyid du rtogs par bya'o zhes pas 'di ni ma brjod pa dang mtshungs pa kho na'o zhes sems so //
analyzed: de ma brjod na de'i tshigs kyang gtan tshigs nyid du rtogs par bya'o zhes pas 'di ni ma brjod pa dang mtshungs pa kho na'o zhes sems so //
translated: If that is not stated, then its words should be understood as the reason itself. Thus, it is thought that this is exactly the same as not being stated.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi sgrub byed kyi tshigs las khyad par rtogs par bya'o zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi sgrub byed kyi tshigs las khyad par rtogs par bya'o zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If it is said that it is like that, but the distinction should be understood from the words of the proof, it is said:

original: thams cad kho na ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kho na ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: All of it is... and so forth.

original: yang na 'dir 'gyur mod /
analyzed: yang na 'dir 'gyur mod /
translated: Or, it is like this:

original: 'dir gang yan lag sgrub par byed pa ni de'i brjod par bya ba'i don sgrub byed nyid du rnam par rig par byed @194b pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir gang yan lag sgrub par byed pa ni de'i brjod par bya ba'i don sgrub byed nyid du rnam par rig par byed @194b pa ste /
translated: Here, that which is the proof of the part is cognized as the proof of the meaning to be expressed by it.

original: ngag gi sgrub par byed pa nyid ni don gyi sgo can yin gyi /
analyzed: ngag gi sgrub par byed pa nyid ni don gyi sgo can yin gyi /
translated: The proof of speech is based on the meaning,

original: rang nyid las ni ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: rang nyid las ni ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: but not from itself. It is said:

original: thams cad kho na ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kho na ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: All of it is... and so forth.

original: 'o na lhag ma dang ldan pa 'di ni dbang po las 'das pa'i dngos po rnams rtogs par byed pa la gtan tshigs so zhes pas de kho na sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na lhag ma dang ldan pa 'di ni dbang po las 'das pa'i dngos po rnams rtogs par byed pa la gtan tshigs so zhes pas de kho na sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: Now, this ‚Äúpossessing a remainder‚Äù is a reason for realizing things that are beyond the senses.

original: de'i tshig ni gtan tshigs so zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshig ni gtan tshigs so zhe na /
translated: The words of that are a reason.

original: 'di ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di ni mi rigs te /
translated: This is not correct.

original: yan lag thams cad tshogs pa ni lhag ma dang ldan pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad tshogs pa ni lhag ma dang ldan pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the collection of all the parts is itself possessing a remainder.

original: dpe yang zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: dpe yang zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: An example is also not possible.

original: de nges par ston pa dpe zhes pa 'di la yang na gzhi bsgrub pa la brten par bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nges par ston pa dpe zhes pa 'di la yang na gzhi bsgrub pa la brten par bya ba ste /
translated: In this, ‚Äúan example‚Äù is that which is to be relied upon in establishing a basis.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa de dag gang du nges par bstan par bya ba zhes pa'am /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa de dag gang du nges par bstan par bya ba zhes pa'am /
translated: It is that in which the probandum and the proof are to be ascertained and shown.

original: yang na byed pa ste /üîΩde dag 'dis nges par ston pa'o zhes pa yin /
analyzed: yang na byed pa ste / de dag 'dis nges par ston pa'o zhes pa yin /
translated: Or, it is an agent.üîΩThis shows them.

original: de la brtag pa dang po la mngon par 'dod pa'i mtshon bya la ma khyab pa'i phyir mtshan nyid ma khyab pa nyid du ston par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la brtag pa dang po la mngon par 'dod pa'i mtshon bya la ma khyab pa'i phyir mtshan nyid ma khyab pa nyid du ston par gsungs pa /
translated: In the first analysis, it is said that the definition is not applicable because the illustration of the desired object is not pervaded.

original: gal te gang du zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te gang du zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúWhere?‚Äù

original: yod na yang zhes pa /
analyzed: yod na yang zhes pa /
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúIt exists,‚Äù

original: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed rjes su 'gro ba khas blangs nas dpe'i skyon gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed rjes su 'gro ba khas blangs nas dpe'i skyon gzhan gsungs pa /
translated: having accepted the pervasion of the probandum by the proof, another fault of the example is stated:

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because there is no pervasion.

original: bsgrub par bya bas sgrub par byed pa la khyab pa nye bar ston pa ni rjes su 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya bas sgrub par byed pa la khyab pa nye bar ston pa ni rjes su 'gro ba ste /
translated: Pervasion is the demonstration of the pervasion of the proof by the probandum.

original: 'dir ni sgrub par byed pas bsgrub par bya ba la khyab par brjod de /
analyzed: 'dir ni sgrub par byed pas bsgrub par bya ba la khyab par brjod de /
translated: Here, the pervasion of the probandum by the proof is stated.

original: 'jig rten na spyi sngon ma can gyi khyad par rnams la /
analyzed: 'jig rten na spyi sngon ma can gyi khyad par rnams la /
translated: In the world, universals that precede particulars

original: rigs gcig yang dag par rjes su 'gro ba mthong zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rigs gcig yang dag par rjes su 'gro ba mthong zhes pa'o //
translated: are seen to be pervaded by the same type.

original: 'di lta bu ni sgrub par byed pa'i don 'ga' yang ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: 'di lta bu ni sgrub par byed pa'i don 'ga' yang ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: This is not the case for any of the meanings of the proof.

original: dpe ltar snang ba nyid kyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: dpe ltar snang ba nyid kyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: This is a reason that is merely an apparent example.

original: rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log pas ni sgrub par byed pa la phan 'dogs pa 'ga' yang 'byung ba med de /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log pas ni sgrub par byed pa la phan 'dogs pa 'ga' yang 'byung ba med de /
translated: Because of the pervasion being reversed, there is no benefit at all to the proof.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid mi ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid mi ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not show the necessary relation of invariable concomitance.

original: ngag gi yan lag nyams pa'o zhes pa /
analyzed: ngag gi yan lag nyams pa'o zhes pa /
translated: The defect of the parts of speech is as follows.

original: ngag gi bdag nyid rnam par ldan pa'i don yan lag yin par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ngag gi bdag nyid rnam par ldan pa'i don yan lag yin par rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable that the meaning of the parts of speech, which is the nature of speech, is the meaning of the whole,

original: 'jug pa tha dad pa rnams lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa med ba'i phyir zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'jug pa tha dad pa rnams lhan cig brjod par 'dod pa med ba'i phyir zhes bshad zin to //
translated: because it has been explained that there is no desire to express together those that are different in application.

original: rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa la skyon nyid rtogs par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa la skyon nyid rtogs par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to understand the very fault in the second conception, it is said:

original: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: If it is said, But it is the meaning of the parts of speech, etc.

original: brjod par bya ba kho na la de ma yin zhes pa ni /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba kho na la de ma yin zhes pa ni /
translated: The expression only in the object of expression means that

original: de ltar gyur pa'i don la med pa na /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i don la med pa na /
translated: when it does not exist in the object that is so,

original: @195a * // ngag kyang de'i don rtogs par byed pa'i 'bras bu can ma yin no //
analyzed: @195a * // ngag kyang de'i don rtogs par byed pa'i 'bras bu can ma yin no //
translated: speech also does not have the effect of making that object known.

original: gsungs ba / ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs ba / ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said: No, etc.

original: nye bar sbyar mi rigs zhes pa bsgrub bya dang dpe dag gcig tu bya ba zhes pa nye bar sbyar ba'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: nye bar sbyar mi rigs zhes pa bsgrub bya dang dpe dag gcig tu bya ba zhes pa nye bar sbyar ba'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: The expression it is not reasonable to apply is the characteristic of application, which is the identity of the probandum and the example.

original: de dag gi dpe nyid la 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag gi dpe nyid la 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: The example itself is not tenable.

original: dper na dum zhogs dang thod pa dang snod spyad dang rgyan la sogs pa zhes pa'i ngag 'di lta bu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na dum zhogs dang thod pa dang snod spyad dang rgyan la sogs pa zhes pa'i ngag 'di lta bu ni ma yin no //
translated: For example, it is not like the statement ‚Äúa pot, a skull, a dish, an ornament, etc.‚Äù

original: de ltar gtso bo la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar gtso bo la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: Thus the primary nature, etc., are the probandum.

original: de ltar yan lag gi mtshan nyid ni dngos su gtso bo yod pa nyid ces pa gtso bo yod do zhes par ma chad par gtso bo bsgrub par bya ba la ni dpe dang nye bar bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad du 'brel pa ma yin
analyzed: de ltar yan lag gi mtshan nyid ni dngos su gtso bo yod pa nyid ces pa gtso bo yod do zhes par ma chad par gtso bo bsgrub par bya ba la ni dpe dang nye bar bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad du 'brel pa ma yin
translated: Thus the definition of a part is as follows: In the direct proof of the existence of the primary nature, the definition of an example and the definition of an application are not related in any way to the probandum, the primary nature.

original: no // de ltar ni bsgrub bya nges par 'dzin pa dam bca'o zhes pa dam bca'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: no // de ltar ni bsgrub bya nges par 'dzin pa dam bca'o zhes pa dam bca'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: The definition of a thesis is ‚Äúthat which ascertains the probandum.‚Äù

original: gtso bo zla bo'i ngo bo bsgrub par bya bar brtags pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gtso bo zla bo'i ngo bo bsgrub par bya bar brtags pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is the existence of the primary nature imagined to be the probandum.

original: de ston pa dpe'o zhes pa dpe'i mtshan nyid yin zhing /
