analyzed: de ston pa dpe'o zhes pa dpe'i mtshan nyid yin zhing /
translated: The definition of an example is ‚Äúthat which shows that.‚Äù

original: de dag gcig tu bya ba zhes pa nye bar sbyar ba'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: de dag gcig tu bya ba zhes pa nye bar sbyar ba'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: The definition of an application is ‚Äúthat which unifies those two.‚Äù

original: de gnyis ka yang 'dir yod pa ma yin no zhes rtogs par byas zin to //
analyzed: de gnyis ka yang 'dir yod pa ma yin no zhes rtogs par byas zin to //
translated: Both of these are not present here.

original: 'o na rigs pa'i sgor 'di sgrub byed du nye bar sgrub pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na rigs pa'i sgor 'di sgrub byed du nye bar sgrub pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt this [argument] presented as a proof in the Entrance to Logic?

original: de ci ltar snga ma'i skyon 'byung zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci ltar snga ma'i skyon 'byung zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How can the fault of the previous [argument] arise? It is said:

original: rigs pa'i sgo'i phyogs kyis ni zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rigs pa'i sgo'i phyogs kyis ni zhes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBy the side of logic‚Äù [means]

original: des ni gtso bo don gyis sgrub kyi dngos su ma yin te /
analyzed: des ni gtso bo don gyis sgrub kyi dngos su ma yin te /
translated: that it proves the primary object indirectly, not directly.

original: dngos su ni khyad par rnams kho na bsgrub bya'o //
analyzed: dngos su ni khyad par rnams kho na bsgrub bya'o //
translated: In fact, only the distinctions are to be proven.

original: khyad par rnams kho na der rgyu gcig pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir phyogs so zhes pa'i tshig las so //
analyzed: khyad par rnams kho na der rgyu gcig pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir phyogs so zhes pa'i tshig las so //
translated: Only the distinctions are the thesis, because they are to be proven as having a single cause there. This is understood from the word ‚Äúside.‚Äù

original: de rnams bsgrub par bya ba nyid na ji skad bshad pa'i yan lag gi sbyor ba 'brel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de rnams bsgrub par bya ba nyid na ji skad bshad pa'i yan lag gi sbyor ba 'brel bar 'gyur te /
translated: When they are to be proven, the application of the explained parts will be connected.

original: 'brel pa tsam du 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa tsam du 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: It will be merely connected.

original: tsam gyi sgra ni yan lag skyon med pa nyid rnam par gcod pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: tsam gyi sgra ni yan lag skyon med pa nyid rnam par gcod pa'i don du'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúmerely‚Äù is for the purpose of excluding the faultlessness of the parts.

original: dam bca'i don dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhes pas khas blangs dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
analyzed: dam bca'i don dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhes pas khas blangs dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
translated: This is saying that it contradicts the meaning of the thesis.

original: dam bca'i don dang 'gal ba gang yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: dam bca'i don dang 'gal ba gang yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is it that contradicts the meaning of the thesis?

original: khyad par rnams rgyu gcig pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par rnams rgyu gcig pa zhes pa'o //
translated: It is the one cause of the differences.

original: ci ltar na dam bcas pa'i skyon yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar na dam bcas pa'i skyon yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it a fault of the thesis? It is said:

original: dum bu la sogs pa rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dum bu la sogs pa rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The parts and so on.

original: gang de dum zhogs dang thod pa dang snod spyad dang rgyan la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par nyid du gyur na /
analyzed: gang de dum zhogs dang thod pa dang snod spyad dang rgyan la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par nyid du gyur na /
translated: If the differences of the parts, the pieces, the skull, the dishes, the ornaments and so on,

original: shing dang bum @195b pa dang / sa'i gong bu dang gser la sogs pa rgyu du ma sngon ma can nyid du khas blangs so //
analyzed: shing dang bum @195b pa dang / sa'i gong bu dang gser la sogs pa rgyu du ma sngon ma can nyid du khas blangs so //
translated: are accepted as having a single cause, then the tree, the pot, the lump of earth, the gold and so on, which have many causes, are also accepted as having a single cause.

original: des rgyu gcig sngon ma can nyid sel ba'i phyir dam bca' ba'i don dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: des rgyu gcig sngon ma can nyid sel ba'i phyir dam bca' ba'i don dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: Since that eliminates the single cause, it contradicts the meaning of the thesis.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod nang gi bdag nyid kyi khyad par rnams kho na rgyu gcig sngon ma can nyid du khas blang bar bya'i /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod nang gi bdag nyid kyi khyad par rnams kho na rgyu gcig sngon ma can nyid du khas blang bar bya'i /
translated: It is true that it would be like that, but the differences of the internal nature should be accepted as having a single cause.

original: phyi rol gyi rnam pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rnam pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not external aspects.

original: des na 'di skyon ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na 'di skyon ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, this is not a fault.

original: khas mi len na yang dpe med pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: khas mi len na yang dpe med pa zhes pa ste /
translated: If you do not accept, there is no example.

original: rgyu gcig pa nyid med pa'i phyir na bsgrub bya dang bral ba'i phyir dpe ltar snang ba'o zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: rgyu gcig pa nyid med pa'i phyir na bsgrub bya dang bral ba'i phyir dpe ltar snang ba'o zhes byas nas so //
translated: Since there is no single cause, the example is fallacious because it lacks the probandum.

original: yang na 'dir khyad par thams cad phyogs su byas pa rnams te /
analyzed: yang na 'dir khyad par thams cad phyogs su byas pa rnams te /
translated: Moreover, here all the distinctions are made in terms of the position.

original: de la dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par yod pa la shing la sogs pa rgyu du ma khas blangs pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i don dang 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: de la dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par yod pa la shing la sogs pa rgyu du ma khas blangs pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i don dang 'gal ba ste /
translated: There, since the distinctions of the parts of a chariot and so on exist, the many causes such as the wood and so on are accepted. Therefore it contradicts the meaning of the thesis.

original: rgyu gcig pa nyid sel ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu gcig pa nyid sel ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it refutes the single cause.

original: khas mi len na yang zhes pa gal te dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams kyang gtso bo gcig gi rgyu can nyid kyi phyir shing la sogs pa'i rgyu can du khas blangs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: khas mi len na yang zhes pa gal te dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams kyang gtso bo gcig gi rgyu can nyid kyi phyir shing la sogs pa'i rgyu can du khas blangs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you do not accept, there is no example. If you say that the parts of a chariot and so on are not accepted as having wood and so on as their cause because they are the cause of a single principal entity,

original: de ltar gyur na dpe med pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na dpe med pa ste /
translated: then in that case there is no example.

original: du ma zhogs la sogs rnams kyi rgyu gcig pa nyid ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du ma zhogs la sogs rnams kyi rgyu gcig pa nyid ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause of many things such as shoots is not established as one.

original: ci yod pa sngon ma can nyid du zhes pa /
analyzed: ci yod pa sngon ma can nyid du zhes pa /
translated: What is the point of saying ‚Äúthat which exists has a prior cause‚Äù?

original: gtso bo yod do zhes pa'i dam bca' las dang de'i phyir gtso bo yod do zhes pa'i mjug sdud las /
analyzed: gtso bo yod do zhes pa'i dam bca' las dang de'i phyir gtso bo yod do zhes pa'i mjug sdud las /
translated: The thesis ‚Äúprimal substance exists‚Äù is stated, and the conclusion ‚Äútherefore primal substance exists‚Äù is drawn.

original: yod pa sngon ma can kho nar khyad par rnams bsgrub par bya zhing /
analyzed: yod pa sngon ma can kho nar khyad par rnams bsgrub par bya zhing /
translated: The point is to prove that all things have a prior cause,

original: dpe med pa ma yin te dum bu la sogs pa rnams yod pa sngon ma can nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: dpe med pa ma yin te dum bu la sogs pa rnams yod pa sngon ma can nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: and it is not the case that there is no example, because it is understood that things such as potsherds have a prior cause.üîΩThis is not so.

original: ma yin te gcig nyid la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma yin te gcig nyid la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The point of saying ‚Äúeven in the case of singularity‚Äù is as follows.

original: gcig nyid bsgrub par bya ba la yang gtso bo'i 'di kho na sgrub byed du ston te /
analyzed: gcig nyid bsgrub par bya ba la yang gtso bo'i 'di kho na sgrub byed du ston te /
translated: Even in the proof of singularity, it is shown that this is the only proof of primal substance.

original: 'di skad du rnam par ldan pa lnga po 'di rnams las gtso bo'i yod pa nyid du grub cing /
analyzed: 'di skad du rnam par ldan pa lnga po 'di rnams las gtso bo'i yod pa nyid du grub cing /
translated: This is because it is said that ‚Äúfrom among these five properties, the existence of primal substance is established,

original: 'di'i gcig nyid kyang 'di kho na las grub po zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di'i gcig nyid kyang 'di kho na las grub po zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and its singularity is also established by this alone.‚Äù

original: rtsod pa med phyir yang zhes pas grub pa bsgrub bya nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: rtsod pa med phyir yang zhes pas grub pa bsgrub bya nyid gsungs so //
translated: The word also indicates that the established is the probandum.

original: ci ltar na rtsod pa med ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar na rtsod pa med ce na gsungs pa /
translated: How is there no dispute? He says:

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Not so, etc.

original: gzhan rnams ni zhes pa /
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni zhes pa /
translated: The others, etc.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i skyon yongs su spang pa'i ched du phyogs gzhan la brten te /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i skyon yongs su spang pa'i ched du phyogs gzhan la brten te /
translated: For the sake of avoiding the previously mentioned faults, one should rely on another position.

original: bde ba la sogs pa rnams kyi rigs rjes su 'gro bas khyad par rnams gtso bo de'i rigs @196a * //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa rnams kyi rigs rjes su 'gro bas khyad par rnams gtso bo de'i rigs @196a * //
translated: The particulars are of the type of that principal, because they are pervaded by the type of pleasure, etc.

original: can nyid du ste /
analyzed: can nyid du ste /
translated: They are of the type of that principal,

original: bde ba la sogs pa las byung ba nyid du bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes te /üîΩji ltar du ma bu la sogs pa rnams la tsandan la sogs pa'i rigs rjes su 'gro ba yod na /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa las byung ba nyid du bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes te / ji ltar du ma bu la sogs pa rnams la tsandan la sogs pa'i rigs rjes su 'gro ba yod na /
translated: which is to be established as the origin of pleasure, etc.üîΩJust as sandalwood, etc. are of the type of sandalwood, etc., because they are pervaded by the type of sandalwood, etc.,

original: de'i rgyu can rnams tsandan la sogs pa'i rigs can nyid yin pa de ltar khyad par rnams la bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs rjes su 'gro ba na /
analyzed: de'i rgyu can rnams tsandan la sogs pa'i rigs can nyid yin pa de ltar khyad par rnams la bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs rjes su 'gro ba na /
translated: in the same way, the particulars, being pervaded by the type of pleasure, etc.,

original: de'i rgyu can bde ba la sogs pa las byung ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu can bde ba la sogs pa las byung ba'o zhes pa'o //
translated: are of the type of pleasure, etc., which is the origin of pleasure, etc.

original: de ltar ni gang gang gi rang bzhin rnams kyis brtsams pa de ni de'i rang bzhin kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar ni gang gang gi rang bzhin rnams kyis brtsams pa de ni de'i rang bzhin kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, whatever is produced by the nature of something, that is just the nature of that.

original: shes pa'i bstan bcos ni 'bras bu dang rgyu dag rang bzhin gcig nyid du rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa'i bstan bcos ni 'bras bu dang rgyu dag rang bzhin gcig nyid du rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The treatise on knowledge is for the purpose of understanding that effect and cause are of the same nature.

original: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: gang zhig gang gi rigs dang ldan pa de ni de'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu can yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi rigs dang ldan pa de ni de'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu can yin te /
translated: Whatever possesses the nature of something is caused by that nature.

original: dum bu la sogs pa bzhin /
analyzed: dum bu la sogs pa bzhin /
translated: Like a piece of pottery and so on.

original: khyad par rnams kyang bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa yin no zhes pa 'bras bu'i gzugs brnyan no //
analyzed: khyad par rnams kyang bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa yin no zhes pa 'bras bu'i gzugs brnyan no //
translated: The distinctions also possess the nature of pleasure and so on. This is the reflection of the effect.

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: But that is not so,

original: rigs du ma'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro zhes pa mig dang rna ba dang gzugs dang sgra nang gi bdag nyid la sogs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i khyad par rnams kyang yod do //
analyzed: rigs du ma'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro zhes pa mig dang rna ba dang gzugs dang sgra nang gi bdag nyid la sogs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i khyad par rnams kyang yod do //
translated: because it follows that there are many natures. The distinctions also possess the nature of eye, ear, form, sound, and so on.

original: de rnams kyi rgyu ni de'i rang bzhin ma yin no zhes pa des nges pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rgyu ni de'i rang bzhin ma yin no zhes pa des nges pa'o //
translated: Their cause is not of that nature. This is the ascertainment.

original: thams cad la rjes su 'gro par bsgrub par bya'o zhe na zhes pa /
analyzed: thams cad la rjes su 'gro par bsgrub par bya'o zhe na zhes pa /
translated: If you say that it should be established that it is the cause of everything,

original: sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu skyed pa mthong ba'i phyir gtso bo ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid nyid du 'dod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu skyed pa mthong ba'i phyir gtso bo ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid nyid du 'dod pa kho na'o //
translated: then, because the effect of the nature of diversity is seen, it is only asserted that the primal matter is the nature of everything.

original: de'i phyir 'dir bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs can tsam bsgrub par bya ba ma yin gyi 'on kyang ji snyed cig rigs dang ldan pa'i khyad par rnams yin pa de snyed pa'i rigs can nyid du bsgrub par bya'o zhes pas ma nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs can tsam bsgrub par bya ba ma yin gyi 'on kyang ji snyed cig rigs dang ldan pa'i khyad par rnams yin pa de snyed pa'i rigs can nyid du bsgrub par bya'o zhes pas ma nges pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, here it is not indeterminate to say that it is not to be established that it is the cause of pleasure and so on, but rather that it is to be established that it is the cause of whatever is endowed with the particularities of the type.

original: ma yin te dpe med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: ma yin te dpe med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: No, because there is no example.

original: thams cad kyi rigs dang ldan pa'i khyad par gyi rgyu bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: thams cad kyi rigs dang ldan pa'i khyad par gyi rgyu bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: If it is to be established that it is the cause of everything endowed with the type,

original: dum bu la sogs pa rnams bsgrub bya dang bral ba nyid de zhes pas dpe med pa'o //
analyzed: dum bu la sogs pa rnams bsgrub bya dang bral ba nyid de zhes pas dpe med pa'o //
translated: then pieces and so on are devoid of the property to be proven, and therefore there is no example.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod /
translated: This is true.

original: gang zhig gang rjes su song ba de ni de'i rigs can gyi rgyu can yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang rjes su song ba de ni de'i rigs can gyi rgyu can yin te /
translated: Whatever follows from something is a cause that has the nature of that.

original: dum bu la sogs pa bzhin zhes spyir rjes su 'gro ba ston pa na dum bu la sogs pa dper rigs pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: dum bu la sogs pa bzhin zhes spyir rjes su 'gro ba ston pa na dum bu la sogs pa dper rigs pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: If it is said that when generally teaching the relation of following, only the example of a piece is correct,

original: gsungs pa / rags pa dang mi rtag pa dang 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir yang zhes pa /
analyzed: gsungs pa / rags pa dang mi rtag pa dang 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir yang zhes pa /
translated: it is said: ‚ÄúBecause of following grossness, impermanence, being an effect, and so on,

original: rags pa dang @196b mi rtag pa dang 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba khyad par rnams la dmigs so zhes pas de'i bdag nyid du yang gtso bo bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rags pa dang @196b mi rtag pa dang 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba khyad par rnams la dmigs so zhes pas de'i bdag nyid du yang gtso bo bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the particulars that are observed are following grossness, impermanence, being an effect, and so on. Therefore, the primary nature is also established as their nature.‚Äù

original: sogs pa smos pa las gsal pa nyid dang mngon sum nyid la sogs pa rnams yongs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pa las gsal pa nyid dang mngon sum nyid la sogs pa rnams yongs su gzung ngo //
translated: Because of the mention of ‚Äúand so on,‚Äù clarity, being a direct perception, and so on are included.

original: de rnams de'i rnam par yang 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de rnams de'i rnam par yang 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: Those are not tenable as its aspects.

original: rnam par ldan pa gzhan rnams la yang ma 'brel ba'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: rnam par ldan pa gzhan rnams la yang ma 'brel ba'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because they are not related to other possessing aspects.

original: rnam par ldan pa gzhan rnams la ste tshad dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs nyid dang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po dang nus pas 'jug pa'i bdag nyid rnams la'o //
analyzed: rnam par ldan pa gzhan rnams la ste tshad dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs nyid dang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po dang nus pas 'jug pa'i bdag nyid rnams la'o //
translated: The other attributes are: measure, variety of forms, the state of being an effect, the state of being a cause, and the nature of engaging through potentiality.

original: gang khyad par gyi chos gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar blangs pa de rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang khyad par gyi chos gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar blangs pa de rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the attribute which is taken as the reason is not suitable as the principal concomitance.

original: gtso bo la bcu drug la sogs pa'i tshad 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gtso bo la bcu drug la sogs pa'i tshad 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: The measure of sixteen, etc., is not tenable in the principal,

original: gcig nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because singularity is accepted.

original: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there a variety of forms,

original: de gzugs med pa nyid kyi phyir dang gcig nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de gzugs med pa nyid kyi phyir dang gcig nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is formless and singular.

original: 'bras bu nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it an effect,

original: rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is a cause.

original: nus pa'i 'jug pa yang ma yin te thog ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa'i 'jug pa yang ma yin te thog ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is there engagement through potentiality, because it is beginningless.

original: de'i phyir rnam par ldan pa gzhan phyi ma rnams la bsgrub bya mi rigs pa'i phyir 'di bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par ldan pa gzhan phyi ma rnams la bsgrub bya mi rigs pa'i phyir 'di bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is not possible to establish the latter as possessing the former, this is not to be established.

original: gang las tha dad du nye bar len pa 'di dag gi gzhung tha dad pa ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang las tha dad du nye bar len pa 'di dag gi gzhung tha dad pa ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: From what is this distinction of the appropriators established?

original: bstan bcos can dang bstan bcos can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos can dang bstan bcos can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of being a treatise and not being a treatise.

original: rags pa la sogs pa rnams ni bstan bcos can ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rags pa la sogs pa rnams ni bstan bcos can ma yin pa'o //
translated: The gross, etc., are not treatises.

original: tshad la sogs pa rnams ni bstan bcos can nyid kyi phyir tha dad du nye bar blangs pa'o //
analyzed: tshad la sogs pa rnams ni bstan bcos can nyid kyi phyir tha dad du nye bar blangs pa'o //
translated: The measure, etc., are treatises, and therefore are distinguished as appropriators.

original: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because there is no single type of universal.

original: bde ba la sogs pa rnams sems pa can nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa rnams sems pa can nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because pleasure, etc., are sentient,

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi rjes su 'gro ba khyad par thams cad la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi rjes su 'gro ba khyad par thams cad la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the universal that has the characteristic of being their nature does not exist in all particulars.

original: 'o na sgra dang reg bya dang gzugs dang ro dang dri ste lnga po rnams ni bde pa dang sdug bsngal dang rmongs pa ste gsum po rnams kyi bkod pa'i khyad par te /
analyzed: 'o na sgra dang reg bya dang gzugs dang ro dang dri ste lnga po rnams ni bde pa dang sdug bsngal dang rmongs pa ste gsum po rnams kyi bkod pa'i khyad par te /
translated: Well, the five objects of sound, tactility, form, taste, and smell are the particular arrangements of the three: pleasure, pain, and delusion.

original: ci las lnga rnams dang lnga po rnams la 'bras bu gcig pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i bstan bcos las gtan tshigs su yang dag par bzhag pa kho na ni ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: ci las lnga rnams dang lnga po rnams la 'bras bu gcig pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i bstan bcos las gtan tshigs su yang dag par bzhag pa kho na ni ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: Since the five objects are not the same effect, the reason stated in the treatise is not established.

original: de ltar ni 'dis gang 'bras bu gcig pa de ni @197a * //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'dis gang 'bras bu gcig pa de ni @197a * //
translated: This is because whatever is the same effect

original: rigs gcig rjes su song ba can yin te /
analyzed: rigs gcig rjes su song ba can yin te /
translated: is of the same type,

original: dum bu la sogs pa bzhin sgra la sogs pa rnams kyang de lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa bsal bar byas so //
analyzed: dum bu la sogs pa bzhin sgra la sogs pa rnams kyang de lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa bsal bar byas so //
translated: like a piece of cloth, and sound and so on are like that. This proof is refuted.

original: de'i phyir ma grub pa nyid med do zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir ma grub pa nyid med do zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that it is not established.üîΩTo explain this, it is said:

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu gcig pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu gcig pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Since they are not the same effect,

original: de rnams kyi sgra la sogs pa 'bras bu tha mi dad pa'o zhes pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyi sgra la sogs pa 'bras bu tha mi dad pa'o zhes pa /
translated: their sound and so on are not the same effect.

original: snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa rnams phan tshun phan 'dogs pa'i dngos bor 'jug pa rnams ni sgra la sogs pa'i bdag nyid du rnam par gzhag go zhes pas /
analyzed: snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa rnams phan tshun phan 'dogs pa'i dngos bor 'jug pa rnams ni sgra la sogs pa'i bdag nyid du rnam par gzhag go zhes pas /
translated: The three qualities of sattva, rajas, and tamas, which are engaged in mutually assisting each other, are posited as having the nature of sound, etc.

original: sgra la sogs pa 'bras bu gcig par brjod do //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa 'bras bu gcig par brjod do //
translated: Thus sound, etc. are said to be a single effect.

original: snying stobs la sogs pa rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: snying stobs la sogs pa rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Sattva, etc. do not have a single type that is common to all.

original: shin tu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are very different.

original: 'jig rten na yang mig dang gzugs dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba med na yang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'bras bu gcig yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten na yang mig dang gzugs dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba med na yang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'bras bu gcig yin te /
translated: In the world, even though eye, form, light, mental activity, etc. do not have a single type that is common to all, they are a single effect, such as consciousness, etc.

original: de'i phyir yang ma nges pa'i phyir na rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang ma nges pa'i phyir na rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba ma grub pa'o //
translated: Therefore, because this is uncertain, a single type that is common to all is not established.

original: nye bar len pa las de rtogs so zhes pa rgyu ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa las de rtogs so zhes pa rgyu ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The effect is understood from the appropriated. The cause is twofold:

original: nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa ma yin pas so //
translated: appropriated and non-appropriated.

original: de la nye bar len pa ni gang thun mong ma yin pa ste /üîΩgang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa dper na /
analyzed: de la nye bar len pa ni gang thun mong ma yin pa ste / gang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa dper na /
translated: The appropriator is that which is not common to all.

original: myu gu'i sa bon dang bum pa'i sa'i rdzas lta bu'o //
analyzed: myu gu'i sa bon dang bum pa'i sa'i rdzas lta bu'o //
translated: That which is the basis of the result is, for example, the seed of the sprout and the clay of the pot.

original: cig shos phan 'dogs par byed pa ni nye bar lan pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: cig shos phan 'dogs par byed pa ni nye bar lan pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: The other, which is the helper, is not the appropriator.

original: dper na myu gu'i chu la sogs pa dang / bum pa'i dbyug pa dang skud pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //üîΩgang gang gis nye bar len pa yin pa de ni 'bras bu'i chos dang 'brel gyi /
analyzed: dper na myu gu'i chu la sogs pa dang / bum pa'i dbyug pa dang skud pa la sogs pa lta bu'o // gang gang gis nye bar len pa yin pa de ni 'bras bu'i chos dang 'brel gyi /
translated: For example, water, etc. are for the sprout, and the stick, thread, etc. are for the pot.

original: cig shos ma yin te /
analyzed: cig shos ma yin te /
translated: That which is the appropriator is related to the result, but not the other.üîΩFor example, the nature of clay, etc. is the property of the pot, but not the property of the thread, etc.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.

original: dper na sa'i rang bzhin nyid la sogs pa bum pa'i chos dang sa'i gong bu yin gyi /üîΩskud pa la sogs pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sa'i rang bzhin nyid la sogs pa bum pa'i chos dang sa'i gong bu yin gyi / skud pa la sogs pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: The cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.

original: gang gi byed pa kho na yang rab tu dang ba la sogs pa rnams kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: gang gi byed pa kho na yang rab tu dang ba la sogs pa rnams kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: The cause of the appropriator is the cause of the result.üîΩThe cause of the appropriator is the

original: de ltar ni de rnams mtsho 'khyil ba las chu'i rlabs bzhin du de las yongs su 'jug pas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni de rnams mtsho 'khyil ba las chu'i rlabs bzhin du de las yongs su 'jug pas so //
translated: In this way, they are completely engaged in that, like waves in the ocean.

original: de'i phyir de kho na rab tu dang ba la sogs pa'i chos bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid dang 'brel bar rigs kyi sgra la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na rab tu dang ba la sogs pa'i chos bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid dang 'brel bar rigs kyi sgra la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that the qualities of faith, etc., are connected to the nature of pleasure, etc., and not to sound, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that?üîΩIt is said: ‚ÄúMay it not be so,‚Äù etc.

original: ma gyur cig ces pa la sogs pa ste yang ci ltar na @197b skyes bu na yang yon tan gsum rjes su dpog par thal bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ma gyur cig ces pa la sogs pa ste yang ci ltar na @197b skyes bu na yang yon tan gsum rjes su dpog par thal bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, how is it that the three qualities are inferred in a person? It is said:

original: de'i rnam par shes pa yang zhes pa la sogs ba ste /
analyzed: de'i rnam par shes pa yang zhes pa la sogs ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúHis consciousness,‚Äù etc.

original: skyes bu ni skyes bu'i de nyid rigs pa the tshom dang phyin ci log la sogs pa rnams kyi yang nang gi byed pa yin na /
analyzed: skyes bu ni skyes bu'i de nyid rigs pa the tshom dang phyin ci log la sogs pa rnams kyi yang nang gi byed pa yin na /
translated: If a person is the inner agent of the truth of the person, of reasoning, of doubt, and of error, etc.,

original: rab tu dang ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyur gyur pa yin yang /
analyzed: rab tu dang ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyur gyur pa yin yang /
translated: he is the cause of the result of faith, etc.

original: rab tu dang ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i nye bar len pa ma yin pa'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs rjes su 'gro bar 'dod pa ni ma yin te /üîΩde bzhin du sgra la sogs pa rnams kyang nye bar len pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab tu dang ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i nye bar len pa ma yin pa'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs rjes su 'gro bar 'dod pa ni ma yin te / de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa rnams kyang nye bar len pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are not the appropriated effects of faith, etc., they are not asserted to be the same type as pleasure, etc.

original: bde ba la sogs ba'i rigs dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs ba'i rigs dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, sound, etc., should be understood to be not the same type as pleasure, etc., because they are not appropriated.

original: khas mi len na yang skyes bu yang bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa 'thob bo //
analyzed: khas mi len na yang skyes bu yang bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa 'thob bo //
translated: Even if one does not accept that, one should still accept that a person is not the same type as pleasure, etc.

original: de 'dis ni sgra la sogs pa rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro bar bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: de 'dis ni sgra la sogs pa rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro bar bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: Here, in order to prove that sound, etc., are not the same type,

original: 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs ni /
translated: the reason of having the same effect

original: skyes bus ma nges par bstan to //
analyzed: skyes bus ma nges par bstan to //
translated: is shown to be inconclusive with respect to a person.

original: ci ste yang zhes pa la sogs pas gang brjod zin pa nye bar len la /
analyzed: ci ste yang zhes pa la sogs pas gang brjod zin pa nye bar len la /
translated: If one says that the reason is not established,

original: de rtogs so zhes pa de'i rjes su yi rang bar byed do //
analyzed: de rtogs so zhes pa de'i rjes su yi rang bar byed do //
translated: then one should accept that which has already been stated.

original: phyi rol lo na'i sgra la sogs pa'i rgyu la rab tu dang ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod de /üîΩnang gi byed pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol lo na'i sgra la sogs pa'i rgyu la rab tu dang ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod de / nang gi byed pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: The result, such as clarity, is desired in the cause, such as the external sound of a drum, but not in the internal agent.üîΩFor example, the quality of heat of fire is clear in water or the body, and in the same way, the result of sound is clear only in the mind.

original: de ni dper na me'i yon tan dro ba nyid ni chu'am lus la gsal ba de ltar sgra la son pa kho na'i 'bras bu yid la gsal lo zhes pa sgra la sogs pa rnams kyi nye bar len pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: de ni dper na me'i yon tan dro ba nyid ni chu'am lus la gsal ba de ltar sgra la son pa kho na'i 'bras bu yid la gsal lo zhes pa sgra la sogs pa rnams kyi nye bar len pa nyid yod do //
translated: Thus, the appropriator of sound and so on exists.

original: de ltar rab tu dang ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa nyid kyi rgyu gzhan ni nye bar len pa yin pa'i phyir skyes bus ma nges pa med do //
analyzed: de ltar rab tu dang ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa nyid kyi rgyu gzhan ni nye bar len pa yin pa'i phyir skyes bus ma nges pa med do //
translated: Since clarity and so on are the cause of appropriation, there is no uncertainty by a person.

original: 'di rab tu dang ba la sogs ba'i nye bar len pa ni ma yin zhes sems pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rab tu dang ba la sogs ba'i nye bar len pa ni ma yin zhes sems pa'o //
translated: The thought is that this is not the appropriation of clarity and so on.

original: gal te tha mi dad par zhes pa /
analyzed: gal te tha mi dad par zhes pa /
translated: If it is not different,üîΩif the ear engages with sound and apprehends it, then the body also engages with sound and apprehends it.

original: gang kho na la sgra la rna ba'i 'jug pas 'dzin pa de kho na gal te reg pa la sogs pa rnams la yang pags pa la sogs pa'i 'jug pa rnams kyis yin na /
analyzed: gang kho na la sgra la rna ba'i 'jug pas 'dzin pa de kho na gal te reg pa la sogs pa rnams la yang pags pa la sogs pa'i 'jug pa rnams kyis yin na /
translated: If the body engages with sound and apprehends it, then the body also engages with touch and apprehends it.

original: de las rang gi yul las 'jug pa nyams te /
analyzed: de las rang gi yul las 'jug pa nyams te /
translated: Then, the engagement of the ear and so on would be impaired,

original: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa lnga po rnams kyi yang /
analyzed: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa lnga po rnams kyi yang /
translated: and the five engagements of the ear and so on would also be impaired.

original: rab tu dang ba la sogs pa 'bras bu gcig gi yul can nyid kyi phyir zhes pa khas blangs pa nyams so //
analyzed: rab tu dang ba la sogs pa 'bras bu gcig gi yul can nyid kyi phyir zhes pa khas blangs pa nyams so //
translated: Because they would have the same object as the result of clarity and so on.

original: ci ste tha dad na zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: ci ste tha dad na zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: If they are different, then the ear and so on would not engage sound and so on.

original: gang sgra la rna ba'i 'jug pas gzung zhing /üîΩde las gzhan pa kho na reg pa la @198a * //
analyzed: gang sgra la rna ba'i 'jug pas gzung zhing / de las gzhan pa kho na reg pa la @198a * //
translated: If sound is apprehended by the engagement of the ear,

original: sogs pa rnams la pags pa la sogs pa'i 'jug pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: sogs pa rnams la pags pa la sogs pa'i 'jug pa rnams kyis so //
translated: and the engagement of the body apprehends only touch and so on,üîΩthen the engagement of the body would not apprehend sound and so on.

original: de ltar gyur na gcig gi rigs can du rjes su dpag pa la gnod de /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na gcig gi rigs can du rjes su dpag pa la gnod de /
translated: If that were so, it would contradict the inference that they are of the same type,

original: 'bras bu gcig pa nyid ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig pa nyid ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the result of being the same would not be established.

original: gang gi phyir de rnams ngo bo tha dad pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de rnams ngo bo tha dad pa kho na ste /
translated: Because they are definitely different in nature,

original: sgra la sogs pa bzhin dbang po tha dad pa'i gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa bzhin dbang po tha dad pa'i gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: like sound and so on, because they are objects apprehended by different sense faculties.

original: sgra tha mi dad kyi brjod par bya ba yod na yang ngo //
analyzed: sgra tha mi dad kyi brjod par bya ba yod na yang ngo //
translated: Even if the object of expression is not different from sound and so on,

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: it would be like that.

original: sgra la sogs pa rnams rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pas gzung bya rnams te /
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa rnams rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pas gzung bya rnams te /
translated: Sound and so on are objects of engagement of the ear and so on.

original: rna ba dang pags pa dang mig dang lce dang sna rnams kyi 'jug pa yid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa sgra dang rig pa dang gzugs dang ro dang dri rnams rim pa ji lta bar 'dzin pa la 'jug pa la ni mngon sum mo zhes pa'i bstan bcos
analyzed: rna ba dang pags pa dang mig dang lce dang sna rnams kyi 'jug pa yid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa sgra dang rig pa dang gzugs dang ro dang dri rnams rim pa ji lta bar 'dzin pa la 'jug pa la ni mngon sum mo zhes pa'i bstan bcos
translated: The treatise Attainment of Knowledge says, ‚ÄúThe engagement of the ear, skin, eye, tongue, and nose, empowered by the mental faculty, is the engagement in the apprehension of sound, touch, form, taste, and smell, respectively. That is direct perception.‚Äù

original: las te / des na rab tu dang ba la sogs pa tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i rnam par dpyod pa 'di mi rigs pa kho na'o zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: las te / des na rab tu dang ba la sogs pa tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i rnam par dpyod pa 'di mi rigs pa kho na'o zhen gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore this analysis of whether clear form and so on are the same or different is completely illogical.

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: To respond:

original: gang zhig gang tshogs pa la gdags par bya ba de ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang tshogs pa la gdags par bya ba de ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin te /
translated: That which is imputed in dependence on a collection is not the effect of that collection.

original: dper na sa'i rnam pa la sogs pa bzhin /
analyzed: dper na sa'i rnam pa la sogs pa bzhin /
translated: For example, the four such as earth.

original: sgra la sogs pa yang rab tu dang ba la sogs pa tshogs pa la gdags par bya ba'i zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa yang rab tu dang ba la sogs pa tshogs pa la gdags par bya ba'i zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: Sound and so on are imputed in dependence on a collection of clear form and so on. This is a reason that contradicts the entailment.

original: rnam pa la sogs pa rnams ni rnam pa dang lci ba nyid dang rtsub pa nyid dang / sgrib byed dang / brtan pa nyid dang / gtan pa nyid dang / gnas pa dang / 'byed pa dang bzod pa dang nag pa nyid dang lus dang thams cad spyad par bya ba nyid ces pa 'di rnams ni sa las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: rnam pa la sogs pa rnams ni rnam pa dang lci ba nyid dang rtsub pa nyid dang / sgrib byed dang / brtan pa nyid dang / gtan pa nyid dang / gnas pa dang / 'byed pa dang bzod pa dang nag pa nyid dang lus dang thams cad spyad par bya ba nyid ces pa 'di rnams ni sa las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
translated: The aspects and so on are the aspects, heaviness, roughness, obstruction, stability, constancy, location, division, endurance, darkness, body, and all-pervasiveness. These are the properties that arise from earth.

original: de'i khyad par can de lta bu gzhan rnams ni chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khyab byed rnams su de rnams rtogs par bya'o zhes pa 'di rnams rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i khyad par can de lta bu gzhan rnams ni chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khyab byed rnams su de rnams rtogs par bya'o zhes pa 'di rnams rig par bya'o //
translated: The other such specific properties should be understood as the pervading properties of water, fire, wind, and space.

original: de 'dis 'bras bu gcig pa nyid dang rab tu dang ba la sogs pa'i nye bar len pa nyid kyi ma grub pa nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: de 'dis 'bras bu gcig pa nyid dang rab tu dang ba la sogs pa'i nye bar len pa nyid kyi ma grub pa nyid gsungs so //
translated: He says that the non-establishment of the same effect and the appropriation of clarity and so on by this [inference] is not established.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa 'di las zhes pa /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa 'di las zhes pa /
translated: If this is an inference,

original: gang 'di 'bras bu gcig pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid nye bar bkod pa ni /
analyzed: gang 'di 'bras bu gcig pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid nye bar bkod pa ni /
translated: then this characteristic of a single effect that is adduced

original: rigs gcig kho nas zhes pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang gti mug gi bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rigs gcig kho nas zhes pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang gti mug gi bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy a single type‚Äù means by the nature of pleasure, pain, and delusion.

original: sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin 'gal lo zhes pa mtha' yas pa'i rigs la gnod do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin 'gal lo zhes pa mtha' yas pa'i rigs la gnod do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúContradictory‚Äù means that the infinite types are harmed.

original: mtha' yas pa'i rigs @198b rjes su 'gro ba ni sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: mtha' yas pa'i rigs @198b rjes su 'gro ba ni sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: The infinite types are the nature of the various.

original: de yang rigs gcig kho nas rjes su 'gro ba la srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang rigs gcig kho nas rjes su 'gro ba la srid pa ma yin no //
translated: And that is not possible by a single type.

original: ci ste nges par mi 'dzin na ste /
analyzed: ci ste nges par mi 'dzin na ste /
translated: If it is not ascertained,

original: gcig kho nas zhes par ro //
analyzed: gcig kho nas zhes par ro //
translated: then by a single type.

original: rjes su 'gro ba las sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par ldan pa gzhan med do //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba las sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par ldan pa gzhan med do //
translated: There is no other possessor of the various natures that follow from it.

original: de ltar gal te sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kho na zhes nges par mi 'dzin na sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid las rjes su 'gro ba rnam par ldan pa gzhan nyid du mi 'gyur ro //üîΩgnyi gar yang zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: de ltar gal te sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kho na zhes nges par mi 'dzin na sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid las rjes su 'gro ba rnam par ldan pa gzhan nyid du mi 'gyur ro //üîΩgnyi gar yang zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: Thus, if the various forms are not ascertained, then there is no other possessor of the various natures that follow from it.üîΩIf both are not ascertained, then there is no other possessor of the various natures that follow from it.

original: phan tshun du ldog pa dag tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phan tshun du ldog pa dag tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The two negations would be different from each other.

original: nges par ma bzung na yang ldog pa mi srid do //
analyzed: nges par ma bzung na yang ldog pa mi srid do //
translated: And if they are not apprehended, the negation is impossible.

original: de'i phyir don gyi go bas sam thos pas na /
analyzed: de'i phyir don gyi go bas sam thos pas na /
translated: Therefore, by understanding the meaning or by hearing it,

original: gnyig dag gis nye bar len pa las spyi dang khyad par dang ldan pa nyid kyi rnam par ldan pa gcig kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyig dag gis nye bar len pa las spyi dang khyad par dang ldan pa nyid kyi rnam par ldan pa gcig kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: both of them would have only one form endowed with the universal and the particular, due to the appropriation.

original: spyi ni rjes su 'gro ba dang khyad par ni sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: spyi ni rjes su 'gro ba dang khyad par ni sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: The universal is the common property, and the particular is the diverse nature.

original: de dag so sor rnam par ldan pa gzhan nyid mi 'grub bo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de dag so sor rnam par ldan pa gzhan nyid mi 'grub bo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The point is that their individual forms are not established as different.

original: gang gi phyir du ma sngon du 'gro ba can kho na zhes pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir du ma sngon du 'gro ba can kho na zhes pa /
translated: The phrase only having many as a prior condition means

original: mi mthun phyogs kho na la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba mthong zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs kho na la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba mthong zhes pa'i don to //
translated: that the common property is seen to follow only in the discordant class.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod dum bu la sogs pa shing la sogs pa'i rgyu gcig sngon ma can rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba mthong ste /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod dum bu la sogs pa shing la sogs pa'i rgyu gcig sngon ma can rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba mthong ste /
translated: This is so, because in the case of pieces of wood, etc., which have a single cause as a prior condition, the common property is seen to follow in the discordant class.

original: des na gang las 'gal ba nyid yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na gang las 'gal ba nyid yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: de la shing la sogs pa rnams la gcig nyid grub pa ni med cing /
analyzed: de la shing la sogs pa rnams la gcig nyid grub pa ni med cing /
translated: With respect to that, there is no establishment of oneness in trees, etc.

original: dum bu la sogs pa rnams de sngon ma can nyid kyang ma yin te zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dum bu la sogs pa rnams de sngon ma can nyid kyang ma yin te zhes pa'o //
translated: And the pieces, etc. are not preceded by that.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: shing la sogs pa nye bar len pa'i dngos po'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shing la sogs pa nye bar len pa'i dngos po'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the appropriated entity of trees, etc.

original: gang gi phyir dum bu la sogs pa rnams ni shing la sogs pa'i nye bar len pa can nyid nye bar gzung nas shing la sogs pa nye bar 'dogs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dum bu la sogs pa rnams ni shing la sogs pa'i nye bar len pa can nyid nye bar gzung nas shing la sogs pa nye bar 'dogs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the pieces, etc. are apprehended as the appropriator of trees, etc. and the designation of trees, etc. is made.

original: dha ba la sogs pa rnams nye bar gzung nas nags nye bar 'dogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dha ba la sogs pa rnams nye bar gzung nas nags nye bar 'dogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as the designation of a forest is made by apprehending dhava, etc.

original: de'i phyir shing la sogs pa rnams gcig nyid ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i phyir shing la sogs pa rnams gcig nyid ma yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, trees, etc. are not one.

original: dum bu la sogs pa rnams de sngon ma can nyid kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: dum bu la sogs pa rnams de sngon ma can nyid kyang ma yin no //
translated: And the pieces, etc. are not preceded by that.

original: nags ni gcig nyid ma yin zhing //
analyzed: nags ni gcig nyid ma yin zhing //
translated: A forest is not one.

original: dha ba la sogs pa rnams de sngon ma can nyid du bsgrub par nus pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dha ba la sogs pa rnams de sngon ma can nyid du bsgrub par nus pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to prove that the dharmas such as sound, etc., are preceded by a single cause.

original: 'o na 'di ni mi 'grig ste //
analyzed: 'o na 'di ni mi 'grig ste //
translated: But this is not correct.

original: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro bas rgyu du ma sngon ma can nyid du 'byung bar bya'o zhes pa'i gegs med pa'i @199a * //
analyzed: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro bas rgyu du ma sngon ma can nyid du 'byung bar bya'o zhes pa'i gegs med pa'i @199a * //
translated: Because there is no obstacle to the arising of many causes preceded by a single cause, by the extension of a single type.

original: phyir / de dag las 'gal ba nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: phyir / de dag las 'gal ba nyid yin zhe na /
translated: If you say that they are contradictory,

original: ji ltar 'gal ba nyid yin pa de ltar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ji ltar 'gal ba nyid yin pa de ltar brjod par bya ste /
translated: then you must explain how they are contradictory.

original: gal te gtso bo du ma nyid du mi 'gyur zhing /üîΩde las gsal ba'i tha dad pa nyid kho nar mi 'gyur na phan tshun du tha dad pa chen po la sogs pa rnams kyi ni tha dad pa nyid du nye bar skye la /
analyzed: gal te gtso bo du ma nyid du mi 'gyur zhing / de las gsal ba'i tha dad pa nyid kho nar mi 'gyur na phan tshun du tha dad pa chen po la sogs pa rnams kyi ni tha dad pa nyid du nye bar skye la /
translated: If the primal substance were not many,üîΩand if the manifest were not different from it, then the difference of the great one, etc., from each other would not arise.

original: phan tshun tha dad pa yang gtso bo gcig nyid la srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad pa yang gtso bo gcig nyid la srid pa ma yin no //
translated: And the difference of the great one, etc., from each other is not possible in a single primal substance.

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu dag gcig nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu dag gcig nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because you accept that the effect and the cause are identical.

original: tha dad pa med na'ang ci zhig la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med na'ang ci zhig la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro //
translated: If there is no difference, then what is the extension of a single type?

original: de'i phyir rigs gcig rjes su 'gro bar 'dod pas de'i rgyu du ma nyid du khas blang bar bya'o zhes pas 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs gcig rjes su 'gro bar 'dod pas de'i rgyu du ma nyid du khas blang bar bya'o zhes pas 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because you assert that a single type of thing is a subsequent state, you must accept that it has many causes.

original: khas blangs nas kyang zhes pa gal te yang dum bu la sogs pa rnams gcig nyid kyi khyad par can dang shing la sogs pa snga ma can nyid yin pa de lta na yang gtan tshigs ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: khas blangs nas kyang zhes pa gal te yang dum bu la sogs pa rnams gcig nyid kyi khyad par can dang shing la sogs pa snga ma can nyid yin pa de lta na yang gtan tshigs ma nges pa ste /
translated: Having accepted that, if you say that the parts and so on are characterized by being one and that they are prior to the tree and so on, then the reason is not established.

original: gang gi phyir dum bu dang thod pa dang snod spyad dang rgyan la sogs pa bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs rjes su 'gro ba rnams /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dum bu dang thod pa dang snod spyad dang rgyan la sogs pa bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs rjes su 'gro ba rnams /
translated: Because the parts, the skull, the pot, the ornaments, and so on, which are characterized by being one, are subsequent states of the type of pleasure and so on.

original: shing dang bum pa dang sa'i gong bu dang gser la sogs pa'i rigs du ma'i rgyu sngon ma can rnams te /
analyzed: shing dang bum pa dang sa'i gong bu dang gser la sogs pa'i rigs du ma'i rgyu sngon ma can rnams te /
translated: The tree, the pot, the mound of earth, the gold, and so on, which are prior to the parts and so on, are the causes of many types of things.

original: snga mar ni shing la sogs pa rnams la ni so sor gcig nyid med pa'i phyir 'gal ba nyid du bshad cing /
analyzed: snga mar ni shing la sogs pa rnams la ni so sor gcig nyid med pa'i phyir 'gal ba nyid du bshad cing /
translated: Previously we explained that it is contradictory for the tree and so on to be one because they do not exist as one.

original: da lta ni khas blangs nas kyang gcig nyid mtha' dag gi du ma nyid kyi phyir ma nges pa nyid du brjod do zhes pa khyad par ro //
analyzed: da lta ni khas blangs nas kyang gcig nyid mtha' dag gi du ma nyid kyi phyir ma nges pa nyid du brjod do zhes pa khyad par ro //
translated: Now, even though it is accepted, it is said to be indeterminate because of the oneness of the entirety of the multiplicity. This is the distinction.

original: dpe ni bsgrub byas dman pa zhes pa /
analyzed: dpe ni bsgrub byas dman pa zhes pa /
translated: The example is inferior to the probandum.

original: khyad par rnams thams cad gtso bo gcig gi rgyu can nyid du khas len pa la dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams shing la sogs pa sngon ma can nyid rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par rnams thams cad gtso bo gcig gi rgyu can nyid du khas len pa la dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams shing la sogs pa sngon ma can nyid rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: In the acceptance that all distinctions have a single primary cause, it is not reasonable that the parts, etc. have a prior tree, etc.

original: 'o na khyad par rnams rgyu gcig sngon ma can rnams so zhes pa ltos pa med pa'i gtso bo la sogs pa'i ngo bo gcig gi rgyu can nyid du bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: 'o na khyad par rnams rgyu gcig sngon ma can rnams so zhes pa ltos pa med pa'i gtso bo la sogs pa'i ngo bo gcig gi rgyu can nyid du bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: Then, the distinctions have a single prior cause. Thus, it is to be proven that they have a single nature of primary cause, etc. that is independent.

original: des na gang las dpe med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: des na gang las dpe med pa yin zhe na /
translated: Therefore, from what is the example non-existent?

original: 'di ltar sems te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems te /
translated: It is thought like this.

original: khyad par la mi snyegs pa yin na grub pa bsgrub bya nyid kho nar 'gyur gyi shing la sogs pa gcig pa nyid 'grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par la mi snyegs pa yin na grub pa bsgrub bya nyid kho nar 'gyur gyi shing la sogs pa gcig pa nyid 'grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: If it does not follow the distinctions, it would only be a proven probandum, but it is not the establishment of the oneness of the tree, etc.

original: des na dpe ltar snang ba'i zhes pa'o //
analyzed: des na dpe ltar snang ba'i zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is a seemingly similar example.

original: dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams khyad par las phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams khyad par las phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because the parts, etc. are not external to the distinction.

original: khyad par rnams thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir dpe med do //
analyzed: khyad par rnams thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir dpe med do //
translated: And because all distinctions are the probandum, there is no example.

original: bsgrub par bya ba kho na dper @199b 'thad pa ni ma yin pas te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba kho na dper @199b 'thad pa ni ma yin pas te /
translated: It is not tenable that the probandum alone is the example.

original: de'i phyir chos can ma grub pa'i dpe'i skyon no //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can ma grub pa'i dpe'i skyon no //
translated: Therefore, the fault of the example is that the subject is not established.

original: 'o na dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams grub pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams grub pa ste /
translated: Well, the parts, etc. are established.

original: de ci ltar chos can ma grub pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ci ltar chos can ma grub pa yin zhe na /
translated: How can the subject not be established?

original: grub pa bden mod /
analyzed: grub pa bden mod /
translated: It is true that they are established.

original: gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya nyid du nye bar blangs te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya nyid du nye bar blangs te /
translated: But they are taken as the probandum of the reason.

original: gzhan yod pa ma yin no zhes pas gsal ba kho nar chos can ma grub bo //
analyzed: gzhan yod pa ma yin no zhes pas gsal ba kho nar chos can ma grub bo //
translated: Since it is stated that ‚Äúthe other does not exist,‚Äù the subject is clearly not established.

original: ci ste nye bar mi len na /
analyzed: ci ste nye bar mi len na /
translated: But if they are not taken,

original: de lta na yang gtso bo sngon ma can nyid du dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams mi 'gyur ro zhes pas yon tan gsum nyid med do //
analyzed: de lta na yang gtso bo sngon ma can nyid du dum zhogs la sogs pa rnams mi 'gyur ro zhes pas yon tan gsum nyid med do //
translated: then the parts, etc. would not have a prior existent as their cause, and thus the three qualities would not exist.

original: de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la zhes pa tshad dang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po dang / nus pas 'jug pa rnams dang / sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo'i rnam par ldan pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la zhes pa tshad dang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po dang / nus pas 'jug pa rnams dang / sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo'i rnam par ldan pa rnams la'o //
translated: Likewise, ‚Äúand so on‚Äù means that the remaining [reasons] are the entities of measure, effect, and cause, and those that engage by means of power, and those that possess a variety of natures.

original: de la yang gal te dngos su gtso bo yod pa nyid bsgrub bya yin na /
analyzed: de la yang gal te dngos su gtso bo yod pa nyid bsgrub bya yin na /
translated: If the existence of the primary nature is the direct object of proof,

original: de yang dag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang dag pa ma yin te /
translated: then that is not correct.

original: tshad ma'i yul mi shes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshad ma'i yul mi shes pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the object of valid knowledge is not known,üîΩand because there is no inference that has a generality as its object.

original: spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin pa'i rjes su dpag pa yod pa ma yin pas so zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa sngar gyi rjes su 'brang bas gtan tshigs dang dpe dang nye bar bsdu ba rnams ma 'brel ba nyid du ji ltar rigsüîΩpar brjod par bya'o //üîΩrigs pa'i sgo'i phyogs kyis ni mi rigs pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin pa'i rjes su dpag pa yod pa ma yin pas so zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa sngar gyi rjes su 'brang bas gtan tshigs dang dpe dang nye bar bsdu ba rnams ma 'brel ba nyid du ji ltar rigs par brjod par bya'o // rigs pa'i sgo'i phyogs kyis ni mi rigs pa nyid du'o //
translated: In this way and so on, by following the previous [arguments], it should be said that the reasons, examples, and conclusions are not connected.üîΩBy the side of reasoning, [it should be said that] it is unreasonable.

original: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i skyon las so //
analyzed: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i skyon las so //
translated: Because of the faults of nonestablishment and contradiction.

original: de la tshad can gyi rnam bar ldan pas ni khyad par rnams rgyu gcig 'dres pa sngon ma can nyid du bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: de la tshad can gyi rnam bar ldan pas ni khyad par rnams rgyu gcig 'dres pa sngon ma can nyid du bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: Since they are endowed with limited forms, the particulars are to be established as having a single cause that is mixed.

original: dper na myu gu dang 'dab ma dang sdong bu la sogs pa rnams ni yongs su 'gyur ba dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir 'bru gcig gi rgyu la 'dres ba yin pa dang / ji ltar mer mer po dang nar nar po la sogs pa rnams khu ba dang /
analyzed: dper na myu gu dang 'dab ma dang sdong bu la sogs pa rnams ni yongs su 'gyur ba dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir 'bru gcig gi rgyu la 'dres ba yin pa dang / ji ltar mer mer po dang nar nar po la sogs pa rnams khu ba dang /
translated: For example, since the sprout, leaf, stem, and so on are endowed with transformation, they are mixed in the cause of a single seed, and just as the embryo, fetus, and so on are in semen and blood,

original: khrag la yin pa de bzhin du khyad par rnams kyang rgyu gcig tu 'ga' zhig la 'dres par 'byung bar bya zhing de yang gtso bo'o //
analyzed: khrag la yin pa de bzhin du khyad par rnams kyang rgyu gcig tu 'ga' zhig la 'dres par 'byung bar bya zhing de yang gtso bo'o //
translated: so too the particulars are to be produced as mixed in a single cause, and that is the primal matter.

original: des na de yod do zhes grag go //
analyzed: des na de yod do zhes grag go //
translated: Therefore it is said to exist.

original: 'di yang ma grub pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'di yang ma grub pa nyid de /
translated: This is also unestablished.

original: khyad par rnams tshad med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par rnams tshad med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the particulars are immeasurable.

original: mig la sogs pa rigs kyis yongs su zin pas tshad can no zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rigs kyis yongs su zin pas tshad can no zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that they are limited because they are taken up by the type of eye and so on, that is not so.

original: rigs ni khyad par rnams las gzhan ma yin pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs ni khyad par rnams las gzhan ma yin pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the class is not accepted as being different from the particulars, and because it is infinite.

original: khas blangs nas zhes pa la sogs pa 'gal ba nyid snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: khas blangs nas zhes pa la sogs pa 'gal ba nyid snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Having accepted, etc. The contradiction is the same as before.

original: 'bru la sogs pa rnams gcig nyid grub pa ma @200a * //
analyzed: 'bru la sogs pa rnams gcig nyid grub pa ma @200a * //
translated: It is not established that the seeds, etc. are identical.

original: yin zhing / myu gu la sogs pa rnams de la 'dres pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yin zhing / myu gu la sogs pa rnams de la 'dres pa ma yin te /
translated: The sprout, etc. are not mixed with it,

original: skye ba las sngar ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba las sngar ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they are not established prior to arising.

original: yod na yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yod na yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even if they existed, they would not arise,

original: da ltar ba bzhin no //
analyzed: da ltar ba bzhin no //
translated: because they would be like the present.

original: gtan tshigs mthun phyogs la yod pa nyid khas blangs nas kyang ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs mthun phyogs la yod pa nyid khas blangs nas kyang ma nges pa ste /
translated: Even if the reason is accepted as being present in the similar class, it is not established.

original: sa bon la sogs pa sna tshogs pa sngon ma can 'bru la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dres pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / 'brel pa med pa las kyang khyab pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa bon la sogs pa sna tshogs pa sngon ma can 'bru la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dres pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / 'brel pa med pa las kyang khyab pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the seeds, etc. are not seen to be mixed with the sprouts, etc. which have a previous existence, and because pervasion is not established even from a non-related reason.

original: nus pa'i 'jug pa'i rnam par ldan pas khyad par rnams nus pa gcig sngon ma can nyid du sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: nus pa'i 'jug pa'i rnam par ldan pas khyad par rnams nus pa gcig sngon ma can nyid du sgrub par byed de /
translated: The particularities are established as having a single potency, because they are endowed with the mode of activity of potency.

original: rgyu rnams la 'bras bu'i nus pa yod na /
analyzed: rgyu rnams la 'bras bu'i nus pa yod na /
translated: If the causes have the potency of the effect,

original: 'bras bu 'jug pa mthong ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'jug pa mthong ste /
translated: then the activity of the effect is seen.

original: dper na 'o ma la zho'i nus pa yod pa na zho lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na 'o ma la zho'i nus pa yod pa na zho lta bu'o //
translated: For example, if there is the potency of curd in milk, then there is curd.

original: chen po la sogs pa nams kyi 'jug pa yang yod de /
analyzed: chen po la sogs pa nams kyi 'jug pa yang yod de /
translated: The activity of Mahat and so on also exists.

original: de'i phyir 'jug pa las sngar gang las phyis chen po la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba nus pa de yod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jug pa las sngar gang las phyis chen po la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba nus pa de yod do //
translated: Therefore, prior to activity, there is the potency from which Mahat and so on arise later.

original: de yang gtso bo yin no lo //
analyzed: de yang gtso bo yin no lo //
translated: And that is the primal substance.

original: 'dir gal te 'jug pa ni bya ba'i mtshan nyid can du 'dod na /
analyzed: 'dir gal te 'jug pa ni bya ba'i mtshan nyid can du 'dod na /
translated: Here, if activity is asserted to have the characteristic of action,

original: de bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi dor ma grub ste /
analyzed: de bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi dor ma grub ste /
translated: then it is not established for the Sugatas,

original: dngos po thams cad skad cig pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir ro //üîΩci ste skye ba ni thog mtha' dang ldan pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad skad cig pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir ro // ci ste skye ba ni thog mtha' dang ldan pa nyid dam /
translated: because they accept that all things are momentary.üîΩBut if arising has a beginning and end,

original: skye ba dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid can yin na /
analyzed: skye ba dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid can yin na /
translated: or if it has the characteristic of arising and destruction,üîΩthen it is not established for you.

original: de yang ji 'dra ba pha rol po mngon par 'dod pa de 'dra bar ma grub pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de yang ji 'dra ba pha rol po mngon par 'dod pa de 'dra bar ma grub pa kho na ste /
translated: Moreover, it is not established in exactly the way that the opponentüîΩasserts.

original: pha rol po ni sngar yod pa kho na gsal bar 'gyur ba skye bar 'dod cing /
analyzed: pha rol po ni sngar yod pa kho na gsal bar 'gyur ba skye bar 'dod cing /
translated: The opponent asserts that what is already existent is merely made manifestüîΩthrough arising, and that what is not already existent does not arise.üîΩThe opponent asserts that what is not already existent does not arise.

original: rang gi ngo bo las ma nyams pa'i bdag nyid kho na'i mi gsal bar 'gyur ba ni 'jig par ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo las ma nyams pa'i bdag nyid kho na'i mi gsal bar 'gyur ba ni 'jig par ro //
translated: The disintegration of that which is not already existent is not tenable.üîΩThe disintegration of that which is already existent is not tenable.üîΩThe disintegration of that which is both already existent and not yet existent is not tenable.üîΩThe disintegration of that which is neither already existent nor not yet existent is not tenable.üîΩThe arising and disintegration that have such characteristics are not accepted

original: 'di lta bu'i rnam pa'i skye pa dang 'jig pa dag pa de bar gshegs pa rnams kyis khas len pa yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i rnam pa'i skye pa dang 'jig pa dag pa de bar gshegs pa rnams kyis khas len pa yang ma yin gyi /
translated: even by the Transcendent Lord.üîΩBut what are they? They are the arising of that which did not previouslyüîΩexist, and the disintegration that has the characteristic of the degeneration

original: 'o na ci zhe na ma byung pa 'byung ba dang rang gi ngo bo nyams pa'i mtshan nyid can dag go //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na ma byung pa 'byung ba dang rang gi ngo bo nyams pa'i mtshan nyid can dag go //
translated: of its own state.üîΩBut if the particular universal that is desired is not established, and if it isüîΩestablished, then the argument that the particular is not established because

original: 'o na brjod par 'dod pa'i khyad par can gyi spyi grub pa nyid ma yin nam de grub pa na khyad par rnam par brtag pas ma grub par rtsod pa ni ltag chod kyi lan kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na brjod par 'dod pa'i khyad par can gyi spyi grub pa nyid ma yin nam de grub pa na khyad par rnam par brtag pas ma grub par rtsod pa ni ltag chod kyi lan kho na'o zhe na /
translated: it is conceptually constructed is just sophistry.

original: gal te gnyis ka yang 'dod pa'i dngos po'i spyi cung zad pa /
analyzed: gal te gnyis ka yang 'dod pa'i dngos po'i spyi cung zad pa /
translated: If both are established, then what is the point of the argument?

original: gang gi rgyu can skye pa dang mi rtag pa'i sgra dag yin pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa lta bu yod na ltag chod kyi lan du 'gyur mod /
analyzed: gang gi rgyu can skye pa dang mi rtag pa'i sgra dag yin pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa lta bu yod na ltag chod kyi lan du 'gyur mod /
translated: If there were such a thing as a reason for the words ‚Äúarisen‚Äù and ‚Äúimpermanent,‚Äù like ‚Äúbeing produced,‚Äù etc., then it would be a case of a reductio ad absurdum.

original: de yang med do //üîΩgsal bar 'gyur ba dang @200b mi gsal bar 'gyur ba dag kyang snga ma phyis gnas pa'i rang gi ngo bo can la rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang med do // gsal bar 'gyur ba dang @200b mi gsal bar 'gyur ba dag kyang snga ma phyis gnas pa'i rang gi ngo bo can la rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: But there is not.

original: dbus kyi gnas skabs bzhin pas 'jug pa ma grub bo //
analyzed: dbus kyi gnas skabs bzhin pas 'jug pa ma grub bo //
translated: It is not logical that the manifestation and nonmanifestation of something should be the same entity, because it is not established that they are present in the prior and subsequent states, like the middle state.

original: khas blangs nas kyang 'gal ba nyid de /
analyzed: khas blangs nas kyang 'gal ba nyid de /
translated: Even if you accept that, it is contradictory.

original: chos gang rnams kyis khyad par du byas pa'i gtso bo bsgrub bya nyid du mngon par 'dod pa de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun ba snga ma kho na'i zho la sogs pa rnams la 'jug pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos gang rnams kyis khyad par du byas pa'i gtso bo bsgrub bya nyid du mngon par 'dod pa de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun ba snga ma kho na'i zho la sogs pa rnams la 'jug pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you see that the thing that is the predicate of the probandum, qualified by the property, is the same as the prior thing, such as yogurt, which is not characterized by that property.

original: gtan tshigs mthun phyogs la yod pa nyid du khas blangs nas kyang ma nges pa nyid de /
analyzed: gtan tshigs mthun phyogs la yod pa nyid du khas blangs nas kyang ma nges pa nyid de /
translated: Even if you accept that the reason exists in the similar class, it is not established.

original: nus pa sngon ma can sna tshogs pa'i dngos po rnams la 'jug pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa sngon ma can sna tshogs pa'i dngos po rnams la 'jug pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because we see that various things that have a prior potentiality are engaged.

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos pos khyad par rnams byed pa po gcig sngon ma can nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos pos khyad par rnams byed pa po gcig sngon ma can nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ni /
translated: The proof that the one who is the agent has a prior potentiality is by way of the fact of being an effect and a cause.

original: dper na mal cha dang stan dang shing rta la sogs pa rnams 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po nyid kyi phyir byed pa po gcig sngon ma can nyid yin pa de ltar chen po la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: dper na mal cha dang stan dang shing rta la sogs pa rnams 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po nyid kyi phyir byed pa po gcig sngon ma can nyid yin pa de ltar chen po la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: For example, a bed, a seat, a chariot, etc., are the one who is the agent and has a prior potentiality because of the fact of being an effect and a cause. So it is with Mahat, etc.

original: gang byed pa por gyur pa'i dngos po gcig po de gtso bo'o zhe lo //
analyzed: gang byed pa por gyur pa'i dngos po gcig po de gtso bo'o zhe lo //
translated: That one thing which is the agent is the principal.

original: 'di yang de ma thag tu brjod pa'i tshul gyis ma grub pa nyid dang 'gal ba nyid brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di yang de ma thag tu brjod pa'i tshul gyis ma grub pa nyid dang 'gal ba nyid brjod par bya'o //
translated: This also should be stated as unproven and contradictory by the method just stated.

original: ma nges pa nyid de /
analyzed: ma nges pa nyid de /
translated: It is also indeterminate.

original: byed pa po gcig ma yin pa mal cha dang stan la sogs pa rnams la yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po gcig ma yin pa mal cha dang stan la sogs pa rnams la yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen that a bed, a seat, etc., are not the one agent.

original: sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par ldan pas /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par ldan pas /
translated: Since they are endowed with a variety of natures,

original: khyad par rnams rgyu gcig pa rnam par dbyer med pa sngon ma can nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par rnams rgyu gcig pa rnam par dbyer med pa sngon ma can nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ni /
translated: the differences are established as having a single cause, which is not divisible.

original: ji ltar zho dang spris ma dang dar ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo rnams ni byed pa po 'o ma gcig la sngar ma bral bar gyur pa rnams phyis rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar zho dang spris ma dang dar ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo rnams ni byed pa po 'o ma gcig la sngar ma bral bar gyur pa rnams phyis rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Just as curds, butter, milk, and so on, which have a variety of natures, are not previously separated from the single agent, milk, but later become separated,

original: de ltar chen po la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar chen po la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: so too are Mahat and so on.

original: gang du 'di rnams sngar rnam par dbye ba med bar gyur ba de gtso bo'o zhes lo //
analyzed: gang du 'di rnams sngar rnam par dbye ba med bar gyur ba de gtso bo'o zhes lo //
translated: Where they were previously not separated, that is the primary nature.

original: 'di la yang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa nyid dag / snga ma'i rjes su 'brang bas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa nyid dag / snga ma'i rjes su 'brang bas brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here too, the contradictions and the uncertainty should be stated as before.

original: yongs su ba'i lhag ma las bsal te 'ongs pas grub pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su ba'i lhag ma las bsal te 'ongs pas grub pa zhes pa'o //
translated: The remainder is excluded by the universal.

original: 'di ni bsal te 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni bsal te 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the definition of the excluded middle.

original: 'di'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di'i bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of this is as follows:

original: ji skad du 'di ni 'di las rnam pa gzhan du srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ji skad du 'di ni 'di las rnam pa gzhan du srid pa ma yin te /
