translated: It is not possible for this to be otherwise than this.

original: 'di yang yod do //üîΩde'i phyir yongs su ba'i lhag ma las 'di ni gtan tshigs kho na'o zhes nges par gzung pa'i 'bras bu grub na yang @201a * //
analyzed: 'di yang yod do // de'i phyir yongs su ba'i lhag ma las 'di ni gtan tshigs kho na'o zhes nges par gzung pa'i 'bras bu grub na yang @201a * //
translated: And this exists.üîΩTherefore, the remainder of the pervasion is the reason alone.

original: ston pa de'i tshe bsal te 'ongs pa zhes par 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: ston pa de'i tshe bsal te 'ongs pa zhes par 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: When the result is established, then the statement is cleared of the fault of overextension.

original: gzhan gyi phyogs bkag pas zhes pa la sogs pas bsal te 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don bsdus nas smra'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyogs bkag pas zhes pa la sogs pas bsal te 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don bsdus nas smra'o //
translated: The meaning of the summary of the definition of overextension is stated by ‚Äúother position is refuted,‚Äù and so on.

original: lo'i sgra ni mi 'dod pa bsal bar byed pa'i don can no //
analyzed: lo'i sgra ni mi 'dod pa bsal bar byed pa'i don can no //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù has the meaning of excluding what is not intended.

original: dgag pa'i thabs gnyis te zhes ba /
analyzed: dgag pa'i thabs gnyis te zhes ba /
translated: The two methods of negation are

original: lan gnyis dag go zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: lan gnyis dag go zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the two answers.

original: dpe brjod la dper rab tu grags so //
analyzed: dpe brjod la dper rab tu grags so //
translated: In the example, the example is well known.

original: de gcod pa'i ched du spras pa /
analyzed: de gcod pa'i ched du spras pa /
translated: In order to eliminate that, it is adorned.

original: 'jig rten dpe zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dpe zhes pa'o //
translated: The world is the example.

original: gang 'jig rten la rab tu grags pa dang 'gal ba'i tshig de dpe dang 'gal ba yin lo //
analyzed: gang 'jig rten la rab tu grags pa dang 'gal ba'i tshig de dpe dang 'gal ba yin lo //
translated: That statement which contradicts what is well known in the world contradicts the example.

original: de de dang 'gal ba brjod pa kho nas sel na ni 'jig rten na dpe zhes pa'i rjes su dpag pa'o zhes gzhan rnams so //
analyzed: de de dang 'gal ba brjod pa kho nas sel na ni 'jig rten na dpe zhes pa'i rjes su dpag pa'o zhes gzhan rnams so //
translated: If it were removed by merely stating the contradiction with that, then in the world, after the example, there would be inference.

original: don sna tshogs blta bar bya zhing snang bar bya'o zhes pa 'jig rten no //
analyzed: don sna tshogs blta bar bya zhing snang bar bya'o zhes pa 'jig rten no //
translated: The world says, ‚ÄúThe various objects are to be seen and illuminated.‚Äù

original: mtha' ni dngos po ji lta ba bzhin gyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: mtha' ni dngos po ji lta ba bzhin gyi bdag nyid de /
translated: The end is the nature of things as they are.

original: mtha' 'dir ram 'dis mthong ngo zhes pa dpe'o //
analyzed: mtha' 'dir ram 'dis mthong ngo zhes pa dpe'o //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúIt is seen at the end, or by this end.‚Äù

original: bstan bcos tshad ma nyid ni khas len pa ste /
analyzed: bstan bcos tshad ma nyid ni khas len pa ste /
translated: The treatise is accepted as valid.

original: de dang 'gal ba brjod pa gang yin pa de khas blangs pa nyams pa'o //
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba brjod pa gang yin pa de khas blangs pa nyams pa'o //
translated: That which states the contradiction with that is the failure of the acceptance.

original: gzhan gyi phyogs bkag pa tsam gyis rang gi phyogs 'grub pa ni mthong ba ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyogs bkag pa tsam gyis rang gi phyogs 'grub pa ni mthong ba ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: It is not seen that one‚Äôs own position is established merely by refuting the position of another.

original: rang gi phyogs kyi sgrub byed med par zhes pa tsam gyi sgras gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: rang gi phyogs kyi sgrub byed med par zhes pa tsam gyi sgras gsal bar byed do //
translated: It is made clear by the mere word ‚Äúwithout a proof for one‚Äôs own position.‚Äù

original: ci ltar mthong ba med ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar mthong ba med ce na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it that there is no seeing? It is said:

original: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, and so on.

original: 'o na sngar rtag pa nyid dgag pa ma gtogs par mi rtag pa nyid gzhan yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na sngar rtag pa nyid dgag pa ma gtogs par mi rtag pa nyid gzhan yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ma yin nam /
translated: But didn‚Äôt we previously explain that apart from the negation of permanence, there is no other impermanence?

original: de ci ltar mi rtag pa nyid 'grub pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ci ltar mi rtag pa nyid 'grub pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: How can impermanence be established?

original: 'di ni gtam ste /
analyzed: 'di ni gtam ste /
translated: This is a good question.

original: gang gi phyir der ni ma yin dgag kho na la brten pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir der ni ma yin dgag kho na la brten pa ste /
translated: Because in that case, it is based on an implicative negation.

original: des na rtag pa nyid las bzlog pa'i chos gzhan kho na mi rtag pa nyid de /
analyzed: des na rtag pa nyid las bzlog pa'i chos gzhan kho na mi rtag pa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, impermanence is a phenomenon that is the opposite of permanence,

original: bram ze ma yin pa la sogs pa bzhin yin gyi /
analyzed: bram ze ma yin pa la sogs pa bzhin yin gyi /
translated: like not being a Brahmin and so on.

original: rtag pa nyid bkag pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid bkag pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not merely the negation of permanence.

original: gzhan du na ri bong gi rva la sogs pa rnams kyang mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na ri bong gi rva la sogs pa rnams kyang mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would follow that even rabbit horns and so on would be impermanent.

original: de las kyang mi rtag pa nyid 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las kyang mi rtag pa nyid 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Also, impermanence would not be a characteristic of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas rnams la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas rnams la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists even in unconditioned phenomena.

original: gnas skabs de yang dngos po'i rkyen gyis brjod par bya'o zhes pas 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs de yang dngos po'i rkyen gyis brjod par bya'o zhes pas 'gal ba'o //
translated: That state is also expressed by the condition of an entity. Therefore it is contradictory.

original: gang yang rtag pa nyid dgag pa ma gtogs par zhes pa la sogs pa bshad pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gang yang rtag pa nyid dgag pa ma gtogs par zhes pa la sogs pa bshad pa 'di ni /
translated: This explanation, ‚Äúexcept for the negation of permanence,‚Äù

original: des dben pa'i spyi la dgongs @201b nas yin no //
analyzed: des dben pa'i spyi la dgongs @201b nas yin no //
translated: is intended to be a general statement about that.

original: de ltar na sgra mi rtag pa 'grub pa ni ma yin te zhes pa /
analyzed: de ltar na sgra mi rtag pa 'grub pa ni ma yin te zhes pa /
translated: Thus, it is not the case that the impermanence of sound is established,

original: sgrub byed kyi skyon brjod pas gzhan gyi phyogs bkag pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi skyon brjod pas gzhan gyi phyogs bkag pa tsam gyis so //
translated: because the fault of the proof is stated, and the opponent‚Äôs position is merely refuted.

original: de la yang ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes pa nges byad med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de la yang ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes pa nges byad med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Moreover, because of the uncertainty, that is, because of the absence of a proof.

original: 'o na dgag pa tsam las kyang /
analyzed: 'o na dgag pa tsam las kyang /
translated: Well, then, from a mere negation,

original: chu klung khengs pa ni char bab pa sngon ma can nyid grub pa mthong ngo zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: chu klung khengs pa ni char bab pa sngon ma can nyid grub pa mthong ngo zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: the filling of a river is seen to be established as having a prior rainfall.

original: gang chu klung khengs pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang chu klung khengs pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: With regard to that, he says, ‚ÄúThe filling of a river,‚Äù and so on.

original: dgag pa tsam las de grub pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dgag pa tsam las de grub pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not established from a mere negation.

original: 'o na ci zhe na khyad par can gyi chu klung khengs pa las te /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na khyad par can gyi chu klung khengs pa las te /
translated: Well, then, what is it? It is from the filling of a particular river.

original: kha ba zhu ba la sogs pa bkag pas te dkar ba nyid la sogs pa med pas chu klung khengs pa khyad par du bya'o //
analyzed: kha ba zhu ba la sogs pa bkag pas te dkar ba nyid la sogs pa med pas chu klung khengs pa khyad par du bya'o //
translated: because the melting of snow and so on are blocked, and because the river is filled with the absence of whiteness and so on.

original: gang 'dra ba'i chu klung khengs pa char bab pa med na mi 'byung bar mthong ba /
analyzed: gang 'dra ba'i chu klung khengs pa char bab pa med na mi 'byung bar mthong ba /
translated: The river is filled in such a way that the filling of the river is seen not to occur without the falling of rain.

original: 'di lta ste lbu ba can dang grang ba dang rnyog pa can dang rtsva dang lo ma la sogs pa 'dres pa'i chu can te /
analyzed: 'di lta ste lbu ba can dang grang ba dang rnyog pa can dang rtsva dang lo ma la sogs pa 'dres pa'i chu can te /
translated: It is like this: the river has bubbles, is cold, turbid, and has grass, leaves, and so on mixed in.

original: 'di lta bu ni kha ba zhu ba la med la /üîΩchu lon bcings pa la med cing /
analyzed: 'di lta bu ni kha ba zhu ba la med la / chu lon bcings pa la med cing /
translated: This is not the case with the melting of snow.üîΩIt is not the case with the binding of a dyke.

original: sbrul rtse ba la mthong ba med de /
analyzed: sbrul rtse ba la mthong ba med de /
translated: It is not the case with the playing of a lute.

original: de rnams la rnam pa 'di lta bu mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams la rnam pa 'di lta bu mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Because such aspects are impossible in those cases.

original: dgag pa tsam gyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dgag pa tsam gyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBy a mere negation‚Äù and so on.

original: sogs pa smos pas lha rtse ba sngon ma can yang ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas lha rtse ba sngon ma can yang ngo //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù includes the playing of a lute.

original: ci ste de bkag pas kyang char bab pa sngon ma can nyid bsgrub na /
analyzed: ci ste de bkag pas kyang char bab pa sngon ma can nyid bsgrub na /
translated: But if you establish that the falling of rain is preceded by the blocking of the river,

original: lhas byin rgod pa sngon ma can yang 'gyur ro//
analyzed: lhas byin rgod pa sngon ma can yang 'gyur ro//
translated: then the playing of a lute would be preceded by Devadatta.

original: 'di ci las she na /
analyzed: 'di ci las she na /
translated: What is the reason for this?

original: kha ba zhu ba la sogs pa bkag pas char bab pa sngon ma can kho na ste /
analyzed: kha ba zhu ba la sogs pa bkag pas char bab pa sngon ma can kho na ste /
translated: Because the melting of snow and so on is refuted, the falling of rain is only preceded by that.

original: lhas byin rgod pa sngon ma can yang ma yin no //üîΩci ste lhas byin rgod pa sngon ma can chu klung gang ba ma mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: lhas byin rgod pa sngon ma can yang ma yin no // ci ste lhas byin rgod pa sngon ma can chu klung gang ba ma mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: But the agitation of Devadatta is not preceded by that.

original: de sngon ma can nyid rjes su dpog pa med na /
analyzed: de sngon ma can nyid rjes su dpog pa med na /
translated: But if the agitation of Devadatta is not inferred to be preceded by the filling of the river because it is not seen,

original: 'o na bkag pa tsam las rang gi phyogs 'grub pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'o na bkag pa tsam las rang gi phyogs 'grub pa ma yin gyi /
translated: then how is it that one‚Äôs own position is not established from mere refutation?

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: khyad par can char bab pa med na mi 'byung ba'i chu klung gang ba las so //
analyzed: khyad par can char bab pa med na mi 'byung ba'i chu klung gang ba las so //
translated: It is from the filling of the river, which is a special case of the falling of rain, which is not unaccompanied by rain.

original: de ni de'i khyad par can nyid du dgag pas nye bar bstan par bya'o zhes pa 'di tsam ni dgag pa'i nye bar mkho ba'o //
analyzed: de ni de'i khyad par can nyid du dgag pas nye bar bstan par bya'o zhes pa 'di tsam ni dgag pa'i nye bar mkho ba'o //
translated: That is to be shown by the negation of its being a special case of that. This much is the purpose of the negation.

original: dgag pa gtan tshigs can min zhes pa gtan tshigs gnyis pa can kho na ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dgag pa gtan tshigs can min zhes pa gtan tshigs gnyis pa can kho na ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúNegation does not have a reason‚Äù means that it does not have a second reason.

original: nges par gzung bas ni 'dir dgag par bya ste /
analyzed: nges par gzung bas ni 'dir dgag par bya ste /
translated: By the specification, here the negation is to be ascertained.

original: rgyu gnyis can nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu gnyis can nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that there are two causes.

original: de ltar ni gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar ni gsungs pa /
translated: This is what is said:

original: dgag pa ni gnyis dag kho nas ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //üîΩ'jig rten gyi sgras rjes su dpag pa brjod na ni de dang @202a * //
analyzed: dgag pa ni gnyis dag kho nas ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o // 'jig rten gyi sgras rjes su dpag pa brjod na ni de dang @202a * //
translated: ‚ÄúThe negation is not by the two alone.‚Äù

original: 'gal ba yongs su gzung ba tsam du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'gal ba yongs su gzung ba tsam du 'gyur gyi /
translated: If one states an inference by means of the word ‚Äúworld,‚Äù then that which is contradictory to it is merely accepted.

original: dgag pa'i thabs mtha' dag rnams yongs su gzung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dgag pa'i thabs mtha' dag rnams yongs su gzung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: But the entire method of negation is not accepted,

original: de rnams rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba las tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba las tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because those are different from what is contradictory to the inference.

original: de las kyang de kho na skyon yin te /
analyzed: de las kyang de kho na skyon yin te /
translated: And from that, that alone is the fault,

original: dgag pa rgyu gnyis can ma yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dgag pa rgyu gnyis can ma yin zhes pa'o //
translated: that the negation is not by the two causes.

original: ci ste dgag pa'i thabs mtha' dag dpe'i sgras yongs su gzung bar bya na /
analyzed: ci ste dgag pa'i thabs mtha' dag dpe'i sgras yongs su gzung bar bya na /
translated: But if one accepts the entire method of negation by means of the word ‚Äúexample,‚Äù

original: khas blangs pa nyams pa'i tshig don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: khas blangs pa nyams pa'i tshig don med par 'gyur te /
translated: then the statement ‚Äúthe assertion is undermined‚Äù would be meaningless,

original: de yang de'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang de'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is included within it.

original: sbyor ba gnyis kyang rigs ma yin //
analyzed: sbyor ba gnyis kyang rigs ma yin //
translated: The two syllogisms are also not correct.

original: zhes pa bas rnam pa gnyis kas kyang mi rigs so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa bas rnam pa gnyis kas kyang mi rigs so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that it is not tenable by either of the two.

original: gal te gsal ba med pa las skye ba zhes pa /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba med pa las skye ba zhes pa /
translated: If it is said that ‚Äúit arises from a non-manifest,‚Äù

original: med pa las te yod pa ma yin pa'i rgyu las zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: med pa las te yod pa ma yin pa'i rgyu las zhes pa'i don to //
translated: it means that it arises from a non-existent, that is, from a non-existent cause.üîΩBecause there is no origination,

original: skye gnas med pa'i phyir zhes pa rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: skye gnas med pa'i phyir zhes pa rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: it means because there is no cause.

original: 'dir 'dre bar byed de khyad par rnams thams cad nus pa'i bdag nyid kyis 'dre bar 'gyur ro zhes pa skye gnas te gtso bo nus pa'i khyad par mtha' dag gi rjes su song ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir 'dre bar byed de khyad par rnams thams cad nus pa'i bdag nyid kyis 'dre bar 'gyur ro zhes pa skye gnas te gtso bo nus pa'i khyad par mtha' dag gi rjes su song ba ste /
translated: Here, he connects: ‚ÄúAll the differences are mixed by the nature of their potential.‚Äù

original: khyad par la rjes su 'gro ba bzlog pa ni tha dad par thal bar 'gyur ba las te rjes su 'gro ba med par thal bar 'gyur ba las zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par la rjes su 'gro ba bzlog pa ni tha dad par thal bar 'gyur ba las te rjes su 'gro ba med par thal bar 'gyur ba las zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The reversal of following the differences is from the consequence of their being distinct, that is, from the consequence of their not following.

original: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pas bsam pa rnam pa gnyis po de ston to //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pas bsam pa rnam pa gnyis po de ston to //
translated: He teaches those two thoughts with ‚ÄúHere, if the differences‚Äù and so on.

original: gang skye gnas med pa'i phyir tha dad par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di brjod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang skye gnas med pa'i phyir tha dad par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di brjod par bya ba ste /
translated: And it is to be said that because they do not have a place of birth, they would be different.

original: skye gnas med pa sngon ma can rnams tha dad par dmigs nas te /
analyzed: skye gnas med pa sngon ma can rnams tha dad par dmigs nas te /
translated: Having observed that those who do not have a place of birth are different,

original: dper na nam mkha' la sogs pa rtag pa rnams ma byas pa kho nar nye bar dmigs nas /
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' la sogs pa rtag pa rnams ma byas pa kho nar nye bar dmigs nas /
translated: for example, having observed that permanent things such as space are just unproduced,

original: sgra rtag pa nyid du khas len na ma byas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur bar byed de /
analyzed: sgra rtag pa nyid du khas len na ma byas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur bar byed de /
translated: if one asserts that sound is permanent, it follows that it is unproduced.üîΩIf one asserts that sound is permanent, it follows that it is unproduced.

original: gal te sgra rtag par khas len na ma byas pa yang 'thob bo zhes pa de bzhin du 'dir yang skye gnas med pa sngon ma can rnams tha dad par nye bar dmigs nas /
analyzed: gal te sgra rtag par khas len na ma byas pa yang 'thob bo zhes pa de bzhin du 'dir yang skye gnas med pa sngon ma can rnams tha dad par nye bar dmigs nas /
translated: In the same way, having observed that those who do not have a place of birth are different,

original: skye gnas med pa sngon ma can nyid du khas len na tha dad de spyi med pa'i khyad par tsam 'thob bo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: skye gnas med pa sngon ma can nyid du khas len na tha dad de spyi med pa'i khyad par tsam 'thob bo zhes pa'o //
translated: if one asserts that those who do not have a place of birth are just different, it follows that they are different, that is, they are just particulars that do not have a universal.

original: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: With respect to ‚Äúthe one type that is the universal,‚Äù etc.,

original: ji ltar rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams la byas pa nyid ma mthong nas /
analyzed: ji ltar rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams la byas pa nyid ma mthong nas /
translated: Just as when permanence, such as space, etc., is seen to be unproduced,

original: sgra rtag par khas len na byas pa nyid las bzlog pas ma byas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba sgra las byed de /
analyzed: sgra rtag par khas len na byas pa nyid las bzlog pas ma byas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba sgra las byed de /
translated: if one asserts that sound is permanent, then it follows that sound is unproduced because it is the opposite of produced.üîΩObjection: It is obtained that they are unproduced.

original: de rnams @202b ma byas par 'thob bo zhes pa de ltar 'dir yang skye gnas sngon ma can ma yin pa rnams rjes su 'gro ba ste rigs gcig rdzas su 'brang bar ma mthong nas /
analyzed: de rnams @202b ma byas par 'thob bo zhes pa de ltar 'dir yang skye gnas sngon ma can ma yin pa rnams rjes su 'gro ba ste rigs gcig rdzas su 'brang bar ma mthong nas /
translated: In the same way, here, when those who do not possess a prior birth are seen to be not of the same type, not substantially continuous,

original: skye gnas sngon ma can ma yin pa nyid du khas len na tha dad du thal bar 'gyur bar byed de /
analyzed: skye gnas sngon ma can ma yin pa nyid du khas len na tha dad du thal bar 'gyur bar byed de /
translated: if one asserts that they do not possess a prior birth, then it follows that they are different.

original: de rnams tha dad par 'thob bo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams tha dad par 'thob bo zhes pa'o //
translated: Objection: It is obtained that they are different.

original: de la re zhig ces pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: de la re zhig ces pa la sogs pas /
translated: In response, Aryadeva says

original: skye gnas sngon ma can ma yin pa rnams med pa kho na'i phyir /
analyzed: skye gnas sngon ma can ma yin pa rnams med pa kho na'i phyir /
translated: that it is not tenable that they are different because those who do not possess a prior birth do not exist at all.

original: de mthong ba'i sgos tha dad du thal bar 'gyur pa mi 'thad par ston to //
analyzed: de mthong ba'i sgos tha dad du thal bar 'gyur pa mi 'thad par ston to //
translated: He shows that it is not tenable that they are different because they are seen to be different.

original: 'o na skye gnas sngon ma can ma yin par skyes bu rnams 'dod de /
analyzed: 'o na skye gnas sngon ma can ma yin par skyes bu rnams 'dod de /
translated: But people who are not born from a previous birth state are born.

original: de rnams kyang tha dad pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams kyang tha dad pa'o zhe na /
translated: And they are different.

original: 'di yod pa min te /
analyzed: 'di yod pa min te /
translated: This is not so.

original: skye gnas sngon ma can du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa skye gnas sngon ma can ma yin pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: skye gnas sngon ma can du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa skye gnas sngon ma can ma yin pa ma yin gyi /
translated: They are not born without a previous birth state.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: skye gnas med pa 'di rnams kyi sngon du'o zhes pas skye gnas med pa sngon ma can rnams so //
analyzed: skye gnas med pa 'di rnams kyi sngon du'o zhes pas skye gnas med pa sngon ma can rnams so //
translated: They have a previous birth state, but it is not a birth state.

original: skyes bu ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir skye gnas snga ma ma yin zhing /üîΩskye gnas med pas sngon can min //
analyzed: skyes bu ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir skye gnas snga ma ma yin zhing / skye gnas med pas sngon can min //
translated: Since a person is permanent, he is not a previous birth state.üîΩSince he is without a birth state, he does not have a previous birth state.

original: zhes pas 'di brtsad par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes pas 'di brtsad par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Since he is not a previous birth state, he is not a subject for debate.

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pas ni ma mthong ba'i sgo nas bzlog pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba mi srid par gsungs so //
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pas ni ma mthong ba'i sgo nas bzlog pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba mi srid par gsungs so //
translated: The words ‚Äúnot‚Äù and so on state that the consequence of the negation is impossible because it is not seen.

original: ma mthong ba tsam gyis zhes pa'i tsam gyi sgra ni /
analyzed: ma mthong ba tsam gyis zhes pa'i tsam gyi sgra ni /
translated: The word ‚Äújust‚Äù in ‚Äújust not seen‚Äù means

original: skye gnas med pas sngon ma can rnams la rjes su 'gro ba ma mthong ba dgag pa'i don to //
analyzed: skye gnas med pas sngon ma can rnams la rjes su 'gro ba ma mthong ba dgag pa'i don to //
translated: The point of the negation is that since there is no origination, one does not see that which has a prior existence as subsequent.

original: ma mthong ba tsam gyis bzlog pa sgro 'dogs pa rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ma mthong ba tsam gyis bzlog pa sgro 'dogs pa rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable to impute the opposite of mere non-seeing,

original: tha dad pa yang ma mthong ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: tha dad pa yang ma mthong ba'i phyir na /
translated: because one does not see difference either.

original: de las bzlog pa sgro 'dogs par thal bar 'gyur na mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa sgro 'dogs par thal bar 'gyur na mi rung ngo //
translated: It would be unacceptable to impute the opposite of that,üîΩJust as one does not see that which has a prior existence as subsequent when there is no origination, in the same way, one does not see difference either.

original: ji ltar skye gnas med pa sngon ma can rnams la rjes su 'gro ba ma mthong ba dag de las bzlog pas tha dad par thal par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tha dad par yang ma mthong ba kho na'o zhes pa de las bzlog pas rjes su 'groüîΩbar thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar skye gnas med pa sngon ma can rnams la rjes su 'gro ba ma mthong ba dag de las bzlog pas tha dad par thal par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tha dad par yang ma mthong ba kho na'o zhes pa de las bzlog pas rjes su 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: The opposite of that is the consequence of subsequent existence.

original: gnyi ga ltar yang ma mthong ba mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang ma mthong ba mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the non-seeing of both is the same.

original: de las kyang khas blangs pa nyams pa ste /
analyzed: de las kyang khas blangs pa nyams pa ste /
translated: Moreover, there is the fault of contradicting what is accepted,

original: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba mngon par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba mngon par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because one accepts that there is subsequent existence of a single type.

original: nyes pa 'di med de zhes pa khas blangs pa nyams pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nyes pa 'di med de zhes pa khas blangs pa nyams pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no fault here.

original: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur ba yang 'dod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur ba yang 'dod pa'i phyir /
translated: The assertion that the one is the cause of the other is not undermined, because we accept that the one is the subsequent state of the other.

original: de 'dod pa nyid du ston pa smras pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //üîΩbstan bcos su bshad pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de 'dod pa nyid du ston pa smras pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o // bstan bcos su bshad pa kho na ste /
translated: To demonstrate that we accept this, he says, ‚ÄúIt is said in the treatise . . . ‚Äù

original: skye gnas @203a * //
analyzed: skye gnas @203a * //
translated: The treatise is the one that explains the following:

original: med pa'i phyir gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: Because there is no birth, it follows that there is only one.

original: khyad bar ni spyi sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: khyad bar ni spyi sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: The difference is that the latter is preceded by the former.

original: 'jig rten na khyad par rnams ni spyi sngon ma can rnams rigs gcig pa can du mthong ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten na khyad par rnams ni spyi sngon ma can rnams rigs gcig pa can du mthong ste /
translated: In the world, differences that are preceded by a generality are seen to belong to the same class.

original: 'di lta ste 'o ma sngon ma can du zho dang sbris ma dang dar ba dang mar la sogs pa rnams 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'di lta ste 'o ma sngon ma can du zho dang sbris ma dang dar ba dang mar la sogs pa rnams 'gyur zhing /
translated: For example, milk that is preceded by a generality becomes curd, cream, butter, ghee, and so on.

original: med na 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: med na 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not arise without a generality.

original: gang sngon ma can gsal ba'i khyad bar rnams su 'gyur ba 'ga' zhig yod de /
analyzed: gang sngon ma can gsal ba'i khyad bar rnams su 'gyur ba 'ga' zhig yod de /
translated: There is something that is preceded by a generality and becomes the differences of the manifest.

original: de'i phyir spyi tsam 'di gsal ba'i ni khyad par med pa'o zhes pa 'dir thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi tsam 'di gsal ba'i ni khyad par med pa'o zhes pa 'dir thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this consequence is stated: ‚ÄúTherefore, this mere universal is not a particular of the manifest.‚Äù

original: 'di rigs par ni ma brjod do zhes pa /
analyzed: 'di rigs par ni ma brjod do zhes pa /
translated: This is not stated as a logical reason.

original: 'dir mi rigs pa nyid la gtan tshigs gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir mi rigs pa nyid la gtan tshigs gsungs pa /
translated: Here, the reason for the illogicality is stated:

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not the case,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: thal bar 'gyur bar zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod pa 'bebs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur bar zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod pa 'bebs pa yin gyi /
translated: The so-called consequence is the bringing about of an undesirable conclusion.

original: 'dod pa kho na ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa kho na ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not just a desired conclusion,

original: sgra mi rtag par smra ba la byas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur bar mi 'os so //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag par smra ba la byas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur bar mi 'os so //
translated: because it is not appropriate to bring about the consequence that sound is impermanent because it is a product.

original: rjes su 'gro pa khyad par rnams la 'dod pa med pa yang ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro pa khyad par rnams la 'dod pa med pa yang ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Nor is it the case that there is no desire for the particulars to have a single nature.

original: gal te mtha' gcig tu dgag pa yin no zhe na zhes pa /
analyzed: gal te mtha' gcig tu dgag pa yin no zhe na zhes pa /
translated: If it is a complete negation,

original: de ltar 'gyur mod khyad par rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod khyad par rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: it is so, but it is not the case that the particulars do not have a single nature.

original: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba kho na dgag ste /
analyzed: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba kho na dgag ste /
translated: It is only the negation of having a single nature that is stated.

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs rjes su 'gro ba yod na /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs rjes su 'gro ba yod na /
translated: If there were a universal that is concomitant with pleasure, etc.,

original: tha dad pa khyad par la yang 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa khyad par la yang 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: then it would be asserted even in the case of distinct particulars.

original: ma yin te de la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma yin te de la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: No, because of such things as ‚Äúthat,‚Äù etc.

original: gal te ma mthong ba tsam gyis bzlog pa sgro 'dogs par byed na /
analyzed: gal te ma mthong ba tsam gyis bzlog pa sgro 'dogs par byed na /
translated: If you impute the opposite merely on the ground of non-perception,

original: gcig nyid du mtha' gcig tu nges par ni rnam par ldan pa skye gnas med pa sngon ma can rnams la yang ma mthong ngo zhes pas bzlog pas /
analyzed: gcig nyid du mtha' gcig tu nges par ni rnam par ldan pa skye gnas med pa sngon ma can rnams la yang ma mthong ngo zhes pas bzlog pas /
translated: then, since it is not perceived that the non-existent birth of a conjunction is only one, the opposite is established.

original: spyi dang khyad par dang ldan pa nyid 'thob bo zhes pa 'di lta na yang mi 'dod pa ltung ba las mi grol lo //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par dang ldan pa nyid 'thob bo zhes pa 'di lta na yang mi 'dod pa ltung ba las mi grol lo //
translated: Thus, even if you say that the universal and the particulars are related, you do not escape from the unwanted conclusion.

original: rjes su 'gro na sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo dag gi zhes pa la sogs pa nyes pa gzhan 'god do //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro na sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo dag gi zhes pa la sogs pa nyes pa gzhan 'god do //
translated: If there is concomitance, then there is another fault, as stated in the verse, ‚ÄúIf the universal . . . ‚ÄùüîΩWhy?

original: ci ltar zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said,

original: de la min zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la min zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThat is not in each . . . ‚Äù

original: de la zhes pa rjes su 'gro ba la dang sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes pa rjes su 'gro ba la dang sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the universal and the various natures.

original: gang gi tshe yang rjes su 'gro ba mtha' gcig pa 'dod pa de'i tshe sna tshogs pa'i ngo po'i rnam par ldan pa las rjes su 'gro ba tha dad par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang rjes su 'gro ba mtha' gcig pa 'dod pa de'i tshe sna tshogs pa'i ngo po'i rnam par ldan pa las rjes su 'gro ba tha dad par 'gyur zhing /
translated: When you assert that the pervasion is one-sided, then the pervasion would be different from the possessor of the various natures.

original: gang gi @203b tshe sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid mtha' gcig pa'i 'dod pa de'i tshe rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam par ldan pa las sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo'i rnam par ldan pa tha dad de /
analyzed: gang gi @203b tshe sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid mtha' gcig pa'i 'dod pa de'i tshe rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam par ldan pa las sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo'i rnam par ldan pa tha dad de /
translated: When you assert that the various natures are one-sided, then the possessor of the various natures would be different from the possessor of the pervasion.

original: phan tshun shin tu mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun shin tu mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are utterly incompatible.

original: gang gi tshe khyad par rnams la rjes su 'gro ba mthar gcig pa med cing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe khyad par rnams la rjes su 'gro ba mthar gcig pa med cing /
translated: When the particulars do not have a single pervasion

original: sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid mtha' gcig pa med pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid mtha' gcig pa med pa de'i tshe /
translated: and do not have a single various nature,

original: de dag tha dad pa mi rigs pa kho na'o zhes pas /
analyzed: de dag tha dad pa mi rigs pa kho na'o zhes pas /
translated: then it is not at all tenable that they are different.

original: spyi dang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid can rnam par ldan pa gcig kho nar thal par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid can rnam par ldan pa gcig kho nar thal par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore it follows that the possessor of the characteristics of universals and particulars is a single entity.

original: 'o na ci ltar na bzlog pa'i thal par 'gyur ba rigs she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar na bzlog pa'i thal par 'gyur ba rigs she na gsungs pa /
translated: Well then, how is it that the reversed consequence is correct?

original: 'gyur te zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: 'gyur te zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: gang tha mi dad pa de rnams skye gnas med pa sngon nam can ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang tha mi dad pa de rnams skye gnas med pa sngon nam can ma yin gyi /
translated: That which is not different, those do not arise or endure, and are not prior or posterior.üîΩWell then, what? They are prior to a single cause.

original: 'o na ci zhes na rgyu gcig sngon ma can rnams so zhes pa gang 'di mtha' gcig pa'i nges pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhes na rgyu gcig sngon ma can rnams so zhes pa gang 'di mtha' gcig pa'i nges pa ste /
translated: This is a definite conclusion.

original: de las bzlog na gcig sngon ma can nyid med na bsal ba ni tha dad par thal bar 'gyur bar rigs te /
analyzed: de las bzlog na gcig sngon ma can nyid med na bsal ba ni tha dad par thal bar 'gyur bar rigs te /
translated: If that is reversed, if there is no prior single cause, it is correct that the consequence is that they are different.

original: dper byas pa rnams mi rtag pa nyid du mtha' gcig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dper byas pa rnams mi rtag pa nyid du mtha' gcig pa'i phyir /
translated: For example, because it is a definite conclusion that all examples are impermanent,

original: sgra ni mi rtag pa nyid las bzlog pa yin na /
analyzed: sgra ni mi rtag pa nyid las bzlog pa yin na /
translated: if sound is reversed from impermanence,

original: ma byas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ma byas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: it follows that it is not produced.

original: de ltar yang yongs su lhag pa bzlog pa la zhes pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang yongs su lhag pa bzlog pa la zhes pa /
translated: In that way also, it is said: ‚ÄúThe reversal of the remainder.‚Äù

original: ji lta ba bzhin nyid du brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin nyid du brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not expressed in just that way.

original: 'di med pa las skye ba min gyi /
analyzed: 'di med pa las skye ba min gyi /
translated: It is not that it arises from the absence of this.

original: yongs su lhag ma las gsal ba 'di gtso bo kho na las skye'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su lhag ma las gsal ba 'di gtso bo kho na las skye'o zhes pa'o //
translated: This is the remainder that is clearly produced only from the principal.

original: de ltar na yang yongs su lhag ma ni rigs so zhes pa'i bsam pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na yang yongs su lhag ma ni rigs so zhes pa'i bsam pa'o //
translated: Thus, the remainder is reasonable.

original: 'di lta na yang zhes ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: 'di lta na yang zhes ba la sogs pas /
translated: In this way also, etc.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus also,

original: yongs su lhag ma bzlog pa la //
analyzed: yongs su lhag ma bzlog pa la //
translated: the remainder is to be refuted.

original: zhes pa 'dis don gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis don gsal bar byed de /
translated: This clarifies the meaning.

original: rigs gcig pa rnams gcig sngon ma can nyid du rjes su dpog pas zhes pas /
analyzed: rigs gcig pa rnams gcig sngon ma can nyid du rjes su dpog pas zhes pas /
translated: Since one infers that those of the same type have a single prior existence,

original: tha mi dad pa rnams gcig sngon ma can nyid du mtha' gcig pa rjes su brjod do //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa rnams gcig sngon ma can nyid du mtha' gcig pa rjes su brjod do //
translated: one concludes that those of the same continuum have a single prior existence.

original: med pa sngon ma can nyid la sogs pa nyid ces pa gcig sngon ma can nyid med pa gsungs so //
analyzed: med pa sngon ma can nyid la sogs pa nyid ces pa gcig sngon ma can nyid med pa gsungs so //
translated: The absence of a prior existence, etc. is said to be the absence of a single prior existence.

original: de la gcig sngon ma can nyid med na yongs su ba'i lhag ma las tha dad par thal bar rigs te /
analyzed: de la gcig sngon ma can nyid med na yongs su ba'i lhag ma las tha dad par thal bar rigs te /
translated: If there is no single prior existence, then it is reasonable that the remainder is different from the complete.

original: de kho na de yongs su ba'i lhag ma'i yul yin zhes bya nas so //
analyzed: de kho na de yongs su ba'i lhag ma'i yul yin zhes bya nas so //
translated: Since that is the object of the remainder, it is said to be that.

original: yongs su lhag ma las gcig sngon ma can nyid rjes su dpog pa ma yin zhe pa /
analyzed: yongs su lhag ma las gcig sngon ma can nyid rjes su dpog pa ma yin zhe pa /
translated: But it is not that the remainder is inferred to be the same as the prior.

original: gtan tshigs kyis phan mi 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyis phan mi 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason does not help.

original: gal te gsal ba ni med pa @204a * //
analyzed: gal te gsal ba ni med pa @204a * //
translated: If the manifest were produced from the non-existent,

original: las skye na skye gnas med pa'i phyir tha dad par 'gyur ro zhes byed pa na /
analyzed: las skye na skye gnas med pa'i phyir tha dad par 'gyur ro zhes byed pa na /
translated: because there would be no place of birth, there would be a difference.

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i gtan tshigs kyis phan pa ci yang byas par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i gtan tshigs kyis phan pa ci yang byas par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason of concomitance does not help at all.

original: de las yang zhes pa la sogs pas kyang /
analyzed: de las yang zhes pa la sogs pas kyang /
translated: In from that, again, etc.,

original: rnam par ldan pa ma yin pa dag gi tha mi dad par ston te /
analyzed: rnam par ldan pa ma yin pa dag gi tha mi dad par ston te /
translated: it also shows that there is no difference between the manifest and the unmanifest.

original: de la'i sgras ni rjes su 'gro ba'i ba la snyeg go //
analyzed: de la'i sgras ni rjes su 'gro ba'i ba la snyeg go //
translated: The word 'from that' refers to the concomitance.

original: gal te gsal ba la ni med pa las skye na skye gnas med pa'i phyir tha dad par thal bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba la ni med pa las skye na skye gnas med pa'i phyir tha dad par thal bar 'gyur na /
translated: If the manifest were produced from the non-existent, because there would be no place of birth, there would be a difference.

original: tha dad pa yod pa yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tha dad pa yod pa yang ma yin gyi /
translated: But there is no difference.

original: 'o na ci zhe na rigs gcig yang dag par rjes su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na rigs gcig yang dag par rjes su 'gro ba'o //
translated: Rather, there is correct concomitance in the same class.

original: de'i phyir rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir rgyu gcig sngon ma can ni gsal pa'o zhes pa dag gi don 'di ni thal bar 'gyur ba dang bzlog pas nye bar skye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir rgyu gcig sngon ma can ni gsal pa'o zhes pa dag gi don 'di ni thal bar 'gyur ba dang bzlog pas nye bar skye'o //
translated: Therefore, because of the single type of following, the single cause is the prior clarity. The meaning of this is generated by the reductio and its contrapositive.

original: de'i phyir rnam par ldan pa dang bsal te 'ongs pa dag gi tha dad pa med de /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par ldan pa dang bsal te 'ongs pa dag gi tha dad pa med de /
translated: Therefore, the difference between the endowed and the cleared is not tenable.

original: gnyig la ngag gi don mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyig la ngag gi don mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning of the statement is the same in both cases.

original: de'i phyir yang gang brjod pa 'di ltar rnam par ldan pa lnga po 'di rnams kyi gtso bo yongs su gzung ba byas nas slar yang bsal te 'ongs pa rnams kyi bya'o zhes pa 'di mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang gang brjod pa 'di ltar rnam par ldan pa lnga po 'di rnams kyi gtso bo yongs su gzung ba byas nas slar yang bsal te 'ongs pa rnams kyi bya'o zhes pa 'di mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is also illogical to say, ‚ÄúHaving taken the principal one of these five endowed ones, again the cleared ones are to be taken.‚Äù

original: sbyor ba yang 'di ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba yang 'di ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The syllogism is this.

original: gtso bo sngon ma can du gsal pa bsgrub par bya zhing /
analyzed: gtso bo sngon ma can du gsal pa bsgrub par bya zhing /
translated: The principal one is to be established as the prior clarity.

original: de mi 'dod pa rnams la mi 'dod pa 'bab par nye bar ston pas sbyor ba 'di ltar bya'o //
analyzed: de mi 'dod pa rnams la mi 'dod pa 'bab par nye bar ston pas sbyor ba 'di ltar bya'o //
translated: For those who do not assert this, the undesirable consequence is to be shown to follow. Therefore, the syllogism is to be stated in this way.

original: gal te gsal ba ni gcig las skye ba ma yin na zhes pa /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba ni gcig las skye ba ma yin na zhes pa /
translated: If the manifest does not arise from one,

original: gang gi phyir khyab par byed pa'i don gyi dngos po med na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyab par byed pa'i don gyi dngos po med na /
translated: then because the entity of the pervader does not exist,

original: khyab par bya ba zlog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyab par bya ba zlog par 'gyur te /
translated: the pervaded is refuted.

original: 'dir yang gcig sngon ma can nyid kyis rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba la khyab ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang gcig sngon ma can nyid kyis rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba la khyab ste /
translated: Here, too, having a single prior cause entails belonging to a single type.

original: gang gi phyir rigs gcig dang ldan pa rnams gcig sngon ma can nyid du mthong gi / med pa sngon ma can ma yin zhing dbang phyug la sogs pa sngon ma can nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rigs gcig dang ldan pa rnams gcig sngon ma can nyid du mthong gi / med pa sngon ma can ma yin zhing dbang phyug la sogs pa sngon ma can nyid ma yin no //
translated: Because those that belong to a single type are seen to have a single prior cause, not having a prior cause is not having a prior cause, and having a prior cause is not having a prior cause.

original: de'i phyir gal te gcig las skye ba ma yin na ni zhes pa 'di ltar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te gcig las skye ba ma yin na ni zhes pa 'di ltar brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, if the manifest does not arise from one, then it should be said that it does not arise from one.

original: 'o na gal te med pa las skye na zhes pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te med pa las skye na zhes pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Well, if it arises from a non-existent cause, then why is it not said that it arises from a non-existent cause?

original: yod pa sngon ma can nyid tsam bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin pas so zhes pa 'di la rtsod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa sngon ma can nyid tsam bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin pas so zhes pa 'di la rtsod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not being proven that it has a prior existent cause.

original: rigs gcig pa can med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa 'dis kyang ngo //
analyzed: rigs gcig pa can med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa 'dis kyang ngo //
translated: It follows that there is no such thing as a single class.

original: tha dad pa smos pa ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa nye bar mtshon pa'i don du @204b bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa smos pa ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa nye bar mtshon pa'i don du @204b bshad par bya ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúdifferent‚Äù should be explained as meaning ‚Äúwithout concomitance.‚Äù

original: bsgrub par bya ba med na gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir zhes ston to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med na gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir zhes ston to //
translated: The point is that if there is no probandum, there is no probans.

original: yongs su lhag pa las kyang zhes pa thams cad las lhag ma ni yongs su lhag pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su lhag pa las kyang zhes pa thams cad las lhag ma ni yongs su lhag pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the remainder of the complete‚Äù means that the remainder of all is the complete remainder.

original: 'dir thams cad kyi ci zhe na zla bo'i phyogs su'o //
analyzed: 'dir thams cad kyi ci zhe na zla bo'i phyogs su'o //
translated: What is the remainder of all? The class of the counter-correlate.

original: de yang rnam ba du ma ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam ba du ma ste /
translated: And that is of many kinds,

original: thams cad kyi mtha' gcig pa can skyes bu dang dbang phyug la sogs pa'i dbye ba las so //
analyzed: thams cad kyi mtha' gcig pa can skyes bu dang dbang phyug la sogs pa'i dbye ba las so //
translated: because of the difference of the single end of all, such as the person, ƒ™≈õvara, etc.

original: de thams cad bkag pas yongs su lhag ma rigs te /
analyzed: de thams cad bkag pas yongs su lhag ma rigs te /
translated: All of that is excluded, and the complete remainder is the class.

original: 'di med pa las skye ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: 'di med pa las skye ba yang ma yin /
translated: It is not produced from the non-existent,

original: dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams las kyang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams las kyang ma yin gyi /
translated: nor from ƒ™≈õvara, etc.

original: yongs su'i lhag ma las gtso bo kho na las so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su'i lhag ma las gtso bo kho na las so zhes pa'o //
translated: But from the complete remainder, only from the principal.

original: gzhan du na med pa las skye ba ma yin zhes bya ba na /
analyzed: gzhan du na med pa las skye ba ma yin zhes bya ba na /
translated: Otherwise, if it were said, ‚ÄúIt does not arise from what does not exist,‚Äù

original: yongs su lhag ma las dbang phyug la sogs pa kho na las so zhes par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su lhag ma las dbang phyug la sogs pa kho na las so zhes par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would follow that this manifestation arises from just God and so on, the remainder of what is not nonexistent.

original: lnga nyid min pa dang zhes pa'i dang gi sgra las gcig gsal ba na /
analyzed: lnga nyid min pa dang zhes pa'i dang gi sgra las gcig gsal ba na /
translated: The word ‚Äúand‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúnot five‚Äù indicates that one is excluded.

original: yongs su lhag ma 'di rigs pa min no //
analyzed: yongs su lhag ma 'di rigs pa min no //
translated: This remainder is not logical.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: lnga nyid min zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: lnga nyid min zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because it is said, ‚ÄúIt is not five.‚Äù

original: 'di ni min zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: 'di ni min zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: This is not so, and so on.

original: 'di ni med pa las skye ba ma yin gyi /üîΩyongs su lhag ma las gtso bo kho na las gsal ba 'di skye'o zhes pa 'di ni yongs su lhag ma'i mtshan nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni med pa las skye ba ma yin gyi / yongs su lhag ma las gtso bo kho na las gsal ba 'di skye'o zhes pa 'di ni yongs su lhag ma'i mtshan nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not arising from what does not exist.

original: gang gi phyir kun nas lhag ma ni yongs su lhag ma yin zhing /üîΩgtso bo kho na'ang yongs su lhag ma ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kun nas lhag ma ni yongs su lhag ma yin zhing / gtso bo kho na'ang yongs su lhag ma ma yin te /
translated: This manifestation arises from just the remainder, the primary nature. This is not related to the definition of the remainder because the remainder is the entirety.

original: phyogs gzhan so sor bkag pa ma yin pa rnams kyang yongs su lhag mar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs gzhan so sor bkag pa ma yin pa rnams kyang yongs su lhag mar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The primary nature alone is not the remainder because the other parts that are not individually refuted are also to be included in the remainder.

original: gang gi tshe gzhan gyi phyogs thams cad rgyu nyid du bkag par gyur pa de'i tshe gtso bo kho na yongs su lhag mar 'gyur ro zhes pas /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzhan gyi phyogs thams cad rgyu nyid du bkag par gyur pa de'i tshe gtso bo kho na yongs su lhag mar 'gyur ro zhes pas /
translated: When all other positions are refuted as causes, then only the primal matter would remain.

original: yongs su lhag ma las bsal te 'ongs pa gcig kho nar 'gyur gyi lnga ma yin no //
analyzed: yongs su lhag ma las bsal te 'ongs pa gcig kho nar 'gyur gyi lnga ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is the remainder, it would be the only one, not five.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: This is so,

original: rgol pa thams cad bkag pas yongs su lhag mar 'dod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rgol pa thams cad bkag pas yongs su lhag mar 'dod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: but it is not asserted that all positions are refuted and only the remainder remains.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: gzhan gyi phyogs re re bkag pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyogs re re bkag pas so //
translated: It is by refuting each of the other positions.

original: de'i phyir bsal te 'ongs pa gcig nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsal te 'ongs pa gcig nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not that it would be the only one,

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: but what then?

original: lnga nyid kho nar te /
analyzed: lnga nyid kho nar te /
translated: It would be five alone,

original: so so bas yongs su lhag mar rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: so so bas yongs su lhag mar rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is understood as the remainder of each individual one.

original: de ltar ni 'dir tha dad pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa thabs lnga po rnams nges par bstan to zhe na /üîΩgsungs pa / rgol pa gcig ni bkag @205a * //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'dir tha dad pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa thabs lnga po rnams nges par bstan to zhe na / gsungs pa / rgol pa gcig ni bkag @205a * //
translated: Thus, here the five methods such as the consequence of nondifference are definitely taught.

original: pa yis // zhes pa la sogs pas te /
analyzed: pa yis // zhes pa la sogs pas te /
translated: The reply is ‚ÄúBy refuting one opponent,‚Äù and so on.

original: de lta na yang bsal te 'ongs pa rnams lnga nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na yang bsal te 'ongs pa rnams lnga nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, the five modes of refutation and proof would not exist,

original: gang gi phyir lha rnams las lhag pa'i rgol ba 'gegs pa'i thabs rnams yin pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir lha rnams las lhag pa'i rgol ba 'gegs pa'i thabs rnams yin pas so //
translated: because they are the means of refuting the opponent who is superior to the gods.

original: yang na gal te rgol ba gcig bkag pa na yang /
analyzed: yang na gal te rgol ba gcig bkag pa na yang /
translated: Or, if one refutes one opponent,

original: yongs su lhag ma'i thabs su 'dod na bsal te 'ongs pa rnam lnga nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: yongs su lhag ma'i thabs su 'dod na bsal te 'ongs pa rnam lnga nyid ma yin te /
translated: and if one asserts that the remaining means are for the remainder, then the five modes of refutation and proof do not exist,

original: rgol ba mtha' yas pa rnams dgag par bya ba pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgol ba mtha' yas pa rnams dgag par bya ba pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the opponents are infinite and to be refuted.

original: mtha' yas pa'i sgras 'dir lnga rnams las lhag pa nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa'i sgras 'dir lnga rnams las lhag pa nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúinfinite‚Äù here illustrates that there are more than five.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang pa rnams bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang pa rnams bsam par bya ste /
translated: The fallacious reasons should be considered,

original: de las bzlog pas gtan tshigs gsal ba khong du chud pa'i don du'o //üîΩgang ma bshad pa ma grub pa'i dbye ba 'di ci yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de las bzlog pas gtan tshigs gsal ba khong du chud pa'i don du'o // gang ma bshad pa ma grub pa'i dbye ba 'di ci yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: because their opposites are for the purpose of understanding the clear reasons.üîΩWhat is this division of unestablished reasons that has not been explained? It is said:

original: de ni gang yang rung ba ma grub ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni gang yang rung ba ma grub ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat is by the division of any unestablished reason, etc.‚Äù

original: 'o na mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid dang 'dra ba las de rnams phyogs chos med pa nyid du bshad pa byas pa ma yin na ma zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid dang 'dra ba las de rnams phyogs chos med pa nyid du bshad pa byas pa ma yin na ma zhe na /
translated: But if the reason is not stated in the same way as the object held by the eye, then the subject property is not stated.

original: gsungs pa / mtshan nyid brjod pa med na de 'dra ba khong du chud /
analyzed: gsungs pa / mtshan nyid brjod pa med na de 'dra ba khong du chud /
translated: It is said: If the definition is not stated, then that is understood.

original: 'o na don dang mthun pa'i ming bstan pa kho na las /
analyzed: 'o na don dang mthun pa'i ming bstan pa kho na las /
translated: But if the name that accords with the object is taught,

original: 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid shes pa yang ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid shes pa yang ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: isn‚Äôt the definition of these known?

original: khyad par yongs su mi shes pa las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par yongs su mi shes pa las ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not known from not knowing the distinction.

original: ma grub pa zhes par mi shes te /
analyzed: ma grub pa zhes par mi shes te /
translated: It is not known as ‚Äúunestablished.‚Äù

original: ci zhig tu ma grub pa zhes so //
analyzed: ci zhig tu ma grub pa zhes so //
translated: What is it that is not established?

original: 'o na slob dpon gyis kyang ma grub pa'i dbye ba bshad pa med pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na slob dpon gyis kyang ma grub pa'i dbye ba bshad pa med pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it that the master also does not explain the divisions of nonestablishment?

original: phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la ma grub pa dang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig ma grub pa dag ma brjod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la ma grub pa dang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig ma grub pa dag ma brjod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because he does not state nonestablishment in one part of the subject or nonestablishment in one part of the meaning of the thesis.

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: mtshan nyid brjod pa las /
analyzed: mtshan nyid brjod pa las /
translated: From the statement of the definition:

original: spyir dper brjod pa mtha' dag rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyir dper brjod pa mtha' dag rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In general, all examples are for the sake of understanding.

original: 'o na 'dir yang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa las /
analyzed: 'o na 'dir yang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa las /
translated: If that is so, then here also, because the nature of the reason is understood,

original: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid las bzlog pas bde blag tu shes pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan nyid ma brjod na yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na 'di yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid las bzlog pas bde blag tu shes pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan nyid ma brjod na yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na 'di yod pa ma yin te /
translated: and because the opposite of the definition of the reason is easily understood, then even if the definition is not stated, the nature of all fallacious reasons will be understood.

original: de 'dra ba med na mi 'byung ba'i chos ston pa gtan tshigs so zhes pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid las ma grub pa ma bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'dra ba med na mi 'byung ba'i chos ston pa gtan tshigs so zhes pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid las ma grub pa ma bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not the case, because the nonestablishment of the reason is not eliminated by the statement ‚ÄúThe definition of a reason is that which, when it is like that, is a property of the subject.‚Äù

original: de ltar yang gsungs zin te /üîΩmig gi gzung sogs sgra @205b yi ni //
analyzed: de ltar yang gsungs zin te / mig gi gzung sogs sgra @205b yi ni //
translated: This is also stated in the following:üîΩThe sound of the word ‚Äúimpermanent‚Äù

original: mi rtag pa la gtan tshigs 'gyur //
analyzed: mi rtag pa la gtan tshigs 'gyur //
translated: is a reason for the eyes‚Äô being a perceptible object.üîΩAnd also:

original: zhes so // gang yang 'di'i don ma grub bo zhes pas ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // gang yang 'di'i don ma grub bo zhes pas ma grub pa'o //
translated: The meaning of this is not established.

original: ci zhig tu ma grub ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig tu ma grub ce na /
translated: What is not established?

original: nye ba las phyogs su byas pa kho na'i chos can la'o //
analyzed: nye ba las phyogs su byas pa kho na'i chos can la'o //
translated: The property of the subject that is taken as the subject.

original: des na gang yang rung ba la ma grub pa la sogs pa rnams kyang gsal ba byas pa kho na'o zhes sems pa de'i gtan tshigs kyi sgra kho nas gtan tshigs rtogs zin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: des na gang yang rung ba la ma grub pa la sogs pa rnams kyang gsal ba byas pa kho na'o zhes sems pa de'i gtan tshigs kyi sgra kho nas gtan tshigs rtogs zin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore, the mere sound of the reason is sufficient to understand the reason, since the other aspects such as the subject not being established are already understood.üîΩ

original: mtshan nyid brjod pa'i 'bad pa don med do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid brjod pa'i 'bad pa don med do //
translated: Therefore, the mere sound of the reason itself makes one understand the reason, so it is pointless to make an effort to state the definition.

original: gang dbye ba ma bshad pa'i 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can de ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang dbye ba ma bshad pa'i 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can de ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the nonerroneous contradictory that is not explained in terms of a division?

original: gsungs pa / de yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / de yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThat also,‚Äù and so on.

original: thun mong ma yin pa yang yod cing /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa yang yod cing /
translated: There is also a noncommon one.

original: gang lus can nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can /
analyzed: gang lus can nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can /
translated: That which has the characteristic of being embodied and so on

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can yang ngo //
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can yang ngo //
translated: is also a nonerroneous contradictory.

original: 'gal ba gcig ni spyi yin no zhes pa bye brag pa'i spyi dbang po gzung bar bya ba rnams yod de /
analyzed: 'gal ba gcig ni spyi yin no zhes pa bye brag pa'i spyi dbang po gzung bar bya ba rnams yod de /
translated: One contradiction is a universal. The Vai≈õe·π£ika asserts that the universals of the objects of the senses exist.

original: de'i phyir dbang po gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa'o zhes sgrub par byed pa la de 'gal ba'i phyir 'gal ba zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa'o zhes sgrub par byed pa la de 'gal ba'i phyir 'gal ba zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, because it is an object of the senses, it is impermanent. Since that is contradictory, it should be called a contradiction.

original: 'di bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba yang ma yin gyi /
translated: In order to refute this, the opponent says, ‚ÄúIt is not contradictory.

original: 'on kyang rtag pa dang mi rtag pa rnams la thun mong du bum pa la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba'i phyir ma nges pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtag pa dang mi rtag pa rnams la thun mong du bum pa la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba'i phyir ma nges pa kho na'o //
translated: However, it is just uncertain because permanence and impermanence are seen in common in pots and so on.‚Äù

original: grangs can pa'i rgyu la 'bras bu yod de /
analyzed: grangs can pa'i rgyu la 'bras bu yod de /
translated: The SƒÅ·πÉkhya says, ‚ÄúThe effect exists in the cause

original: 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa 'byung ba ni yod pa nyid dang 'gal ba'o zhes pas dam bca'i don sel ba'i phyir 'gal ba gnyis pa'o lo //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa 'byung ba ni yod pa nyid dang 'gal ba'o zhes pas dam bca'i don sel ba'i phyir 'gal ba gnyis pa'o lo //
translated: because of arising.‚Äù Since arising is contradictory with existence, the meaning of the thesis is eliminated, and so it is the second contradiction.

original: 'di yang ma grub pa dang thun mong min par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di yang ma grub pa dang thun mong min par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is also unestablished and not commonly accepted.

original: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How so? It is said:

original: thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúEverything‚Äù and so on.

original: 'bras bu ni skye ba las sngar thams cad yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni skye ba las sngar thams cad yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: The effect should be established as existing prior to arising.

original: skyes zin pa yod pa nyid la ni rtsod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes zin pa yod pa nyid la ni rtsod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is not disputed that what has already arisen exists,

original: skye ba las sngar 'byung ba ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: skye ba las sngar 'byung ba ni mi rigs te /
translated: it is illogical for it to arise prior to arising.

original: gang las 'byung ba ni yod pa 'byung ba kho na yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang las 'byung ba ni yod pa 'byung ba kho na yin pa'o //
translated: That from which it arises is only that which exists.

original: 'byung ba ni 'dir 'byung brjod par 'dod pa'o zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'byung ba ni 'dir 'byung brjod par 'dod pa'o zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that arising is what is meant by arising here, that is not so.

original: gang yod pa de ni skyes zin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gang yod pa de ni skyes zin pa kho na ste /
translated: That which exists is only that which has already arisen.

original: cis na skye ba yin /
analyzed: cis na skye ba yin /
translated: How could it arise again?

original: skye ba ni bdag nyid 'thob pa yin na /
analyzed: skye ba ni bdag nyid 'thob pa yin na /
translated: If arising is the attainment of its own nature,

original: yod pa nyid ni bdag nyid kyi 'thob bar byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa nyid ni bdag nyid kyi 'thob bar byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: that which exists is not that which causes the attainment of its own nature.

original: skye ba'i ched du 'byung ba de kho na 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i ched du 'byung ba de kho na 'byung ba'o //
translated: That arising for the sake of which it arises is just arising.

original: 'bras bu rnams thams cad yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'bras bu rnams thams cad yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because all effects are established as existing,

original: de las gzhan la 'byung pa med pa'i phyir /üîΩthun mong ma yin pa @206a * //üîΩyin gyi 'gal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de las gzhan la 'byung pa med pa'i phyir / thun mong ma yin pa @206a * // yin gyi 'gal ba ma yin te /
translated: arising does not exist in that which is different from it.

original: bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not contradictory because it is not a reason for the opposite,

original: ma nges pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ma nges pa bzhin no //
translated: like the uncertain reason.üîΩThe reason for the opposite

original: bzlog pa yi ni rgyu mtshan dang // 'dod la gnod par byed ma brjod //
analyzed: bzlog pa yi ni rgyu mtshan dang // 'dod la gnod par byed ma brjod //
translated: and the harm to the assertion are not stated.

original: ces pas dper brjod las kyang ma tshang ba nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: ces pas dper brjod las kyang ma tshang ba nyid gsungs so //
translated: Thus, it is said that even in the example, there is incompleteness.

original: 'dod bar 'gyur te 'di rnams kyi nang kho nar 'di dag 'dus byas par 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dod bar 'gyur te 'di rnams kyi nang kho nar 'di dag 'dus byas par 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If it is said that it is desired that these are included in these alone, then it is said:

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNo,‚Äù and so on.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: Although it is so,

original: de dag gtan tshigs ltar snang bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gtan tshigs ltar snang bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: it is not the case that these are merely apparent reasons.

original: gsungs pa / ma yin zhes pa la sogs ba ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / ma yin zhes pa la sogs ba ste /
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúNo,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di kho na la gtan tshigs gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di kho na la gtan tshigs gsungs pa /
translated: This alone is said to be the reason.

original: bzlog pa dang gnod pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bzlog pa dang gnod pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Because it is the reason of contradiction and harm.

original: de la ma nges pa ni 'khrul pa dang bcas pa'o zhes pa 'khrul pa dang lhan cig pa ni 'khrul pa dang bcas ba'o //
analyzed: de la ma nges pa ni 'khrul pa dang bcas pa'o zhes pa 'khrul pa dang lhan cig pa ni 'khrul pa dang bcas ba'o //
translated: Regarding that, the uncertain is the one with error. The one with error is the one with error together.

original: 'khrul pa ni gzhan la yod pa ste /
analyzed: 'khrul pa ni gzhan la yod pa ste /
translated: Error is the one that exists elsewhere.

original: gcig la gnas pa ma yin pa nyid ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: gcig la gnas pa ma yin pa nyid ces pa'i don to //
translated: It is not the one that exists in one. This is the meaning.

original: de yang ma nges pa la yod de /
analyzed: de yang ma nges pa la yod de /
translated: Moreover, that exists in the uncertain.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni 'khrul pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni 'khrul pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this is the one with error.

original: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This is what is stated in the lines beginning ‚ÄúThis is not so, etc.‚Äù

original: khyad par med par ni spyir brjod pa nyid las ma nges pa'i sgra ni khyad par la gnas pa 'thob pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par med par ni spyir brjod pa nyid las ma nges pa'i sgra ni khyad par la gnas pa 'thob pa ma yin te /
translated: Without distinction, the general statement itself is not a term that is restricted to a particular case.

original: de las kyang gtan tshigs kyang ma nges par 'gyur ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang gtan tshigs kyang ma nges par 'gyur ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: The point is that even from that, the reason would be indeterminate.

original: de ltar ni der yang phyogs las gzhan la'ang 'jug ste /
analyzed: de ltar ni der yang phyogs las gzhan la'ang 'jug ste /
translated: In this way, it also applies to something other than the subject.

original: mtha' gcig tu phyogs kho na la ma yin no //
analyzed: mtha' gcig tu phyogs kho na la ma yin no //
translated: It is not restricted to the subject alone.

original: des na khyad par du byas nas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: des na khyad par du byas nas brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be stated with a distinction.

original: 'o na spyi'i sgra yang khyad par la gnas pa mthong ste /
analyzed: 'o na spyi'i sgra yang khyad par la gnas pa mthong ste /
translated: Well, a general term is also seen to be restricted to a particular case,

original: dper na 'ga' zhig 'ongs so zhes pa bzhin /
analyzed: dper na 'ga' zhig 'ongs so zhes pa bzhin /
translated: just as when someone says, ‚ÄúSomeone has come.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir spyi'i sgra 'di yang khyad par la gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi'i sgra 'di yang khyad par la gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, this general term would also be restricted to a particular case.

original: des na bsgrub bya'i rigs kho na la 'jug pa ma yin pa de kho na ma nges pa'o zhes rtogs par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: des na bsgrub bya'i rigs kho na la 'jug pa ma yin pa de kho na ma nges pa'o zhes rtogs par bya'o zhe na /
translated: Thus, it should be understood that it is only the type of probandum that is not restricted to a particular case.

original: gsungs pa / ma yin zhes pa la sogs ba'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / ma yin zhes pa la sogs ba'o //
translated: To this it is said: ‚ÄúNo, etc.‚Äù

original: 'di nyid la dpe gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di nyid la dpe gsungs pa /
translated: An example is stated for this very point:

original: gnyis ka ltar na zhes ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka ltar na zhes ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: In both cases, etc.

original: gnyis kyi sgras ni spyir brjod pa yang 'gal ba can dang mi 'gal ba can nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis kyi sgras ni spyir brjod pa yang 'gal ba can dang mi 'gal ba can nyid do //
translated: The word both refers to the contradictory and non-contradictory.

original: yon tan gyi 'bras bus skabs su byas pa gang zhig shes par byed de /
analyzed: yon tan gyi 'bras bus skabs su byas pa gang zhig shes par byed de /
translated: What is the effect of the quality that is being discussed?

original: skabs kyi stobs las so //üîΩde kho na so so'i khyad par la gnas te /
analyzed: skabs kyi stobs las so // de kho na so so'i khyad par la gnas te /
translated: It is the effect of the context.

original: 'bras bu'i 'gal ba can dang mi 'gal ba can no zhes ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i 'gal ba can dang mi 'gal ba can no zhes ba'o //
translated: It is the particularity of reality itself, which is the contradictory and non-contradictory effect.

original: ci ste yang zhes pa la sogs pas @206b ni spyi'i sgra nyid la gnod par byed do //
analyzed: ci ste yang zhes pa la sogs pas @206b ni spyi'i sgra nyid la gnod par byed do //
translated: If one says, But the word 'both' is itself contradictory, etc.,üîΩ one should understand that the word 'both' is not contradictory.

original: gang ma yin pa dgag pas ma nges pa nyid du rig par bya ba nges pa nyid ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang ma yin pa dgag pas ma nges pa nyid du rig par bya ba nges pa nyid ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the certainty that is to be understood?

original: bshad pa gang zhig ces ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa gang zhig ces ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The explanation is that which is the object of a statement, etc.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang so sor nye ba nyid kyi phyir rtag tu ba nyid las bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs kho na la gang 'jug pa de ni nges pa nyid de /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang so sor nye ba nyid kyi phyir rtag tu ba nyid las bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs kho na la gang 'jug pa de ni nges pa nyid de /
translated: That which is always engaged in the probandum alone, because of being proximate to the probandum, is certainty.

original: de dgag pas ma nges pa nyid khyad par du byas pa kho na rtogs par bya'o zhes sems so //
analyzed: de dgag pas ma nges pa nyid khyad par du byas pa kho na rtogs par bya'o zhes sems so //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that the mere negation of that is the very qualifier.

original: de lta na yang khyad par du byas pa ma yin te zhes bas /
analyzed: de lta na yang khyad par du byas pa ma yin te zhes bas /
translated: But even so, it is not a qualifier, as stated by the opponent.

original: rnam par rtog pa 'di la yang //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa 'di la yang //
translated: In this conception,

original: 'di khyad par gyi sgra ma yin pa kho na'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: 'di khyad par gyi sgra ma yin pa kho na'o zhes ston to //
translated: the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù does not refer to a qualifier.

original: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How so? It is stated:

original: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus, etc.‚Äù

original: gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs kho na la 'jug pa de nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs kho na la 'jug pa de nges pa nyid do //
translated: That which engages only in the type of object to be established is indeed ascertained.

original: 'di las don gyis rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di las don gyis rtogs par bya ste /
translated: This should be understood from the meaning of this [verse].

original: gang gi bsgrub bya med pa'am //
analyzed: gang gi bsgrub bya med pa'am //
translated: If it engages in the absence of the object to be established,

original: nge las gzhan pa'am /
analyzed: nge las gzhan pa'am /
translated: or in something other than that,

original: de dang 'gal ba la 'jug pa ma nges pa nyid do zhes so //
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba la 'jug pa ma nges pa nyid do zhes so //
