translated: or in what is contradictory to that, it is not ascertained.

original: de las kyang ji srid bsgrub par bya ba med pa la sogs pa rnams la 'jug pa cung zad pa de thams cad ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur ram /
analyzed: de las kyang ji srid bsgrub par bya ba med pa la sogs pa rnams la 'jug pa cung zad pa de thams cad ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur ram /
translated: Moreover, to the extent that it engages in the absence of the object to be established, etc., all of that becomes non-ascertainment.

original: 'on te 'dod pa kho nar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te 'dod pa kho nar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: Or is it only what is intended?

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúIt is not stated.‚Äù

original: gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs la 'jug pa yod na /
analyzed: gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs la 'jug pa yod na /
translated: If there is engagement in the type of object to be established,

original: de med pa la sogs pa rnams la 'jug pa ma mthong ba 'am srid pa de ma nges pa nyid du rigs so //
analyzed: de med pa la sogs pa rnams la 'jug pa ma mthong ba 'am srid pa de ma nges pa nyid du rigs so //
translated: then it is reasonable that the non-engagement in the absence of that, etc. is not ascertained.

original: gang gis bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs med pa la sogs pa kho na la 'jug cing bsgrub bya'i rigs la ni ma yin /
analyzed: gang gis bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs med pa la sogs pa kho na la 'jug cing bsgrub bya'i rigs la ni ma yin /
translated: But if there is engagement only in the absence of the type of object to be established, etc., and not in the type of object to be established,

original: de ci ltar ma nges pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de ci ltar ma nges pa nyid yin te /
translated: how could that be uncertain?

original: de ni bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba nyid du drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba nyid du drang bar bya'o //
translated: That should be interpreted as contradictory because it establishes the opposite.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod /
translated: This is possible,

original: nges pa nyid bkag pas /
analyzed: nges pa nyid bkag pas /
translated: but by negating certainty,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs can la 'jug pa bzhin gang gis gzhan la yang 'jug pa de kho na ma nges pa nyid du rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs can la 'jug pa bzhin gang gis gzhan la yang 'jug pa de kho na ma nges pa nyid du rtogs par bya ste /
translated: it should be understood that whatever engages in another in the same way that it engages in the type of object to be established is uncertain.

original: de'i phyir skyon 'di med do zhe na gal te de lta na gtan tshigs kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs can las kyang gzhan phyogs la 'jug pa yod do zhes pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir skyon 'di med do zhe na gal te de lta na gtan tshigs kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs can las kyang gzhan phyogs la 'jug pa yod do zhes pas /
translated: Therefore, this fault does not exist.üîΩIf it were like that, then the reason would also be present in the class of the probandum, and it would be said that it is present in the other side.

original: de yang ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pas 'di ni lan ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de yang ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pas 'di ni lan ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: And that would be uncertain, so this is not an answer at all.

original: sngar bshad zin to zhes pa /
analyzed: sngar bshad zin to zhes pa /
translated: It was explained earlier.

original: 'di las bzlog pa ni 'gal ba'o zhes 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid byed pas so //
analyzed: 'di las bzlog pa ni 'gal ba'o zhes 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid byed pas so //
translated: The opposite of that is contradictory, because it is the definition of contradiction.

original: don gyis bsgrub bya'i rigs med pa la sogs pa rnams la 'jug @207a * //
analyzed: don gyis bsgrub bya'i rigs med pa la sogs pa rnams la 'jug @207a * //
translated: It is said that the reason is present in the class of the probandum, and it is present in the class of the opposite of the probandum, and it is present in the class of the absence of the probandum, and so on.

original: pa yod de thams cad ni 'khrul pa dang bcas pa'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa yod de thams cad ni 'khrul pa dang bcas pa'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is said that all of them are fallacious.

original: dper na bye brag pa'i zhes pa /
analyzed: dper na bye brag pa'i zhes pa /
translated: For example, the Vai≈õe·π£ika says:

original: des na rdzas rnams ni rdzas gzhan rtsol bar byed do zhes pa'i thams cad du song ba'i rdzas kyi tshad ni lus can no zhes pa'i brjod pa las rdul phra rab rnams rtsom par byed pa nyid dang lus can nyid du khas blangs so //
analyzed: des na rdzas rnams ni rdzas gzhan rtsol bar byed do zhes pa'i thams cad du song ba'i rdzas kyi tshad ni lus can no zhes pa'i brjod pa las rdul phra rab rnams rtsom par byed pa nyid dang lus can nyid du khas blangs so //
translated: Therefore, the substance that is the cause of the production of another substance is a body, because it is said that the measure of a substance that is omnipresent is a body.

original: de ltar khas blangs nas rdul phra rab rnams ni rtsom pa po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar khas blangs nas rdul phra rab rnams ni rtsom pa po ma yin te /
translated: Having accepted that, you say that atoms are not the cause of production,

original: lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes smras pa /
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes smras pa /
translated: because they are not bodies.

original: grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba'i phyir na 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba'i phyir na 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This is contradictory, because it contradicts your tenets.

original: de ltar yang brtag par bya ba zhes pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang brtag par bya ba zhes pa /
translated: You say, ‚ÄúThis should be investigated.‚Äù

original: gal te yan lag gzhan gyi skyon nyid du rtogs pa yang 'gal ba nyid du brtag par bya ba de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa'i skyon gzhan yang gtan tshigs kyi skyon las gzhan nyid du rtogs pa de ni rang gi grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal bar brjod par
analyzed: gal te yan lag gzhan gyi skyon nyid du rtogs pa yang 'gal ba nyid du brtag par bya ba de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa'i skyon gzhan yang gtan tshigs kyi skyon las gzhan nyid du rtogs pa de ni rang gi grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal bar brjod par
translated: If you think that the fault of another part is contradictory, then at that time, the fault of the proof is also contradictory to the fault of the reason.

original: bya ba'i 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bya ba'i 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: There is a contradiction in the example.

original: de ltar yang sgra rtag ste /üîΩlus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir smras pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang sgra rtag ste / lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir smras pa /
translated: Thus, sound is permanent,üîΩbecause it is not corporeal, like an action, like a subtle particle, like a pot.

original: las bzhin dang rdul phra rab bzhin dang bum pa bzhin zhes pa'i las la sogs pa rnams kyi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos ni grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba'o zhes byas nas dpe'i skyon 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las bzhin dang rdul phra rab bzhin dang bum pa bzhin zhes pa'i las la sogs pa rnams kyi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos ni grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba'o zhes byas nas dpe'i skyon 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The qualities of permanence, etc., of actions, etc., are contradictory to the tenets of the Vaise~ika.

original: 'dis ni khas blangs nyams pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dis ni khas blangs nyams pa gsungs te /
translated: This shows the contradiction of the thesis.

original: mdor gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid kho nar bstan pa'i phyir dang / bshad pa yang /
analyzed: mdor gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid kho nar bstan pa'i phyir dang / bshad pa yang /
translated: In brief, it shows that the reason is fallacious, and the explanation is also fallacious.

original: yan lag gzhan gyi skyon yang 'gal ba nyid du dper brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag gzhan gyi skyon yang 'gal ba nyid du dper brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The fault of the other part is also stated as a contradiction in the example.

original: yang cis na skyon gzhan 'gal bar brjod ce na /
analyzed: yang cis na skyon gzhan 'gal bar brjod ce na /
translated: Why is another fault, contradiction, mentioned?

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: 'di la ni lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la ni lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Here, it is said that because it is not corporeal, etc.

original: yang na 'di ltar yang brtag par bya ba zhes pa /
analyzed: yang na 'di ltar yang brtag par bya ba zhes pa /
translated: Or, it is also to be examined in this way.

original: gal te grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal bar brjod par bya ba 'gal bar 'dod na de ltar gyur na sgrub par byed pa'i skyon gzhan yang ste /
analyzed: gal te grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal bar brjod par bya ba 'gal bar 'dod na de ltar gyur na sgrub par byed pa'i skyon gzhan yang ste /
translated: If you maintain that the contradiction is in the statement that contradicts the tenet, then in that case, there is another fault of the proof.

original: gang yang ma grub pa'am /
analyzed: gang yang ma grub pa'am /
translated: Also, the unestablished and

original: ma nges pa yang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma nges pa yang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: the indefinite would be contradictory.

original: 'di gcig pu 'ba' zhig kho na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di gcig pu 'ba' zhig kho na ni ma yin no //
translated: This is not the only one.

original: slar yang gzhan yang zhes pa 'di'i don gzhan pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: slar yang gzhan yang zhes pa 'di'i don gzhan pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Again, the meaning of ‚Äúalso‚Äù here is this:

original: yan lag gzhan gyi skyon yang 'gal ba kho nar 'gyur zhes ba'o //
analyzed: yan lag gzhan gyi skyon yang 'gal ba kho nar 'gyur zhes ba'o //
translated: The fault of another part would also be only contradiction.

original: de las kyang shin tu khyab pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de las kyang shin tu khyab pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: From that, there is the characteristic of pervasion.

original: ci zhig tu gtan tshigs ltar snang ba gzhan dang yan lag gzhan gyi skyon yang 'gal ba nyid du @207b 'thob ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig tu gtan tshigs ltar snang ba gzhan dang yan lag gzhan gyi skyon yang 'gal ba nyid du @207b 'thob ce na /
translated: In what way is the fault of another part like the apparent reason also obtained as contradiction?

original: gsungs pa / 'di la ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / 'di la ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said ‚ÄúHere‚Äù and so forth.

original: ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon zhes pa /
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon zhes pa /
translated: The fault of non-establishment is

original: rdul phra rab rnams lus can ma yin pa nyid ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnams lus can ma yin pa nyid ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the non-embodiment of the subtle particles is not established.

original: dam bca'i skyon zhes pa /
analyzed: dam bca'i skyon zhes pa /
translated: The fault of the thesis is

original: sngar khas len pas gnod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩci ste zhes pa la sogs pa shin tu khyab pa nyid spong bar byed de /
analyzed: sngar khas len pas gnod pa'i phyir ro // ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa shin tu khyab pa nyid spong bar byed de /
translated: Because it is undermined by the previously accepted position.üîΩIf you say, ‚ÄúThe pervasion is not established,‚Äù

original: mi 'dod pa yang 'thob pa ni shin tu khyab pa yin na /
analyzed: mi 'dod pa yang 'thob pa ni shin tu khyab pa yin na /
translated: then you would obtain what is not wanted, because the pervasion is established.

original: 'di la de yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la de yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But that does not exist here.

original: mtshan nyid kyi yul thams cad 'gal ba nyid du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi yul thams cad 'gal ba nyid du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is asserted that all objects of characteristics are contradictory.

original: de la zhes pa ji skad brjod pa'i dper brjod la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes pa ji skad brjod pa'i dper brjod la'o //
translated: In that regard, ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the example that was stated.

original: sbyor ba ni gnyis ka cig car 'gal ba dag ste zhes pa brjod pa 'dod pa gnyis cig car mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gnyis ka cig car 'gal ba dag ste zhes pa brjod pa 'dod pa gnyis cig car mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The syllogism is: ‚ÄúThe two are contradictory because it is impossible for two things that are asserted to be the same to exist simultaneously.‚Äù

original: sbyor ba'i sgras kyang 'dir skyon rjod par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sgras kyang 'dir skyon rjod par 'dod pa'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúsyllogism‚Äù here is used to express a fault.

original: gal te 'dir gnyis gnyis dag tu 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te 'dir gnyis gnyis dag tu 'gyur na /
translated: If here the two are contradictory,

original: khyod kyi bsam pas gnyis dag cig car sbyor ba 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyod kyi bsam pas gnyis dag cig car sbyor ba 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: then it is not tenable for you to apply the two simultaneously.

original: mtshan nyid tha dad pa gnyis dag cig car gcig la srid pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad pa gnyis dag cig car gcig la srid pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is impossible for two different characteristics to exist simultaneously in one thing.

original: gang gi tshe yang 'ga' zhig tu gcig la yang 'gal ba nyid la sogs pa'i skyon rnams brjod pa de'i tshe skyon gzhan med par khas blangs nas /üîΩskyon gzhan rjod par byed pa'i phyir cig car sbyor ba srid pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang 'ga' zhig tu gcig la yang 'gal ba nyid la sogs pa'i skyon rnams brjod pa de'i tshe skyon gzhan med par khas blangs nas / skyon gzhan rjod par byed pa'i phyir cig car sbyor ba srid pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: When one states the faults of contradiction and so on to someone, at that time, since one accepts that there are no other faults, it is absolutely impossible to simultaneously apply the statement of other faults.üîΩ

original: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba nyid dang ma nges pa rnams bsdus pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba nyid dang ma nges pa rnams bsdus pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When someone else points out the faults of contradiction, etc. to someone, at that time, since the other faults are accepted as not existing, it is not possible to apply them all at once, because it is impossible to include the other faults of non-establishment, contradiction, and inconclusiveness.

original: de yang byed pa bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang byed pa bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: And that is like the case of the bow, etc.

original: 'dir cig car sbyor bar 'dod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'dir cig car sbyor bar 'dod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Here, it is not at all possible to apply them all at once.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: gang yang rung pa kho na'i'o //
analyzed: gang yang rung pa kho na'i'o //
translated: It is just any one of them.

original: ji ltar gzhu gcig la byed pa du ma srid na yang brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang las gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhu gcig la byed pa du ma srid na yang brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang las gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: Just as it is possible for there to be many actions of a single bow, the application of any one of them is appropriate due to the power of what is asserted.

original: gzhu snun par byed do //
analyzed: gzhu snun par byed do //
translated: The bow shoots.

original: gzhus snun no zhes pa de ltar 'dir yang brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang las skyon gang yang rung ba rjod ba 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: gzhus snun no zhes pa de ltar 'dir yang brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang las skyon gang yang rung ba rjod ba 'gal ba med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no contradiction in saying that any fault is to be ascribed to the proponent of the thesis, according to the power of the one who is to be refuted.

original: gal te byed pa'i sbyor ba bzhin du zhes pa /
analyzed: gal te byed pa'i sbyor ba bzhin du zhes pa /
translated: If, like the application of the agent,

original: byed pa'i sbyor ba bzhin du gal te chos gzhan ston par byed na /üîΩ'di 'di ltar 'gyur mod de /
analyzed: byed pa'i sbyor ba bzhin du gal te chos gzhan ston par byed na / 'di 'di ltar 'gyur mod de /
translated: if another property is taught, like the application of the agent,üîΩthen this is the way it would be.

original: 'di lta bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di lta bur 'gyur te /
translated: But it is not like this.

original: gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bar ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bar ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: in any application.

original: chos gzhan nye bar ston pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: chos gzhan nye bar ston pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not that another property is taught,

original: gang gi phyir ma grub pa nyid kho na dang der dam bca' ba'i skyon yang 'gal bar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ma grub pa nyid kho na dang der dam bca' ba'i skyon yang 'gal bar brjod par bya ste /
translated: because the fault of the thesis is stated as contradiction itself,

original: de med na bstan bcos dang 'gal ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na bstan bcos dang 'gal ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: since if that does not exist, contradiction with the treatise is not possible.

original: de gzhan @208a * //
analyzed: de gzhan @208a * //
translated: That is not another.

original: min kho na'o //
analyzed: min kho na'o //
translated: It is only that.

original: de la 'gal ba nyid ces bya ba chos gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la 'gal ba nyid ces bya ba chos gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no other property called contradiction itself.

original: de ltar ni rdul phra rab rnams lus can nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de ltar ni rdul phra rab rnams lus can nyid kyi phyir /
translated: In this way, because the atoms have bodies,

original: grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba nyid de /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba nyid de /
translated: It contradicts the tenets.

original: de kho na'i phyir yang ma grub pa nyid do zhes pas gzhan nyid med do //
analyzed: de kho na'i phyir yang ma grub pa nyid do zhes pas gzhan nyid med do //
translated: And because of that alone, it is not established. Thus, there is no difference.

original: de ltar na yang rtsom byed yin pa nyid kyi phyir 'gal ba nyid de /
analyzed: de ltar na yang rtsom byed yin pa nyid kyi phyir 'gal ba nyid de /
translated: In that case, because of being the creator, there is contradiction.

original: dam bca' ba'i skyon yang ngo zhes so //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i skyon yang ngo zhes so //
translated: And there is the fault of the thesis.

original: byed pa la ni zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: byed pa la ni zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: With ‚ÄúIn the case of the agent,‚Äù etc.,

original: de la chos mi mthun pa nyid gsungs so /
analyzed: de la chos mi mthun pa nyid gsungs so /
translated: he states the dissimilarity of the properties.

original: yang ci ltar na chos gzhan yin zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na chos gzhan yin zhen gsungs pa /
translated: ‚Äú How is it that there is another property?‚Äù He says:

original: rang dbang nyid dang gzhan dbang nyid las zhes pa ste /üîΩgzhu snun par byed do zhes pa byed pa po nyid kyi phyir rang dpang nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi chos gzhan nye bar ston to //
analyzed: rang dbang nyid dang gzhan dbang nyid las zhes pa ste / gzhu snun par byed do zhes pa byed pa po nyid kyi phyir rang dpang nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi chos gzhan nye bar ston to //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom independence and dependence.‚ÄùüîΩ‚Äú He shoots the bow‚Äù teaches the property characterized by independence because of being the agent.

original: gzhus snun no zhes pa byed pa nyid kyi phyir gzhan dbang can nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: gzhus snun no zhes pa byed pa nyid kyi phyir gzhan dbang can nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no //
translated: ‚Äú He shoots with the bow‚Äù teaches the property characterized by dependence because of being the action.

original: 'o na gang du zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: 'o na gang du zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: ‚Äú But in what case,‚Äù etc.,

original: sems pa can ma yin pa'i gtso bo ni grub mtha' dang 'gal ba'i don gyi sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: sems pa can ma yin pa'i gtso bo ni grub mtha' dang 'gal ba'i don gyi sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba ste /
translated: The principal non-sentient being is contradictory because it is a proof of a meaning that contradicts tenets.

original: ma grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not unestablished.

original: de'i phyir 'di 'gal ba'o zhes pa ni nye bar dgos pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di 'gal ba'o zhes pa ni nye bar dgos pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this is contradictory. This is the purpose.

original: 'di la khas blangs pas gnod pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di la khas blangs pas gnod pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, it is not harmed by assertion.

original: skyon gzhan nyid kyi phyir bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: skyon gzhan nyid kyi phyir bsam par bya'o //
translated: It should be considered because of another fault.

original: gtan tshigs kyi skyon tsam la brten nas dper brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi skyon tsam la brten nas dper brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is an example based on just a fault of the reason,

original: de la yang zhes pas gsal ba gtso bo las gzhan ma yin pa nyid na /üîΩgtso bo las tha dad pa'i sems pa can ma yin pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la yang zhes pas gsal ba gtso bo las gzhan ma yin pa nyid na / gtso bo las tha dad pa'i sems pa can ma yin pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: in that, by the word ‚Äúalso,‚Äù it is clear that it is not different from the principal.üîΩIf it is not different from the principal,

original: skyes bu ni sems can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bu ni sems can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: then there is not even the slightest non-sentient being that is different from the principal, because a person is a sentient being.

original: de las kyang gtan tshigs thun mong ma yin pa nyid kho na ste /
analyzed: de las kyang gtan tshigs thun mong ma yin pa nyid kho na ste /
translated: Moreover, it is just a non-common reason.

original: ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: It is just indefinite.

original: khyad par rnams las gzhan du brjod par 'dod na zhes pa /
analyzed: khyad par rnams las gzhan du brjod par 'dod na zhes pa /
translated: If it is asserted that it is different from the particulars,

original: chen po la sogs pa mi mthun phyogs kho na la yod pa'i phyir dang / mthun phyogs skyes bu la med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chen po la sogs pa mi mthun phyogs kho na la yod pa'i phyir dang / mthun phyogs skyes bu la med pa'i phyir /
translated: because the opposites of greatness and so on exist only in the non-sentient, and because the sentient, the person, does not have the property of being the basis of those.

original: sems pa can ma yin pa nyid ni 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems pa can ma yin pa nyid ni 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The non-sentient would be contradictory.

original: log pa'i phyogs la /
analyzed: log pa'i phyogs la /
translated: With regard to the opposite position,

original: 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste go bla'o //üîΩphyogs can la ni smra ba rnam 'gyur ni gsal ba dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste go bla'o // phyogs can la ni smra ba rnam 'gyur ni gsal ba dang bral ba ste /
translated: the words ‚Äúbut‚Äù and so on are easy to understand.

original: rtag pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i gtan tshigs 'di ni /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i gtan tshigs 'di ni /
translated: The position that the pervader is the manifest is refuted by the argument, ‚Äúbecause the permanent is refuted.‚Äù

original: rnam 'gyur gsal ba dang bral ba yang yod do zhes pa'i grub pa'i mtha' 'di dang 'gal ba'i phyir 'gal ba'o zhe'o //
analyzed: rnam 'gyur gsal ba dang bral ba yang yod do zhes pa'i grub pa'i mtha' 'di dang 'gal ba'i phyir 'gal ba'o zhe'o //
translated: This is contradictory because it contradicts the tenet that ‚Äúthe manifest, the pervader, also exists.‚Äù

original: 'dir @208b yang skyon de dag kho na ste /
analyzed: 'dir @208b yang skyon de dag kho na ste /
translated: Here, those same faults apply.

original: de ltar ni gsal ba dang bral ba'o zhes pa 'dis ni nus pa'i ngo bo las kyang bral bar brjod de /
analyzed: de ltar ni gsal ba dang bral ba'o zhes pa 'dis ni nus pa'i ngo bo las kyang bral bar brjod de /
translated: In this way, by the words ‚Äúfree from the manifest,‚Äù the nature of potency is also said to be free.

original: nus pa dang 'gal ba dag gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa dang 'gal ba dag gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because potency and the opposite of potency are not different.

original: de'i phyir khas len pa dang 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir khas len pa dang 'gal ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is contradictory to your assertion.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rtag pa nyid bkag pa grub pa ste rdzas rtag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rtag pa nyid bkag pa grub pa ste rdzas rtag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For that very reason, the refutation of permanence is established, because the substance is permanent.

original: gsal ba yang de las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba yang de las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because the manifestation is not different from that.

original: de'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction.

original: gang las skabs sems pa rnams la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang las skabs sems pa rnams la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: From what? It is said, for those who reflect on the occasion, etc.

original: dri ma dang bral ba la gnas pa'i phyogs dang zla bo'i phyogs dag skabs kyi sgras brjod de /
analyzed: dri ma dang bral ba la gnas pa'i phyogs dang zla bo'i phyogs dag skabs kyi sgras brjod de /
translated: The side free from defilements and the opposing side are expressed by the word occasion.

original: rnam par dpyod pa'i ched du rab tu byed ces byas nas so //
analyzed: rnam par dpyod pa'i ched du rab tu byed ces byas nas so //
translated: Having analyzed, one should thoroughly investigate.

original: de sems pa ste rnam par brtag pa gang las nye bar skye ba'o //
analyzed: de sems pa ste rnam par brtag pa gang las nye bar skye ba'o //
translated: That is the reflection, the investigation, from which arises.

original: de gtan tshigs nyid du ston pa ni skabs dang mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: de gtan tshigs nyid du ston pa ni skabs dang mtshungs pa ste /
translated: That is the reason itself, which is shown to be similar to the occasion.

original: dper na bdag ni mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: dper na bdag ni mi rtag pa ste /
translated: For example, I am impermanent,

original: lus las gzhan nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: lus las gzhan nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa lta bu ste /
translated: because of being different from the body.

original: gang gi phyir lus las gzhan yin pa de'i phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir lus las gzhan yin pa de'i phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa bsam par bya ste /
translated: Because of being different from the body, therefore permanence and impermanence should be reflected upon.

original: gal te lus kho na bdag tu gyur na de mngon sum kho nar 'jig pa nyid do zhes pas sems par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te lus kho na bdag tu gyur na de mngon sum kho nar 'jig pa nyid do zhes pas sems par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the body alone were the self, then it would not be thought of as ‚Äúperishing‚Äù in the present.

original: 'di la yang lus las gzhan nyid kyi phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa sems pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di la yang lus las gzhan nyid kyi phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa sems pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, it is not thought of as permanent or impermanent because it is different from the body.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /üîΩgzhan nyid de ni /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na / gzhan nyid de ni /
translated: What then?

original: ma nges pa las /
analyzed: ma nges pa las /
translated: That difference is uncertain.üîΩFrom what?

original: gal te lus las gzhan nyid ni phyogs gcig la gnas par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te lus las gzhan nyid ni phyogs gcig la gnas par gyur na /
translated: If the difference from the body were to abide in one part,

original: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa rnam par dpyod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa rnam par dpyod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would not be analyzed as permanent or impermanent.

original: yang ci'i phyir 'di las ma nges pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir 'di las ma nges pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it uncertain from this?

original: gsungs pa / gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said ‚Äúbecause‚Äù and so on.

original: phyogs can len pa ni smra ba /
analyzed: phyogs can len pa ni smra ba /
translated: The grasping of a part is a statement.

original: sgra mi rtag ste /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste /
translated: Sound is impermanent.

original: rtag pa'i chos nye bar ma dmigs pa'i phyir zhes pa 'di skabs dang mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: rtag pa'i chos nye bar ma dmigs pa'i phyir zhes pa 'di skabs dang mtshungs pa ste /
translated: Because the property of permanence is not observed. This is similar to the context.

original: gang gi phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i chos ma dmigs pa kho na las sgra la sems shing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i chos ma dmigs pa kho na las sgra la sems shing /
translated: Because permanence and impermanence are only not observed in sound,üîΩand sound is thought of as different from the body.

original: mi dmigs pa kho na ni gtan tshigs nyid du ston pa'o zhe'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa kho na ni gtan tshigs nyid du ston pa'o zhe'o //
translated: Non-apprehension alone is shown to be the reason.

original: gal te rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i chos ma dmigs pa'i phyir zhes brjod na /
analyzed: gal te rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i chos ma dmigs pa'i phyir zhes brjod na /
translated: If it is said that it is because of the non-apprehension of permanent and impermanent phenomena,

original: 'di 'di ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'di 'di ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: this is so,

original: de la yang thun mong min pa nyid kyi skyon te /
analyzed: de la yang thun mong min pa nyid kyi skyon te /
translated: but there is the fault of non-uniqueness,

original: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa ni /
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa ni /
translated: because the non-apprehension of permanent and impermanent phenomena

original: gzhan 'ga' zhig tu yang ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan 'ga' zhig tu yang ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: is not seen anywhere else.

original: ma grub pa nyid yang na ste /üîΩsgra la yang gdon mi za bar byas pa nyid @209a * //
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid yang na ste / sgra la yang gdon mi za bar byas pa nyid @209a * //
translated: Either it is unestablished,üîΩbecause sound is definitely impermanent,

original: la sogs ba rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i chos dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: la sogs ba rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i chos dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because permanent and impermanent phenomena are apprehended in sound and so on.

original: yang na ma nges pa nyid nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: yang na ma nges pa nyid nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Or it is inconclusive, due to sky-flowers and so on.

original: yang dag bar rtogs par bya ba ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag bar rtogs par bya ba ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: As for that which is to be properly understood, and so on,

original: gang gi phyir gzhi mtshungs pa rnams kyis 'bru mang po pa'o zhes bshad cing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhi mtshungs pa rnams kyis 'bru mang po pa'o zhes bshad cing /
translated: it is explained that the plural particle is used with similar bases,

original: 'dir mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir mi 'gyur te /
translated: and it is not so here.

original: 'di lnga rnams kyis zos pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lnga rnams kyis zos pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: These five are the eaters.

original: 'o na mgrin pa na nag po la sogs pa rnams la /
analyzed: 'o na mgrin pa na nag po la sogs pa rnams la /
translated: Now, in the throat, there are the black ones, etc.

original: gzhi mi mthun pa rnams kyang 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ba kho na ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gzhi mi mthun pa rnams kyang 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ba kho na ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Are not the bases sometimes different?

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: thams cad du zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Everywhere, etc.

original: gang du go bar byed pa de kho na la 'dod cing /
analyzed: gang du go bar byed pa de kho na la 'dod cing /
translated: Where there is the expression, there is the desire.

original: 'dir go bar byed pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir go bar byed pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: And here, there is not even the expression.

original: bsgrub byas khyad par du ma byas pa'i dpe'i sgra kho na ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don gyi rjod par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bsgrub byas khyad par du ma byas pa'i dpe'i sgra kho na ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don gyi rjod par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Only the word example, without the predicate being specified, is the expression of the intended meaning.

original: bsgrub byas khyad par du byas pa'i sgra ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub byas khyad par du byas pa'i sgra ni ma yin no //
translated: But not the word with the predicate specified.

original: ma grub pa gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: ma grub pa gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: The unestablished is not a reason.

original: 'di la grub pa yod pa ma yin zhes pa ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la grub pa yod pa ma yin zhes pa ma grub pa'o //
translated: Here, there is no establishment; this is the unestablished.

original: gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: It is not a reason.

original: bsgrub byas khyad par du ma byas pa'i dpe zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub byas khyad par du ma byas pa'i dpe zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: the example without the predicate being specified.

original: 'di ston to //
analyzed: 'di ston to //
translated: This is taught.

original: bsgrub byas gang la khyad par du ma byas ba zhes pa ngag tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: bsgrub byas gang la khyad par du ma byas ba zhes pa ngag tshogs pa ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúspecifically‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúthe specific property of the probandum‚Äù is a particle.

original: bdun pas 'brel par 'os kyi gtan tshigs ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bdun pas 'brel par 'os kyi gtan tshigs ni ma yin te /
translated: The seventh case is not a logical reason that is suitable to be related to the probandum.

original: dpe ni ngag tshogs pa'i phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe ni ngag tshogs pa'i phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because an example is just one part of a collection of words.

original: gtan tshigs ni dpe dang 'dra bar ngag tshogs pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni dpe dang 'dra bar ngag tshogs pa kho na ste /
translated: A logical reason is just a collection of words that is similar to an example.

original: yan lag nyid kyis ni yon tan du gyur pa'o zhes pas gtso bo ma yin no //
analyzed: yan lag nyid kyis ni yon tan du gyur pa'o zhes pas gtso bo ma yin no //
translated: Since it is a part, it is not the main thing.

original: yan lag ni yan lag gzhan dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yan lag ni yan lag gzhan dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: A part does not have another part.

original: lag pa 'di'i rna ba dag 'phyang ngo zhes par ni 'gyur ba ma yin no //üîΩdus las 'das nas bstan pa ni dus las 'das pa zhes pa'o //üîΩdus las 'das par byed pa ni dus las rgal ba'o //
analyzed: lag pa 'di'i rna ba dag 'phyang ngo zhes par ni 'gyur ba ma yin no // dus las 'das nas bstan pa ni dus las 'das pa zhes pa'o // dus las 'das par byed pa ni dus las rgal ba'o //
translated: It is not the case that the ear hangs from this arm.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúthe time has passed‚Äù is the time that has passed.üîΩThe time that has passed is the time that has been transcended.

original: dus las 'das par byed pas bstan pa gang yin pa de ni dus las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: dus las 'das par byed pas bstan pa gang yin pa de ni dus las 'das pa'o //
translated: The time that has been transcended is the time that has passed.

original: gtan tshigs rnams ni dus nges pa can kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs rnams ni dus nges pa can kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: Logical reasons are only definite with respect to time.

original: de ltar ni dus gzhan du bskrun kyang sa bon ni myu gu bskyed par nus pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni dus gzhan du bskrun kyang sa bon ni myu gu bskyed par nus pa ma yin pas so //
translated: In this way, even if produced at another time, the seed is not able to produce the sprout.

original: de'i phyir dus las 'das nas brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir dus las 'das nas brjod pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the statement that has passed beyond time

original: gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: is not a reason.

original: brgal nas sam zhes pa /
analyzed: brgal nas sam zhes pa /
translated: Having disputed, one says, Or,

original: khyod kyis sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs ma tshang ba'o zhes pa 'di lta @209b bu'am /
analyzed: khyod kyis sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs ma tshang ba'o zhes pa 'di lta @209b bu'am /
translated: your proof is a reason that is incomplete.

original: nges pa'i don du zhes gang gi tshe rgol bsam rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ram /
analyzed: nges pa'i don du zhes gang gi tshe rgol bsam rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ram /
translated: When one has understood the very dispute, or because of the context, one says, In the sense of the definitive meaning,

original: skabs nyid kyi phyir ma brjod par gyur ba na /
analyzed: skabs nyid kyi phyir ma brjod par gyur ba na /
translated: when one has not stated,

original: byas pa nyid kyi phyir zhes so //
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyi phyir zhes so //
translated: because of being produced.

original: pha rol po yang bsam pa shes pa kho na gsal bar bya bar 'dod pas 'dri ste /
analyzed: pha rol po yang bsam pa shes pa kho na gsal bar bya bar 'dod pas 'dri ste /
translated: The opponent, who wishes to make clear the very understanding of the intention, asks,

original: gang gi sgra mi rtag pa nyid du kho bo cag gis rtogs par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gang gi sgra mi rtag pa nyid du kho bo cag gis rtogs par 'gyur ba /
translated: What is the reason by which we will understand that sound is impermanent?

original: 'di la gtan tshigs ci yin no zhes so //
analyzed: 'di la gtan tshigs ci yin no zhes so //
translated: What is the reason for this?

original: de lta na ci ltar gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid du rigs pa ma yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de lta na ci ltar gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid du rigs pa ma yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: In that case, how is it not reasonable to be a fallacious reason? It is said:

original: gtan tshigs kyi gnas su zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi gnas su zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The passage beginning with ‚ÄúThe locus of a reason‚Äù explains the reason why the opponent‚Äôs argument is not a reason.

original: gtan tshigs kyi gnas ni rtsod pa'i gzhi ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi gnas ni rtsod pa'i gzhi ste /
translated: The locus of a reason is the basis of a debate.

original: de'i rgyu mtshan du rab tu sbyar ba gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyogs gcig dang ldan pa'i phyir / gtan tshigs bzhin du snang ba gang yin pa de gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan du rab tu sbyar ba gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyogs gcig dang ldan pa'i phyir / gtan tshigs bzhin du snang ba gang yin pa de gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ste /
translated: Since it has the property of being a reason, in the sense that it is one of the three characteristics of a reason, it is a reason.

original: de 'di la yod pa ma yin zhes pas /
analyzed: de 'di la yod pa ma yin zhes pas /
translated: Since it is not a reason,

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ga la yin /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ga la yin /
translated: how can it be a pseudo-reason?üîΩThe passage beginning with ‚ÄúWhen the time has come‚Äù explains the reason why the opponent‚Äôs argument is not a pseudo-reason.

original: gang dus nges pa nyid du sa bon la sogs pa rnams /
analyzed: gang dus nges pa nyid du sa bon la sogs pa rnams /
translated: When the time has come, the seeds and so on

original: de'i byed po nyid las skye zhing /üîΩshes byed ni ji ltar de ltar rtogs pa ltar /
analyzed: de'i byed po nyid las skye zhing / shes byed ni ji ltar de ltar rtogs pa ltar /
translated: arise from the very cause that produced them.

original: rang gi don khong du chud pa na dus la ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi don khong du chud pa na dus la ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: The evidence is that when one understands the meaning of this, one does not rely on time.

original: phyogs can lan smra ba /üîΩgang gi don phyogs gcig ston bzhin pa'i dus las 'das par sbyar ba /
analyzed: phyogs can lan smra ba / gang gi don phyogs gcig ston bzhin pa'i dus las 'das par sbyar ba /
translated: The passage beginning with ‚ÄúThe one who speaks‚Äù explains the reason why the opponent‚Äôs argument is not a pseudo-reason.üîΩThe one who speaks is the one who applies the reason after the time for presenting the partial object has passed.

original: dus las 'das pa ston pa ste /
analyzed: dus las 'das pa ston pa ste /
translated: The one who presents the time that has passed is the one who presents the reason after the time for presenting the partial object has passed.

original: dper na sgra rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag ste /
translated: For example, sound is permanent.

original: ldan pas mngon par gsal bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir gzugs bzhin zhes pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: ldan pas mngon par gsal bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir gzugs bzhin zhes pa lta bu ste /
translated: because it is the manifestor, like form.

original: sngar dang phyis kyang mngon par gsal ba'i gnas skabs ni rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: sngar dang phyis kyang mngon par gsal ba'i gnas skabs ni rtag pa nyid do //
translated: The state of manifestation is permanent, because it exists before and after.

original: 'di ni gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: This is not a reason.

original: dus las 'das par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus las 'das par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is taught to be beyond time.

original: gang gi phyir gsal bya gzugs la sogs pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gsal bya gzugs la sogs pa /
translated: Because the manifestor, such as form,

original: gsal bar byed pa 'od dang ldan pa ldan pa yod pa kho na ni 'dzin par 'gyur gyi 'das pa na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa 'od dang ldan pa ldan pa yod pa kho na ni 'dzin par 'gyur gyi 'das pa na ni ma yin no //
translated: is apprehended only when it possesses light, which is the manifestor, but not when it is past.

original: gal te de yang sgra dang ldan ba'i gsal bar bya bar gyur na de gzugs gsal bar byed pa nye ba kho na na rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te de yang sgra dang ldan ba'i gsal bar bya bar gyur na de gzugs gsal bar byed pa nye ba kho na na rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it were the manifestor of sound, it would be perceived only when the manifestor of form is present.

original: de 'das pa na ste gsal bar byed pa 'das pa na ne ma yin no //
analyzed: de 'das pa na ste gsal bar byed pa 'das pa na ne ma yin no //
translated: It is not perceived when the manifestor is past.

original: shing dang sta re ldan pa na ring po nas gnas pa rnams kyis sgra rnam par dbye ba dang dus su nye bar dmigs te /
analyzed: shing dang sta re ldan pa na ring po nas gnas pa rnams kyis sgra rnam par dbye ba dang dus su nye bar dmigs te /
translated: When a tree possesses an axe, those who are far away perceive the sound of the axe at the same time as the tree is cut.

original: de las kyang mngon par gsal ba ldan pa'i dus las 'das so zhes pas ldan pa'i rgyu can ma yin no //
analyzed: de las kyang mngon par gsal ba ldan pa'i dus las 'das so zhes pas ldan pa'i rgyu can ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is more evident that it is past the time of connection. Thus, it is not a cause of connection.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o zhes pas @210a de 'di bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pa las tha dad pa min no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o zhes pas @210a de 'di bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pa las tha dad pa min no //
translated: Therefore, it is a fallacious reason. Thus, it is not different from the thesis.

original: ldan pa sgra mngon par gsal ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa bkag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ldan pa sgra mngon par gsal ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa bkag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the reason of connection is refuted as the reason for the manifestation of sound,

original: de'i phyir 'di ma grub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ma grub pa kho na'o //
translated: therefore, it is only unestablished.

original: bye brag pa rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bye brag pa rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The Vai≈õe·π£ikas, etc.

original: de la rab tu ma grub pa ni rtags dang rtags can gyi 'brel pa rab tu ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rab tu ma grub pa ni rtags dang rtags can gyi 'brel pa rab tu ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: There, the unestablished is just the non-establishment of the relation between the reason and the property-possessor.

original: dper na me dang du ba'i 'brel pa yod kyang gang gis 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid ma grub pa de'i ngor du ba ni ma bstan pa ste gtan tshigs ma yin pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dper na me dang du ba'i 'brel pa yod kyang gang gis 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid ma grub pa de'i ngor du ba ni ma bstan pa ste gtan tshigs ma yin pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: For example, although there is a relation between fire and smoke, since the characteristic of a cause that possesses an effect is not established, from the perspective of that, smoke is not taught, i.e., is not a reason. This is the meaning.

original: med pa ni ldan pa la sogs pa'i 'brel pa med pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: med pa ni ldan pa la sogs pa'i 'brel pa med pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: Because the nonexistent is not related to the existent, etc.

original: dper na rva can te de'i phyir rta'o zhes ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rva can te de'i phyir rta'o zhes ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like saying, ‚ÄúThe one with horns is a horse.‚Äù

original: gang rta dang rva dag gzhan ma yin pa nyid du grub na rva can du 'bugs so zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: gang rta dang rva dag gzhan ma yin pa nyid du grub na rva can du 'bugs so zhes brjod pa na /
translated: If it is established that the horse and the horns are not different, then when it is said, ‚ÄúThe one with horns is a horse,‚Äù

original: ci zhig 'dir shes par bya /üîΩgal te rva can te /
analyzed: ci zhig 'dir shes par bya / gal te rva can te /
translated: what is to be understood here?

original: de'i phyir rta'o zhes smra na /
analyzed: de'i phyir rta'o zhes smra na /
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúThe one with horns is a horse,‚Äù

original: smra bya de ni med pa smra'o zhes pas /
analyzed: smra bya de ni med pa smra'o zhes pas /
translated: then that statement is a statement of the nonexistent.

original: rta dang rva dag la 'brel pa gang yang rung ba yod pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: rta dang rva dag la 'brel pa gang yang rung ba yod pa ma yin pas so //
translated: Because the horse and the horns are not related in any way.

original: the tshom za ba ni gang yod kyang ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: the tshom za ba ni gang yod kyang ma nges pa ste /
translated: Doubt is when there is existence but there is no certainty.

original: dper na rva can rig go zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: dper na rva can rig go zhes brjod pa na /
translated: For example, it is like saying, ‚ÄúI see the one with horns.‚Äù

original: ci zhig 'dir shes par bya zhe na /üîΩgal te rva can te /
analyzed: ci zhig 'dir shes par bya zhe na / gal te rva can te /
translated: What is to be understood here?

original: de'i phyir ba lang ngo zhes smra na de ni smra bar bya ba the tshom du smra'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ba lang ngo zhes smra na de ni smra bar bya ba the tshom du smra'o zhes pa'o //
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúThe one with horns is a cow,‚Äù then that statement is a statement of doubt.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ma he la sogs pa rnams la yang rva yod ces so //
analyzed: ma he la sogs pa rnams la yang rva yod ces so //
translated: Even in the case of buffaloes and so on, horns exist.

original: re zhig rab tu ma grub pa zhes pa la sogs pa rtags dang rtags can dag gis 'brel pa rab tu ma grub na dpe la rten pa'i skyon gnyis dag srid de /
analyzed: re zhig rab tu ma grub pa zhes pa la sogs pa rtags dang rtags can dag gis 'brel pa rab tu ma grub na dpe la rten pa'i skyon gnyis dag srid de /
translated: If the relation between the reason and the property to be established is not established, then two faults are possible, based on the example.

original: dpe ni med pa'am rab tu ma grub pa'i don nyid yang na ste gtan tshigs kyi don gyis so //
analyzed: dpe ni med pa'am rab tu ma grub pa'i don nyid yang na ste gtan tshigs kyi don gyis so //
translated: The example is either nonexistent or has the meaning of not being established, or else, by the meaning of the reason.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: 'am gyi sgra ni rnam par brtags pa'i don can no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'am gyi sgra ni rnam par brtags pa'i don can no zhes pa'o //

original: de la gang gi tshe na re zhig dpe'i chos can kho na rang gi ngo bo rab tu ma grub pa las 'brel pa ma rtogs pa de'i tshe dpe med pa ste /
analyzed: de la gang gi tshe na re zhig dpe'i chos can kho na rang gi ngo bo rab tu ma grub pa las 'brel pa ma rtogs pa de'i tshe dpe med pa ste /

original: chos can ma grub pa las so //
analyzed: chos can ma grub pa las so //
translated: Due to the subject not being established.

original: ci ste chos can grub na yang de la sngar rtags ma mthong ba'i phyir 'brel pa rab tu ma grub pa nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: ci ste chos can grub na yang de la sngar rtags ma mthong ba'i phyir 'brel pa rab tu ma grub pa nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: But if the subject is established, and the relation is not established due to the reason not being seen before,

original: gtan tshigs kyi don gyis rab tu ma grub pa'i don nyid de /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don gyis rab tu ma grub pa'i don nyid de /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúnot established by the reason‚Äù is

analyzed: sgrub par byed pan ma tshang ba nyid ces pa'i don to //
translated: the meaning of ‚Äúincomplete in the proof.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir yang dpe ltar snang ba yin gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yang dpe ltar snang ba yin gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it a pseudo-example and not a pseudo-reason?

analyzed: gsungs pa / de ltar na ni zhes pa la @210b sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúIn that case,‚Äù and so on.

original: rnam pa 'di dag gis gang gi phyir dpe la rab tu ma grub par 'gyur ba de'i phyir 'di ni dpe'i skyon te /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di dag gis gang gi phyir dpe la rab tu ma grub par 'gyur ba de'i phyir 'di ni dpe'i skyon te /
translated: By these modes, because it is not established in the example, therefore this is a fault of the example.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not a pseudo-reason.

original: ci ste yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci ste yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúBut if,‚Äù and so on.

original: bsgrub bya'i chos can la'am yod bzhin pa yang na ste /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos can la'am yod bzhin pa yang na ste /
translated: It is said that the property of the subject is existent or

analyzed: mig gi gzung bya nyid dang 'dra ba ni rab tu ma grub pa'i sgras brjod kyi dpe la ni ma yin zhe'o //
translated: that which is similar to the object of apprehension of the eye is expressed by the term ‚Äúnot established,‚Äù but not the example.

original: de ltar gyur na gtan tshigs kyi don 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na gtan tshigs kyi don 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were the case, the meaning of the reason would be contradictory.

original: yang gtan tshigs kyi don 'gal bar 'gyur ba cis she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gtan tshigs kyi don 'gal bar 'gyur ba cis she na gsungs pa /
translated: Again, why does the meaning of the reason become contradictory?üîΩIt is said:

original: bstan pa ni rab tu grub pa sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: bstan pa ni rab tu grub pa sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
translated: Because the teaching is based on what was previously established.

original: gang sngon 'brel pa'i dus su rab tu grub cing rnam par shes pa de kho na bstan gyi /
analyzed: gang sngon 'brel pa'i dus su rab tu grub cing rnam par shes pa de kho na bstan gyi /
translated: That which was previously established at the time of connection and cognized is taught.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes pa'i don mngon bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes pa'i don mngon bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: The meaning of not other is explicitly accepted.

original: de ltar ni gal te yod pa ma yin yang sharsha'i las gtan tshigs nyid du 'dod na /
analyzed: de ltar ni gal te yod pa ma yin yang sharsha'i las gtan tshigs nyid du 'dod na /
translated: Thus, if it is asserted that a non-existent is a reason in the Shar-sha system,

original: de ltar gyur na rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams kho na'i rgyu nyid do zhes gang khas blangs pa de nyams so zhes yongs su rtsod pa brjod do //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams kho na'i rgyu nyid do zhes gang khas blangs pa de nyams so zhes yongs su rtsod pa brjod do //

original: byung ba min pa rtags ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: byung ba min pa rtags ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: It is not that what has not arisen is not a reason. What then?

original: byung ba min pa la sogs pa rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: byung ba min pa la sogs pa rtogs pa'o //

original: gtan tshigs ci zhe na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ci zhe na /

original: bstan pa ni rab tu grub pa sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir zhes pa nye bar dmigs pa sngon ma can gyi phyir zhes pa'i don to//
analyzed: bstan pa ni rab tu grub pa sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir zhes pa nye bar dmigs pa sngon ma can gyi phyir zhes pa'i don to//
translated: Because the teaching is dependent on prior establishment. The meaning of ‚Äúdependent on prior observation‚Äù is this.

original: gang gi du ba la sogs pa rnams dang me la sogs pa rnams 'brel pa 'gal ba can nam mi 'gal ba can rab tu grub par 'gyur ba de'i du ba la sogs pa rnams bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi du ba la sogs pa rnams dang me la sogs pa rnams 'brel pa 'gal ba can nam mi 'gal ba can rab tu grub par 'gyur ba de'i du ba la sogs pa rnams bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: When smoke and so on and fire and so on are established as related, either as contradictory or as noncontradictory, then smoke and so on are taught.

analyzed: rab tu grub pa sngon ma can kho na bstan pa'o zhes ci ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /

analyzed: sngon ma'i sgra sbyor ba'i phyir yang 'brel pa'i dus su grub pa nyid kho na 'dis brjod de gzhan du na rab tu grub pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa kho na brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro rab tu grub par byas nas zhes pa /

analyzed: de la snang bzhin pa'i gong bu la rva can nyid med pa 'am the tshom za bar byas nas dper brjod pa ni ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /

original: rab tu grub pa kho na'o//
analyzed: rab tu grub pa kho na'o//

original: 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na /
translated: How is that?

original: gal te rva can te zhes rjes su brjod pa las te /
analyzed: gal te rva can te zhes rjes su brjod pa las te /

original: phyogs kyi chos khas blangs pa ni 'di skad smra'o //üîΩbsgrub par bya ba'i chos rta la dang / ba lang la de rab tu ma grub pa nyid ni ma nges pa nyid spangs te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos khas blangs pa ni 'di skad smra'o // bsgrub par bya ba'i chos rta la dang / ba lang la de rab tu ma grub pa nyid ni ma nges pa nyid spangs te /

original: chos can gong bu la ni ma yin no //üîΩci ste yang med pa'i gtan @211a * //
analyzed: chos can gong bu la ni ma yin no // ci ste yang med pa'i gtan @211a * //
translated: The property of the subject is not refuted in the entity that appears.

original: tshigs zhes pa med pa'i shes pa'i gtan tshigs ni med pa dang / the tshom gyi gtan tshigs the tshom du 'gyur te /
analyzed: tshigs zhes pa med pa'i shes pa'i gtan tshigs ni med pa dang / the tshom gyi gtan tshigs the tshom du 'gyur te /
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúThe reason of nonexistence,‚Äù the reason of the cognition of nonexistence is nonexistence, and the reason of doubt is doubt.

analyzed: nyung bar brjod pa yin zhes pas ma tshang ba nyid gsungs so //

analyzed: rva can te de'i phyir ba lang ngo zhes pa ni thun mong gi ma nges pa kho na'i dper brjod de /

analyzed: de nyid ni srid pa ma yin te /

original: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: rdzas la sogs pa rnams gang yang rung ba'i sgra gdon mi za bar 'byung bar bya'o //
