translated: and it is the cause of doubt through the door of craving for that quality.üîΩIt is not through the door of the opposite.

original: de las ldog pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin no zhes pa thun mong ba las gzhan yin te ;
analyzed: de las ldog pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin no zhes pa thun mong ba las gzhan yin te ;
translated: It is different from the common.

original: de yang mtshan nyid las dang dpe brjod las kyang ma bshad do zhes pas nyungs pas brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de yang mtshan nyid las dang dpe brjod las kyang ma bshad do zhes pas nyungs pas brjod pa'o //
translated: And that is not explained from the definition or from the example.üîΩIt is said that it is a fault because it is not mentioned.

original: 'gal ba mtha' gcig pa can zhes pa phan tshul 'gal ba'i don sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba yang 'di yin la mtha' gcig pa can yang ngo zhes pas 'gal ba mtha' @212a * //
analyzed: 'gal ba mtha' gcig pa can zhes pa phan tshul 'gal ba'i don sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba yang 'di yin la mtha' gcig pa can yang ngo zhes pas 'gal ba mtha' @212a * //
translated: It is said that it is contradictory and one-sided because it proves the meaning of mutual contradiction.

original: gcig pa can te /
analyzed: gcig pa can te /
translated: It is contradictory and one-sided.

original: yan lag gi sgo nas tshogs pa la 'jug pa dag gi tshig sdud de gzhu dmar po bzhin no //
analyzed: yan lag gi sgo nas tshogs pa la 'jug pa dag gi tshig sdud de gzhu dmar po bzhin no //
translated: The compound is resolved as ‚Äúa collection of parts,‚Äù like ‚Äúa red bow.‚Äù

original: 'gal ba ma nges pa can zhes pa kha cig tu klog ste de la 'gal ba ni snga ma bzhin yin zhing /
analyzed: 'gal ba ma nges pa can zhes pa kha cig tu klog ste de la 'gal ba ni snga ma bzhin yin zhing /
translated: Some read ‚Äúcontradictory and inconclusive,‚Äù and in that case the contradiction is as before.

original: ma nges pa ni the tshom gyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ma nges pa ni the tshom gyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Inconclusiveness is because of being a cause of doubt.

original: 'gal ba ma nges pa can zhes brjod pa la /
analyzed: 'gal ba ma nges pa can zhes brjod pa la /
translated: In ‚Äúcontradictory and inconclusive,‚Äù

original: slar yang du ma smos pa ni /
analyzed: slar yang du ma smos pa ni /
translated: the repetition of ‚Äúand‚Äù is

original: 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs las khyad par gyi don du'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs las khyad par gyi don du'o //
translated: for the purpose of distinguishing it from the reason that is contradictory.

original: gzhan pa zer ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan pa zer ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú Other‚Äù

original: the tshom gyi gtan tshigs kyi skabs las /üîΩshugs kyis thob pa kho na'i du ma nyid /
analyzed: the tshom gyi gtan tshigs kyi skabs las / shugs kyis thob pa kho na'i du ma nyid /
translated: means from the context of the reason that is inconclusive.üîΩThe repetition of ‚Äúmany‚Äù is

original: du ma zhes rjes su brjod pa ni bde blug tu rtogs pa'i don du'o zhe'o //
analyzed: du ma zhes rjes su brjod pa ni bde blug tu rtogs pa'i don du'o zhe'o //
translated: merely for the sake of ease of expression.

original: lnga po rnams kyi rtags dmigs pa'i phyir dang zhes pa /
analyzed: lnga po rnams kyi rtags dmigs pa'i phyir dang zhes pa /
translated: ‚Äú Because the evidence of the five is observed‚Äù means

original: gang zhig gang du rtags dmigs pa de de'i rtsom par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig gang du rtags dmigs pa de de'i rtsom par byed pa ste /
translated: that whatever evidence is observed of something is its cause.

original: dper na bum pa'i sa bzhin lus la yang 'byung ba chen po rnams 'dzin pa dang sdud pa dang smin pa dang / g-yo 'a dang skabs sbyin pa'i rtags can rnams dmigs so zhes pa rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa'i sa bzhin lus la yang 'byung ba chen po rnams 'dzin pa dang sdud pa dang smin pa dang / g-yo 'a dang skabs sbyin pa'i rtags can rnams dmigs so zhes pa rang bzhin no //
translated: For example, in the case of the pot, the earth element is observed to have the characteristics of supporting, holding together, maturing, and giving space to the body.

original: rigs mi mthun pa rtsom pa bkag pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa rtsom pa bkag pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: Because it is prohibited to begin with a dissimilar type.

original: gang zhig gang las rigs mi mthun pa de'i rtsom par byed pa po ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang las rigs mi mthun pa de'i rtsom par byed pa po ma yin te /
translated: That which is dissimilar in type to something is not its creator,

original: dper na me'i rdul phra rab rnams sa'i yan lag can gyi bzhin lus kyang 'byung ba rnams las rigs mi mthun pa'o //
analyzed: dper na me'i rdul phra rab rnams sa'i yan lag can gyi bzhin lus kyang 'byung ba rnams las rigs mi mthun pa'o //
translated: for example, the subtle particles of fire are not the limbs of the earth. The body is dissimilar in type to the elements.

original: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: The contradiction with the pervader.

original: 'di yang the tshom gyi gtan tshigs te bstan bcos su mthong ba kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang the tshom gyi gtan tshigs te bstan bcos su mthong ba kho na yin te /
translated: This is also a reason for doubt, because it is only seen in the treatise.

original: mtshan nyid las sam dper brjod las ma bshad do zhes pas ma tshang ba nyid do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid las sam dper brjod las ma bshad do zhes pas ma tshang ba nyid do //
translated: It is incomplete because it is not explained in the definition or the example.

original: 'dis zhes pa thun mong ma yin pa dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can dag gis dpe brjod ma bsdus pas so //
analyzed: 'dis zhes pa thun mong ma yin pa dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can dag gis dpe brjod ma bsdus pas so //
translated: This refers to the fact that the uncommon and non-erroneous contradictory [reasons] are not included in the example.

original: spyi mngon sum las dang khyad par mngon sum ma yin pa las khyad par dran pa las the tshom mo zhes pa mdo'o //
analyzed: spyi mngon sum las dang khyad par mngon sum ma yin pa las khyad par dran pa las the tshom mo zhes pa mdo'o //
translated: The sutra says, Doubt arises from the memory of a particular when the particular is not directly perceived, but the general is.

original: 'di the tshom gyi gtan tshigs dag yin yang thun mong ma yin pa dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba dag ma bsdus pa'i phyir ma khyad pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di the tshom gyi gtan tshigs dag yin yang thun mong ma yin pa dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba dag ma bsdus pa'i phyir ma khyad pa nyid do //
translated: Although these are reasons for doubt, they are not included in the uncommon and non-erroneous contradictory [reasons], so they are indeed different.

original: 'dir yang zhes pa the tshom gyi mdo 'dir ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes pa the tshom gyi mdo 'dir ro //
translated: Here too refers to this sutra on doubt.

original: the tshom gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ha cang khyad pa nyid gsungs te /
analyzed: the tshom gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ha cang khyad pa nyid gsungs te /
translated: The definition of a reason for doubt is stated to be too broad,

original: gang gi phyir kun da dkar ba nyid spyi yin zhing de mngon sum nyid na yang gzugs la sogs pa rnams la nges pa mthong gi the tshom ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir kun da dkar ba nyid spyi yin zhing de mngon sum nyid na yang gzugs la sogs pa rnams la nges pa mthong gi the tshom ni ma yin no //
translated: because although the whiteness of jasmine is a general property and directly perceived, certainty is seen in forms and so on, but not doubt.

original: ji ltar mtshan nyid yin pa de ltar de yang the tshom gyi gtan tshigs nyid kho nar 'thob bo//
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan nyid yin pa de ltar de yang the tshom gyi gtan tshigs nyid kho nar 'thob bo//
translated: Just as it is a characteristic, so it is also only a reason for doubt.

original: @212b de'i phyir gang rnam par gcod byed ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs spyi de mngon sum pa nyid na the tshom du 'gyur ro zhes khyad par du byas nas brjod par bya'o // brjod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: @212b de'i phyir gang rnam par gcod byed ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs spyi de mngon sum pa nyid na the tshom du 'gyur ro zhes khyad par du byas nas brjod par bya'o // brjod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, when a reason is not a reason for exclusion, if it is a matter of perception, it should be stated with the qualification that it is a reason for doubt. But it is not stated thus.

original: de'i phyir ma tshang ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma tshang ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is incomplete.

original: rnam par gcod byed ma yin ba'i gtan tshigs zhes pa 'khrul pa can zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par gcod byed ma yin ba'i gtan tshigs zhes pa 'khrul pa can zhes pa'i don to //
translated: A reason that is not a reason for exclusion means a fallacious reason.

original: yang ci ltar de ni de rnams kyi spyi yin te /
analyzed: yang ci ltar de ni de rnams kyi spyi yin te /
translated: Moreover, how is that the universal of those?

original: ji tsam du dkar po nyid de ni khyad par kho na'o zhe na 'di skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: ji tsam du dkar po nyid de ni khyad par kho na'o zhe na 'di skyon ma yin te /
translated: To the extent that whiteness is only a particular. This is not a fault,

original: du ma dang 'brel pa can nyid kyi phyir de yang spyi dang 'dra bas spyi ste /
analyzed: du ma dang 'brel pa can nyid kyi phyir de yang spyi dang 'dra bas spyi ste /
translated: because that is also a universal, like a universal, because it is related to many.

original: 'dir spyi'i tshig don kho na spyi'i mnyan pas brjod pas brjod par 'dod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir spyi'i tshig don kho na spyi'i mnyan pas brjod pas brjod par 'dod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Here, the word universal is used in the sense of a mere universal, and the intended meaning is not a universal.

original: gang gi phyir yon tan mthong ba las kyang the tshom nye bar skye ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir yon tan mthong ba las kyang the tshom nye bar skye ba ste /
translated: Because doubt arises even from seeing a quality.

original: des na du ma dang 'brel ba can kho na 'dir the tshom gyi rgyur brjod do //
analyzed: des na du ma dang 'brel ba can kho na 'dir the tshom gyi rgyur brjod do //
translated: Therefore, only that which is related to many is said here to be the cause of doubt.

original: yul 'ga' zhig tu zhes pa thams cad du du ba la sogs pa nyid kyi the tshom za ba mi srid par ston to //
analyzed: yul 'ga' zhig tu zhes pa thams cad du du ba la sogs pa nyid kyi the tshom za ba mi srid par ston to //
translated: In some places, all of this shows that it is impossible to doubt smoke, etc.

original: 'dir de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'brel pa bshad pa'i ched du gtan tshigs rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa dag la yod pa dang med pa nyid dag dpe'i sbyor bas bshad par bya na /
analyzed: 'dir de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'brel pa bshad pa'i ched du gtan tshigs rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa dag la yod pa dang med pa nyid dag dpe'i sbyor bas bshad par bya na /
translated: Here, in order to explain the relation characterized by identity and origination, the existence and non-existence in similar and dissimilar instances should be explained by the application of examples.

original: de dag kyang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kho na las grub ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kho na las grub ste /
translated: And those are established just from the definition of the reason.

original: de'i phyir dpe'i mtshan nyid don med pa can no zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe'i mtshan nyid don med pa can no zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, the definition of the example is pointless.üîΩTo explain this, it is said:

original: tshul gsum gtan tshigs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tshul gsum gtan tshigs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The three modes are the reason, etc.

original: gal te yang tshul gsum gtan tshigs zhes brjod pa de lta na yang sbyor ba'i dus su /
analyzed: gal te yang tshul gsum gtan tshigs zhes brjod pa de lta na yang sbyor ba'i dus su /
translated: Even though it is said that the trimodal condition is the logical reason, at the time of the syllogism,

original: phyogs chos su ni legs gnas pa //
analyzed: phyogs chos su ni legs gnas pa //
translated: the property of the subject is stated

original: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung pa la'o //
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung pa la'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is for the sake of emphasis.

original: phyogs chos tsam rang gi ngo bos gnas par gtan tshigs kyi tshig gis ston te /
analyzed: phyogs chos tsam rang gi ngo bos gnas par gtan tshigs kyi tshig gis ston te /
translated: The word ‚Äúreason‚Äù indicates that the property of the subject is stated by the words of the reason, and that the mere property of the subject is stated by the words of the reason.

original: phyogs chos tsam brjod ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: phyogs chos tsam brjod ces pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the mere property of the subject is stated.

original: ci las she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci las she na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that?

original: grags phyir zhes so //
analyzed: grags phyir zhes so //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúbecause of common usage.‚Äù

original: yang grags pa des ci byas she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang grags pa des ci byas she na gsungs pa /
translated: What is the use of that common usage?

original: rtog ge'i bstan bcos rnams su ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rtog ge'i bstan bcos rnams su ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúin the treatises of logic, etc.‚Äù

original: rgyu mtshan gyi don la bdun pa'o ;
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gyi don la bdun pa'o ;
translated: The seventh case is used for the reason.

original: / rigs pa phra mo la sogs pa rnams su phyogs chos tsam gtan tshigs su bshad de de'i phyir de'i sogs 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba la yang phyogs chos tsam gtan tshigs nyid du rab tu grags so //
analyzed: / rigs pa phra mo la sogs pa rnams su phyogs chos tsam gtan tshigs su bshad de de'i phyir de'i sogs 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba la yang phyogs chos tsam gtan tshigs nyid du rab tu grags so //
translated: In the treatises of logic, etc., the mere property of the subject is explained to be the logical reason. Therefore, in the syllogisms of the world, the mere property of the subject is well known to be the logical reason.

original: de skad du der gtan tshigs brjod pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: de skad du der gtan tshigs brjod pa bshad zin to //
translated: Thus, the statement of the reason has been explained there.

original: dpe brjod par bya'o zhes smra ba @213a * //
analyzed: dpe brjod par bya'o zhes smra ba @213a * //
translated: An example is to be stated.

original: po rnams dmigs so //
analyzed: po rnams dmigs so //
translated: The one who speaks is observed.

original: grags pa de nyid ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: grags pa de nyid ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: The one who teaches that very fame says:

original: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, etc.

original: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa na /
translated: When it is said, Sound is impermanent because it is produced,

original: byas pa nyid tsam gyi gtan tshigs phyogs su byas pa sgra'i chos so zhes pa 'di tsam rtogs so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: byas pa nyid tsam gyi gtan tshigs phyogs su byas pa sgra'i chos so zhes pa 'di tsam rtogs so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: only this much is understood: The reason itself, just being produced, is taken as the subject, and sound is its property.

original: mtshan nyid lhag ma ni sbyor ba la ma brjod ces pa byas pa'i phyir zhes pa 'di kho nas mthun phyogs dang mi mthun phyogs dag la 'di yod pa dang med ba dag bshad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid lhag ma ni sbyor ba la ma brjod ces pa byas pa'i phyir zhes pa 'di kho nas mthun phyogs dang mi mthun phyogs dag la 'di yod pa dang med ba dag bshad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The remaining characteristics are not stated in the syllogism. By this alone, because it is produced, it is not explained that it exists or does not exist in the similar and dissimilar classes.üîΩTherefore, an example is to be stated for that purpose, and

original: de'i phyir de'i don du dpe brjod par bya ba'o zhes pa dang / dpe yis rab tu gsal bar byed //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i don du dpe brjod par bya ba'o zhes pa dang / dpe yis rab tu gsal bar byed //
translated: the example clarifies it.

original: ces kyang ngo //
analyzed: ces kyang ngo //
translated: This is also said.

original: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba dag tha mi dad par nye bar btags pa la 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba dag tha mi dad par nye bar btags pa la 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: The expression the speaker and the spoken are not different is figuratively applied to this.

original: gzhan du na gang la zhes pa brjod par bya ba la zhes pa'i tshig las don kho na dpe nyid de /
analyzed: gzhan du na gang la zhes pa brjod par bya ba la zhes pa'i tshig las don kho na dpe nyid de /
translated: Otherwise, the word ‚Äúthat‚Äù would refer to the object of expression, and the object alone would be the example.

original: don gyis gsal bar byed pa yang ma yin no zhes pas 'di mi rigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gyis gsal bar byed pa yang ma yin no zhes pas 'di mi rigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: And it would not be made clear by implication, so this would be unreasonable.

original: de'i phyir tha mi dad pa nye bar btags pa las dpe rjod par byed pa'i ngang tshul can gyi tshig ni 'dir dpe'i sgras brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha mi dad pa nye bar btags pa las dpe rjod par byed pa'i ngang tshul can gyi tshig ni 'dir dpe'i sgras brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the word that has the character of expressing an example by means of a non-distinct designation is expressed by the word ‚Äúexample‚Äù here.

original: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro ba //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro ba //
translated: The reason is the pervasion of the probandum.

original: zhes pa bsgrub bya'i sgra ni 'dir shes par 'dod pa'i chos tsam la 'jug go //
analyzed: zhes pa bsgrub bya'i sgra ni 'dir shes par 'dod pa'i chos tsam la 'jug go //
translated: The word ‚Äúprobandum‚Äù here refers to the mere property to be known.

original: rjes 'gro ba ni gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba pa ste gang na gtan tshigs yod pa de na bsgrub bya'i yod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: rjes 'gro ba ni gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba pa ste gang na gtan tshigs yod pa de na bsgrub bya'i yod pa kho na ste /
translated: Pervasion is the pervasion of the reason. Where the reason exists, there the probandum exists alone,

original: lhan cig yod pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig yod pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: not merely existing together.

original: bsgrub bya kho nas gtan tshigs kyi ste /
analyzed: bsgrub bya kho nas gtan tshigs kyi ste /
translated: The reason is of the probandum alone,

original: gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub bya'i ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub bya'i ni ma yin no //
translated: not of the reason by the probandum.

original: bsgrub bya med la med pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba med pa kho na la gtan tshigs med pa nyid de /
analyzed: bsgrub bya med la med pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba med pa kho na la gtan tshigs med pa nyid de /
translated: The nonexistence of the probandum is the nonexistence of the reason alone.

original: gtan tshigs med pa la bsgrub bya ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs med pa la bsgrub bya ni ma yin no //
translated: The reason is not the probandum.

original: de'i mi mthun phyogs dag la lhan cig yod pa nyid tsam yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i mi mthun phyogs dag la lhan cig yod pa nyid tsam yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it the mere co-existence of the two in the discordant side.

original: med pa nyid ces pa'i med pa'i sgra ni 'di ngag gi ngo bo'i sgra gzhan pa med pa brjod pa rtogs par byed par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: med pa nyid ces pa'i med pa'i sgra ni 'di ngag gi ngo bo'i sgra gzhan pa med pa brjod pa rtogs par byed par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúnonexistence‚Äù in ‚Äúnonexistence‚Äù should be understood as a word that expresses another nonexistence, which is the nature of speech.

original: de chos mthun dang cig shos zhes pa /
analyzed: de chos mthun dang cig shos zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúThe similar and dissimilar‚Äù

original: chos mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'o zhes zhar ba'am 'phye bo la sogs pa bzhin du khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe dang chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'o zhes zhar ba'am 'phye bo la sogs pa bzhin du khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
translated: are the example of similarity and the example of dissimilarity. This is an inclusion of the dissimilar, like the lame and the blind.

original: yang na chos mthun pa nyid dang cig shos dang bcas pa ni chos mthun bcas /
analyzed: yang na chos mthun pa nyid dang cig shos dang bcas pa ni chos mthun bcas /
translated: Or, ‚Äúalong with the similar and dissimilar‚Äù is ‚Äúalong with the similar.‚Äù

original: cig shos zhes pa 'bru mang po'o //
analyzed: cig shos zhes pa 'bru mang po'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlong with the dissimilar‚Äù is a compound of many words.

original: bshad pa ni 'di la ni de zhes pa ming thams cad pa'i tshig 'di ma brjod @213b kyang ;
analyzed: bshad pa ni 'di la ni de zhes pa ming thams cad pa'i tshig 'di ma brjod @213b kyang ;
translated: The explanation is this: In this [verse], although the word that which is the name of everything is not expressed,

original: gang dang de dag ni rtag tu 'brel pa'i phyir 'thob po //
analyzed: gang dang de dag ni rtag tu 'brel pa'i phyir 'thob po //
translated: it is obtained because it is always connected with that.

original: thams cad la 'gro ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'o zhes pa 'dis rjes su'i sgra ni 'dir khyab pa gsal bar byed do zhes bstan to //
analyzed: thams cad la 'gro ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'o zhes pa 'dis rjes su'i sgra ni 'dir khyab pa gsal bar byed do zhes bstan to //
translated: Going everywhere is following. By this, it is shown that the word following here clarifies pervasion.

original: gang la zhes pa brjod par bya ba la zhes pa 'dis don dpe nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: gang la zhes pa brjod par bya ba la zhes pa 'dis don dpe nyid gsungs so //
translated: In regard to what is the object. By this, he states the example itself.

original: tshig ni de'i rjod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir nye bar btags pa'i dpe'o //üîΩ'di yang / dpe yis rab tu bstan par bya //
analyzed: tshig ni de'i rjod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir nye bar btags pa'i dpe'o // 'di yang / dpe yis rab tu bstan par bya //
translated: The word is a metaphorical example because it is the very expression of that.üîΩThis is also understood from the previous [verse]:

original: zhes pa 'dis sngar nyid rig par byas zin to //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis sngar nyid rig par byas zin to //
translated: It is taught by means of an example.

original: gang rtsol ba las byung ba de ni zhes pa'i ni'i sgra ni thob par 'dod pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang rtsol ba las byung ba de ni zhes pa'i ni'i sgra ni thob par 'dod pa'i don to //
translated: The word that in that which arises from effort has the meaning of what is to be obtained.

original: de lta na ni gtan tshigs mthun phyogs kho na la yod pa nyid du bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni gtan tshigs mthun phyogs kho na la yod pa nyid du bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the reason would be explained as existing only in the similar class.

original: gal te gang dang gang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba de dang de mi rtag go zhes ston par byed na ste /
analyzed: gal te gang dang gang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba de dang de mi rtag go zhes ston par byed na ste /
translated: If you are demonstrating that whatever is produced immediately after effort is impermanent,

original: gzhan du nam yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du nam yin no //
translated: then it is not so in any other case.

original: de ltar thams cad bsdus pas khyab pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar thams cad bsdus pas khyab pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus demonstrated the pervasion by including everything,

original: gsal bar byed pa'i don du phyogs gcig dper rjod par byed de /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa'i don du phyogs gcig dper rjod par byed de /
translated: he gives an example of one part in order to clarify the meaning.

original: dper na bum pa bzhin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dper na bum pa bzhin zhes pa'o //
translated: For example, like a pot.

original: rtag pa ni rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ma yin zhes pa /
analyzed: rtag pa ni rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ma yin zhes pa /
translated: That which is produced immediately after effort is not permanent.

original: rtag pa'i sgras mi rtag pa nyid med pa mtshon par byed do //
analyzed: rtag pa'i sgras mi rtag pa nyid med pa mtshon par byed do //
translated: The word ‚Äúpermanent‚Äù indicates the absence of impermanence.

original: de ltar na ni gtan tshigs sgrub byed med pa la med pa nyid brjod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ltar na ni gtan tshigs sgrub byed med pa la med pa nyid brjod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: In that case, the absence of the proof of the reason would be stated as the absence of the probandum.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na ma yin no //
translated: But not in any other way.

original: de 'dis 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs gnyis po de dag gi yang mtshan nyid lhag ma bstan to //
analyzed: de 'dis 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs gnyis po de dag gi yang mtshan nyid lhag ma bstan to //
translated: Thus he teaches the remaining characteristics of those two, the reason based on effect and the reason based on nature.

original: de ltar ni rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid gnyis ka'i nang du 'dus te /
analyzed: de ltar ni rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid gnyis ka'i nang du 'dus te /
translated: In this way, being produced immediately after effort is included in both.

original: brtsal ma thag tu gsal ba dang skye ba dag rtsol ma thag tu byung ba'i sgras brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu gsal ba dang skye ba dag rtsol ma thag tu byung ba'i sgras brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because clarity and arising are expressed by the term ‚Äúarising immediately upon exertion.‚Äù

original: dngos po sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs la yang bsgrub bya'i khyad par mi rtag pa la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la dgag sgra'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: dngos po sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs la yang bsgrub bya'i khyad par mi rtag pa la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la dgag sgra'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir na /
translated: With regard to a reason that establishes an existent, in order to demonstrate the application of a negative term to some specific predicate, such as impermanence,

original: 'ga' zhig gi dgag pa'i ngo bor bsgrub bya ston par byed do zhes dogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gi dgag pa'i ngo bor bsgrub bya ston par byed do zhes dogs par 'gyur te /
translated: one might suspect that the predicate is being taught to have the nature of a negation of something.

original: de'i phyir de gsal ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir de gsal ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, in order to clarify that, he says,

original: sgrub pas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the proof . . .‚Äù and so on.

original: chos mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe la dngos por gyur pa'i bsgrub bya rang gi ngo bo kho nas sgrub byed la bstan par bya'i rang gi ngo bo dgag pa'i ngo bos ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe la dngos por gyur pa'i bsgrub bya rang gi ngo bo kho nas sgrub byed la bstan par bya'i rang gi ngo bo dgag pa'i ngo bos ni ma yin no //
translated: In the case of an example that has a similar property, the existent predicate is to be taught to the proof by means of its own nature alone, but not by means of the nature of the negation of itself.

original: gdon mi za bar zhes pa gzhan du na don gang chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe la brjod par bya ba kho na gtan tshigs mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid du @214a * //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar zhes pa gzhan du na don gang chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe la brjod par bya ba kho na gtan tshigs mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid du @214a * //
translated: The phrase without a doubt means that if it were otherwise, then in the case of an example that is similar to the object, the reason would not be understood to exist only in relation to similar instances.

original: rtogs pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intended meaning.

original: bsgrub bya med la ni med /üîΩces pa chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis ni rtag pa ni rtsol ba las ma byung ba'o zhes pa 'dis mi rtag pa med na /
analyzed: bsgrub bya med la ni med / ces pa chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis ni rtag pa ni rtsol ba las ma byung ba'o zhes pa 'dis mi rtag pa med na /
translated: In the case of the absence of the probandum, there is the absence of the probans.üîΩThe phrase in the case of the absence of the probandum, there is the absence of the probans is a dissimilar instance.

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba med pa bstan par bya'i /
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba med pa bstan par bya'i /
translated: By this, it is shown that if there is no impermanence, then there is no arising from exertion.

original: rtag pa'i dngos po la brtsal ma thag tu ma byung ba khyab pa bshad par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa'i dngos po la brtsal ma thag tu ma byung ba khyab pa bshad par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not being said that the pervasion is in the case of a permanent thing, there is no arising from exertion.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i dogs pa med par ma gyur cig ces pas gsungs pa /üîΩgdon mi za bar zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i dogs pa med par ma gyur cig ces pas gsungs pa / gdon mi za bar zhes pa'o //
translated: In order to prevent the doubt that has been explained from occurring, he says, without a doubt.

original: yang ci ltar na bsgrub bya med pa la yang med pa nyid ces brjod pa na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na bsgrub bya med pa la yang med pa nyid ces brjod pa na /
translated: Now, how is it that it is said, In the case of the absence of the probandum, there is the absence of the probans?

original: gang gis de bzlog pa'i ched du 'bad pa bya ba rnam pa gzhan du bshad par dogs she na //
analyzed: gang gis de bzlog pa'i ched du 'bad pa bya ba rnam pa gzhan du bshad par dogs she na //
translated: If one were to wonder, ‚ÄúIn what way is it explained differently for the sake of refuting that?‚Äù

original: gang rnams kyi rtag pa'i sgra ni dngos po brjod pa yin par rab tu grags pa de rnams rtag pa rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba'o zhes brjod pa na dngos po kho na rtag pa'i sgras brjod do snyam du 'khrul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang rnams kyi rtag pa'i sgra ni dngos po brjod pa yin par rab tu grags pa de rnams rtag pa rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba'o zhes brjod pa na dngos po kho na rtag pa'i sgras brjod do snyam du 'khrul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When it is said that ‚Äúthat which is permanent is not produced by effort,‚Äù those who are well known to express an entity with the word ‚Äúpermanent‚Äù will be confused, thinking that only an entity is expressed by the word ‚Äúpermanent.‚Äù

original: des na de rnams bsal bar bya ste /
analyzed: des na de rnams bsal bar bya ste /
translated: Therefore, they should be refuted.

original: rtag pa'i sgras 'dir mi rtag pa med pa brjod kyi /
analyzed: rtag pa'i sgras 'dir mi rtag pa med pa brjod kyi /
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúpermanent‚Äù expresses the absence of impermanence,

original: dngos po ni ma yin no zhes so //
analyzed: dngos po ni ma yin no zhes so //
translated: but not an entity.

original: de ltar na gang du dgag pa kho na dngos su bsgrub par bya ba der ci ltar bsgrub pas sgrub byed la bsgrub bya bstan par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na gang du dgag pa kho na dngos su bsgrub par bya ba der ci ltar bsgrub pas sgrub byed la bsgrub bya bstan par bya zhe na /
translated: In that case, one might wonder, ‚ÄúWhere negation is the explicit probandum, how can the probandum be stated in the proof by the proof?‚Äù

original: 'di skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di skyon ma yin te /
translated: This is not a fault.

original: gang du rnam pa gzhan gyis bstan par dogs pa de kho na la 'di nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gang du rnam pa gzhan gyis bstan par dogs pa de kho na la 'di nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: This is taught only where there is a concern that it might be taught in another way.

original: 'dir ni gtso bo med do zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dir ni gtso bo med do zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: Here, in ‚Äúthere is no principal,‚Äù and so on,

original: gtan tshigs bsgrub byas rjes 'gro ba //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bsgrub byas rjes 'gro ba //
translated: The reason is subsequent to the probandum.

original: zhes pa'i tshig las rnam pa gzhan du ston pa'i dogs pa nyid med do //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshig las rnam pa gzhan du ston pa'i dogs pa nyid med do //
translated: There is no doubt that the words are taught in another way.

original: snga ma la ni dogs pa srid par bstan to //
analyzed: snga ma la ni dogs pa srid par bstan to //
translated: In the former, the possibility of doubt is taught.

original: de ltar byas na cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar byas na cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What if it is done in this way? It is said:

original: ma yin dgag gi dgag pa yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin dgag gi dgag pa yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The negation of negation is also.

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni mi 'dra ba ste dgag sgra'i don du gyur pa la'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni mi 'dra ba ste dgag sgra'i don du gyur pa la'o //
translated: The dissimilar characteristic is the dissimilar, which becomes the meaning of the negative particle.

original: nges par yang ma yin dgag pa dang dgag pa dag gi rnam pa gnyi ga ltar na don rjes su rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: nges par yang ma yin dgag pa dang dgag pa dag gi rnam pa gnyi ga ltar na don rjes su rtogs par bya ste /
translated: It is also ascertained that the meaning is to be understood in both ways, as an affirming negation and a negation.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis don rjes su dpog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis don rjes su dpog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning is inferred by concomitance and non-concomitance.

original: 'di dag med pa yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di dag med pa yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because these two are not possible without concomitance and non-concomitance.

original: de ltar na zhes pa la sogs pas chos mi mthun pa'i dpe la med par dgag pa brjod pa'i yon tan ston par byed de /
analyzed: de ltar na zhes pa la sogs pas chos mi mthun pa'i dpe la med par dgag pa brjod pa'i yon tan ston par byed de /
translated: Thus, he shows the quality of expressing the absence in the dissimilar example with Thus, etc.

original: gal te bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi mi mthun phyogs bzhin /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi mi mthun phyogs bzhin /
translated: If it is the case that the two are not different,üîΩ

original: @214b dngos po kho na chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dper 'gyur na /
analyzed: @214b dngos po kho na chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dper 'gyur na /
translated: If only an entity could be an example of a dissimilar instance,

original: mi rtag bsgrub bar byed pa na mdo sde pa'i chos mi mthun pa'i dper 'gyur ba min te rtag pa'i dngos po khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag bsgrub bar byed pa na mdo sde pa'i chos mi mthun pa'i dper 'gyur ba min te rtag pa'i dngos po khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then the SautrƒÅntika‚Äôs dissimilar instance would not be an example of a dissimilar instance when proving that sound is impermanent, because they do not assert that permanent entities exist.

original: med dgag gi dag pa la brten pa la ni skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: med dgag gi dag pa la brten pa la ni skyon 'di med de /
translated: This fault does not occur for those who rely on a negation that is an external negation,

original: rtag pa'i sgras bsgrub par bya ba med pa tsam rjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa'i sgras bsgrub par bya ba med pa tsam rjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the word permanent expresses mere nonexistence, the object of affirmation.

original: dngos po'i chos sgrub pa la ni bzhi la ltos te /
analyzed: dngos po'i chos sgrub pa la ni bzhi la ltos te /
translated: When proving a property of an entity, there are four possibilities.

original: sgrub pa ni dngos po la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa ni dngos po la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The proof is based on an entity because the negation is not.

original: dgag pa ni ma yin no zhes pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo yang dpe ru 'thad do //üîΩyang rgyu cis gcig la ni zhes pa /
analyzed: dgag pa ni ma yin no zhes pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo yang dpe ru 'thad do // yang rgyu cis gcig la ni zhes pa /
translated: Therefore it is also tenable that a nonexistent entity is an example.üîΩWhat is the reason that one is not like the other?

original: ci rnam pa gzhan du sbyor ba la mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub pa min pa'am /
analyzed: ci rnam pa gzhan du sbyor ba la mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub pa min pa'am /
translated: What is the point of applying it in another way?

original: skyon ci zhig 'byung /
analyzed: skyon ci zhig 'byung /
translated: What fault occurs?

original: gang gis 'di lta kho nar sbyor bar bya //üîΩzhes mi shes par sems pas /
analyzed: gang gis 'di lta kho nar sbyor bar bya // zhes mi shes par sems pas /
translated: One should apply oneself to this alone.

original: sbyor ba nges pa'i rgyu 'dri bar byed do //üîΩ'di ltar na ni zhes pa la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa kho na'i sbyor bas gtan tshigs kyi khyad par bstan bar nus te /
analyzed: sbyor ba nges pa'i rgyu 'dri bar byed do // 'di ltar na ni zhes pa la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa kho na'i sbyor bas gtan tshigs kyi khyad par bstan bar nus te /
translated: Thus, he asks the reason for the certainty of application, thinking that it is not known.

original: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin zhes pa bsdus pa'i don to //üîΩde ltar ni byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin zhes pa bsdus pa'i don to // de ltar ni byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: In this way, the meaning of the summary is that the particular reason can be shown by application in this way alone, beginning with ‚Äúin this way,‚Äù but not in another way.

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid du dam bcas pa la /
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid du dam bcas pa la /
translated: In this way, because of being produced, with regard to the thesis that it arises immediately after effort,

original: gang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba de byas pa'o zhes bsgrub bya la gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro bar byas pa brjod kyi /
analyzed: gang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba de byas pa'o zhes bsgrub bya la gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro bar byas pa brjod kyi /
translated: it is said that the reason is pervaded by the probandum, that whatever arises immediately after effort is produced.

original: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya kho na la yod pa nyid rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya kho na la yod pa nyid rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But the existence of the reason in the probandum alone is not understood.

original: de bzhin du gang byas pa min pa de rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba'o zhes gtan tshigs med na bsgrub bya med pa ston gyi /
analyzed: de bzhin du gang byas pa min pa de rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba'o zhes gtan tshigs med na bsgrub bya med pa ston gyi /
translated: Similarly, it shows that in the absence of the reason, the probandum does not exist, that whatever is not produced does not arise immediately after effort.

original: bsgrub bya med na gtan tshigs med pa kho na rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya med na gtan tshigs med pa kho na rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: If there is no probandum, there is no reason at all to understand.

original: 'o na de lta na zhes pa /
analyzed: 'o na de lta na zhes pa /
translated: Now, in that case,

original: gal te gang du gtan tshigs bsgrub byas rjes su 'gro ba yin pa de chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'o zhes pa mtshan nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te gang du gtan tshigs bsgrub byas rjes su 'gro ba yin pa de chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'o zhes pa mtshan nyid yin na /
translated: if the definition is ‚Äúwherever the reason is pervaded by the probandum, that is the example of similarity,‚Äù

original: bum pa dpe ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa dpe ma yin te /
translated: a pot is not an example.

original: de la bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag phan tshun rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir de dper brjod du bshad par bya na /
analyzed: de la bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag phan tshun rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir de dper brjod du bshad par bya na /
translated: Because there is mutual pervasion between the probandum and the probans, it should be explained as a counterexample.

original: gang la bsgrub bya kho nas gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro'i gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya ma yin no //
analyzed: gang la bsgrub bya kho nas gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro'i gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya ma yin no //
translated: Where the probandum alone follows the reason, but the reason is not the probandum,üîΩit is not so, because it is not intended to be stated.

original: ma yin te brjod par mi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa bsgrub bya'i gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba yod kyang /
analyzed: ma yin te brjod par mi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa bsgrub bya'i gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba yod kyang /
translated: Although there is pervasion of the probandum by the reason,

original: brjod par 'dod pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: it is not intended to be stated,

original: byas pa'i khyad par bzhin du gtso bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa'i khyad par bzhin du gtso bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not primary, like a particular of the produced.

original: gtso bo ma yin pa nyid ni rjes su dpog pa la yan @215a * //
analyzed: gtso bo ma yin pa nyid ni rjes su dpog pa la yan @215a * //
translated: The fact that it is not primary is inferred.

original: lag ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lag ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The non-primary is the non-auxiliary in the inference because of the non-auxiliary nature.

original: de bzhin kho nar phyi rol gyi don bstan pa ni zhes pa /
analyzed: de bzhin kho nar phyi rol gyi don bstan pa ni zhes pa /
translated: The external object is taught in the same way.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par las /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par las /
translated: From the particular of a pot, etc.,

original: bsgrub bya'i rigs can gyi spyi ni phyi rol gyi don to //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i rigs can gyi spyi ni phyi rol gyi don to //
translated: the universal of the type of the probandum is the external object.

original: de la spyir gang cung zad byas pa zhes bya ba de thams cad mi rtag pa kho na'o zhes bsgrub byas gtan tshigs la khyab ba gsal bar byed pa ni phyi rol gyi don gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la spyir gang cung zad byas pa zhes bya ba de thams cad mi rtag pa kho na'o zhes bsgrub byas gtan tshigs la khyab ba gsal bar byed pa ni phyi rol gyi don gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: There, in general, whatever is produced is impermanent. The universal of the probandum is the external object.

original: de kho na nges par bstan par bya ba la ste dpe la gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: de kho na nges par bstan par bya ba la ste dpe la gtso bo yin te /
translated: That is to be taught in reality, in the example, it is primary,

original: rjes su dpag pa'i yan lag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i yan lag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the auxiliary nature of the inference.

original: bum pa khyad par bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag gi phan tshun rjes su 'gro ba gang yin pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa khyad par bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag gi phan tshun rjes su 'gro ba gang yin pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The particular of a pot is not the probandum and the probans, and the mutual concomitance of the two is not the case,

original: de'i stobs las bsgrub bya 'grub par 'gyur ba ni ma yin pas so //
analyzed: de'i stobs las bsgrub bya 'grub par 'gyur ba ni ma yin pas so //
translated: because the establishment of the probandum does not occur by its power.

original: de'i phyir spyis ji skad bshad pa'i dpe'i mtshan nyid can gyi don gyi phung po thams cad dpe ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir spyis ji skad bshad pa'i dpe'i mtshan nyid can gyi don gyi phung po thams cad dpe ste /
translated: Therefore, all the collections of things that have the characteristic of the example as it has been explained are examples,

original: bum pa kho na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa kho na ni ma yin no //
translated: but not just the pot.

original: bum pa ni de'i nang du 'dus pas te de kho na nye bar mtshon pa'i don du dper rjod pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa ni de'i nang du 'dus pas te de kho na nye bar mtshon pa'i don du dper rjod pa'o //
translated: The pot is included in that, and it is stated as an example for the purpose of illustrating just that.üîΩTherefore, the fact that the reason to be established is not present in that is not the main point, and so it is not stated.

original: de'i phyir de la gang bsgrub bya'i gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba 'di ni gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir brjod par 'dod pa ma yin no zhes pa dang / phyi rol gyi don ston pa ni nges par bstan par bya la gtso bo'o zhes pa'i tshig ni gsal ba'i khyad par gcig kho na la rab tu ston pa gtso bo nyid yin pa sel ba lhur byed par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de la gang bsgrub bya'i gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba 'di ni gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir brjod par 'dod pa ma yin no zhes pa dang / phyi rol gyi don ston pa ni nges par bstan par bya la gtso bo'o zhes pa'i tshig ni gsal ba'i khyad par gcig kho na la rab tu ston pa gtso bo nyid yin pa sel ba lhur byed par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThe teaching of external objects is to be taught as the main point‚Äù should be seen as emphasizing the exclusion of the main point being the teaching of just one specific clear thing.

original: bzlog pa'i sbyor bas gtan tshigs kyi khyad par ston par mi nus pa 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i sbyor bas gtan tshigs kyi khyad par ston par mi nus pa 'ba' zhig go //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThe reversal of the proof does not have the ability to teach the difference of the reason‚Äù is just that.

original: skyon gzhan yang 'bab po zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: skyon gzhan yang 'bab po zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: Another fault will also come, it is stated to teach.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Moreover, etc.

original: ma byas nyid kyis rtag pa nyid //
analyzed: ma byas nyid kyis rtag pa nyid //
translated: Because of not being done, it is permanent.

original: ma brjod par byas par 'gyur zhing //üîΩ'jig nyid phyir yang 'bras bu nyid kyang ma brjod par byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma brjod par byas par 'gyur zhing // 'jig nyid phyir yang 'bras bu nyid kyang ma brjod par byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of not being stated, it is not a reason.üîΩBecause of being destroyed, it is not a result.

original: ma khyab pa dang mi 'dod 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma khyab pa dang mi 'dod 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of not pervading, it is not a property of the subject.

original: 'dir rjes 'gro mnyam la zhes pa'i tshig rnams 'brel par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir rjes 'gro mnyam la zhes pa'i tshig rnams 'brel par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Here, the words ‚Äúconcomitant with‚Äù should be connected.

original: yang zhes pa sdud pa'i don can no //
analyzed: yang zhes pa sdud pa'i don can no //
translated: Moreover has the sense of collecting.

original: 'bras bu nyid ces pa byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid ces pa byas pa nyid do //
translated: Result means being done.

original: ma brjod ces pa dam ma bcas pa'o //
analyzed: ma brjod ces pa dam ma bcas pa'o //
translated: Not stated means not asserted.

original: byas pa zhes pa ni bsgrub pa'o //üîΩdang yig ni de ma thag tu brjod pa'i skabs su ma bab pa'i don sgrub par byed pa sdud pa'o //
analyzed: byas pa zhes pa ni bsgrub pa'o // dang yig ni de ma thag tu brjod pa'i skabs su ma bab pa'i don sgrub par byed pa sdud pa'o //
translated: Done means established.üîΩThe word and is a collective particle that includes what was just mentioned but is not appropriate in the context.

original: rjes 'gro mnyam la zhes pa chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun @215b pa nyid dag gi rjes su 'gro bar mtshungs par gyur pa la zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rjes 'gro mnyam la zhes pa chos mthun pa nyid dang chos mi mthun @215b pa nyid dag gi rjes su 'gro bar mtshungs par gyur pa la zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Concomitant with means similar with respect to the concomitance of similar and dissimilar instances.

original: chos mthun pa nyid kyi dbang gis zhes pa chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i rjes su 'jug pas te /
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid kyi dbang gis zhes pa chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe'i rjes su 'jug pas te /
translated: ‚ÄúBy the power of similarity‚Äù means by the power of similarity to the example.

original: chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe la bsgrub byas gtan tshigs kyi rjes su song ba bstan par bya'o zhes byas nas gal te chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe la gtan tshigs med pa bsgrub bya med pas rjes su song bar brjod na'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe la bsgrub byas gtan tshigs kyi rjes su song ba bstan par bya'o zhes byas nas gal te chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe la gtan tshigs med pa bsgrub bya med pas rjes su song bar brjod na'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Having said, ‚ÄúThe probandum should be shown to follow from the reason in the example of similarity,‚Äù the meaning is that if the probandum is said to follow from the reason in the example of dissimilarity, then the reason would not exist in the example of dissimilarity.

original: dam ma bcas pa kho na'i rtag pa nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ro zhes pa /
analyzed: dam ma bcas pa kho na'i rtag pa nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ro zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúThe permanence of the thesis alone would be established‚Äù means

original: rtag pa nyid kyis de la khyab pa nye bar ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyis de la khyab pa nye bar ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that the thesis would be pervaded by permanence.

original: gang la gang gis khyab par brjod pa de ni des bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gang la gang gis khyab par brjod pa de ni des bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
translated: That which is said to be pervaded by something is established by that.

original: dper na gang byas pa de mi rtag go zhes pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyis byas pa nyid la khyab par nye bar ston pa'i phyir byas pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa nyid yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gang byas pa de mi rtag go zhes pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyis byas pa nyid la khyab par nye bar ston pa'i phyir byas pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa nyid yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, because impermanence is said to pervade what is produced, what is produced is established by impermanence.

original: 'di lta na yang mi rtag pa nyid kyis byas pa nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'dir yang de lta kho na'i rigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta na yang mi rtag pa nyid kyis byas pa nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'dir yang de lta kho na'i rigs pa'o //
translated: In this way, too, it is the same reasoning that is used to prove that what is produced is impermanent.

original: ma khyab pa la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma khyab pa la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The opponent:] ‚ÄúThe reason is not included in the similar instances.‚Äù

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni rang gi bsgrub par bya bas ma khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ma khyab pa'o //
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni rang gi bsgrub par bya bas ma khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ma khyab pa'o //
translated: [The reason] ‚Äúarising immediately after effort‚Äù is not included in the similar instances, because it does not pervade what is to be proven.

original: de la gang rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid kyi phyir glog la sogs pa rnams rtag pa'o //
analyzed: de la gang rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid kyi phyir glog la sogs pa rnams rtag pa'o //
translated: [The opponent:] ‚ÄúThings that do not arise immediately after effort, such as lightning, are permanent.üîΩThings that are impermanent, such as what arises immediately after effort, are impermanent.‚Äù

original: gang mi rtag pa ste rtsol ma thag tu byung ba'o zhes mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir na rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid du mi 'dod par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang mi rtag pa ste rtsol ma thag tu byung ba'o zhes mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir na rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid du mi 'dod par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: [The opponent:] ‚ÄúIt follows that what arises immediately after effort is not impermanent, because it is permanent.‚Äù

original: gal te 'di ltar nges par 'dzin na skyon 'di yod do //
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar nges par 'dzin na skyon 'di yod do //
translated: [The Buddhist:] ‚ÄúIf you accept this, then there is this fault.‚Äù

original: rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid ni rtag pa kho na ste /
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid ni rtag pa kho na ste /
translated: [The opponent:] ‚ÄúOnly what does not arise immediately after effort is permanent.

original: mi rtag par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa dang / mi rtag pa yang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba kho na ste /
analyzed: mi rtag par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa dang / mi rtag pa yang rtsol ma thag tu byung ba kho na ste /
translated: And it would be impermanent only if it arose immediately after effort.

original: rtsol ba las ma byung bar ni mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rtsol ba las ma byung bar ni mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: It would not arise without effort.

original: de'i tshe rtsol ba las ma byung ba nyid kyi phyir rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe rtsol ba las ma byung ba nyid kyi phyir rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, because it would not arise from effort, it would follow that it is permanent.

original: skabs su ma bab pa'i don sgrub par byed par yang ste /
analyzed: skabs su ma bab pa'i don sgrub par byed par yang ste /
translated: It also proves a meaning that is not at issue.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid la mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyab par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid la mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyab par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it teaches that what arises from effort is necessarily impermanent.

original: gang gi tshe 'di ltar nges par gzung bar byed de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di ltar nges par gzung bar byed de /
translated: When one ascertains it in this way,

original: rtag pa ni rtsol ba las ma byung ba kho na ste /
analyzed: rtag pa ni rtsol ba las ma byung ba kho na ste /
translated: what is permanent does not arise from effort.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba ni ma yin no zhes pa de'i tshe skyon 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba ni ma yin no zhes pa de'i tshe skyon 'ga' yang med do //
translated: It is not what arises from effort. At that time, there is no fault at all.

original: de lta na yang gang gi phyir rtag pa nyid ni rtsol ma thag tu byung ba la med par bshad par @216a * //
analyzed: de lta na yang gang gi phyir rtag pa nyid ni rtsol ma thag tu byung ba la med par bshad par @216a * //
translated: Even so, because it is explained that permanence does not exist in what arises immediately after effort,

original: 'gyur gyi / rtsol ba las ma byung ba la rtag pa yod par ni ma yin pa de'i phyir glog la sogs pa rnams rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: 'gyur gyi / rtsol ba las ma byung ba la rtag pa yod par ni ma yin pa de'i phyir glog la sogs pa rnams rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba med do //
translated: But it is not that what is not produced from exertion is permanent. Therefore it is not the case that lightning and so on are permanent.

original: de bzhin du chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe la mi rtag pa kho na rtsol ba las byung ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos mthun pa nyid kyi dpe la mi rtag pa kho na rtsol ba las byung ba ste /
translated: Similarly, in the case of a concordant example, it is definite that only impermanent things are produced from exertion,

original: rtag pa ni ma yin no zhes nges par gzung ba las /üîΩrtsol ba las byung ba nyid rtag pa la med par brjod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: rtag pa ni ma yin no zhes nges par gzung ba las / rtsol ba las byung ba nyid rtag pa la med par brjod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: but permanent things are not.üîΩThus it is said that being produced from exertion does not exist for permanent things,

original: mi rtag pa la rtsol ba las byung ba nyid yod pa ni ma yin no zhes pas /
analyzed: mi rtag pa la rtsol ba las byung ba nyid yod pa ni ma yin no zhes pas /
translated: but it is not said that being produced from exertion does not exist for impermanent things.

original: glog la sogs pa rnams rtsol ba las byung ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba med cing /
analyzed: glog la sogs pa rnams rtsol ba las byung ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba med cing /
translated: Therefore it is not the case that lightning and so on are produced from exertion.

original: skabs su ma bab bsgrub par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: skabs su ma bab bsgrub par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it that a proof is being made that is not relevant.

original: 'dir mi rtag pa nyid la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyis khyab pa brjod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir mi rtag pa nyid la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyis khyab pa brjod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Here it is not being said that impermanence is necessarily produced from exertion.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi rtag pa la med pa ste /
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi rtag pa la med pa ste /
translated: That which is permanent does not exist as that which arises immediately after exertion.

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ni mi rtag pa kho nas te rtag pa ni ma yin no zhes so //
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ni mi rtag pa kho nas te rtag pa ni ma yin no zhes so //
translated: That which arises immediately after exertion is impermanent alone, not permanent.

original: 'o na de ltar gyur na gtan tshigs nges par gzung bar 'gyur la de'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba mi rtag pa kho nas te byas pa la sogs pa ni ma yin zhes pa'i don 'di 'byung zhing /
analyzed: 'o na de ltar gyur na gtan tshigs nges par gzung bar 'gyur la de'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba mi rtag pa kho nas te byas pa la sogs pa ni ma yin zhes pa'i don 'di 'byung zhing /
translated: If that is so, then the reason is ascertained, and therefore the meaning that arises is that that which arises immediately after exertion is impermanent alone, not that it is produced and so on.

original: de las kyang gtan tshigs gzhan med par 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩ'di yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de las kyang gtan tshigs gzhan med par 'gyur ro zhe na / 'di yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And if that is so, then the reason would not be different from the predicate.üîΩThis is not so, because if this ascertainment is the ascertainment of the reason, then it is obtained that the reason is not different from the predicate.

original: nges par gzung ba 'di gal te yang gtan tshigs nges par gzung ba las gtan tshigs gzhan med pa 'thob mod de lta na yang smra ba po'i bsam pa'i dbang las nges par gzung ba'o zhes pas /
analyzed: nges par gzung ba 'di gal te yang gtan tshigs nges par gzung ba las gtan tshigs gzhan med pa 'thob mod de lta na yang smra ba po'i bsam pa'i dbang las nges par gzung ba'o zhes pas /
translated: But even if that is so, the ascertainment is due to the power of the speaker‚Äôs thought.

original: smra ba po gang dod zlar bsam pa de kho na nges par gzung bas gcod par byed kyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: smra ba po gang dod zlar bsam pa de kho na nges par gzung bas gcod par byed kyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore the speaker‚Äôs thought is ascertained and the reason is eliminated, but not another.

original: de'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba kho na rtag pa la med par brjod kyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba kho na rtag pa la med par brjod kyi /
translated: Therefore, we say that only what arises from effort is not permanent.

original: chos gzhan rnams rtsol ma thag tu byung ba la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos gzhan rnams rtsol ma thag tu byung ba la ni ma yin no //
translated: But other things do not arise immediately after effort.

original: mi mthun pa nye bar dgod pa ste /
analyzed: mi mthun pa nye bar dgod pa ste /
translated: The application of the counter pervasion is

original: gang gi phyir bzlog pa'i sbyor ba la yang nges par gzung ba tha dad kyi rten las mi 'dod pa 'bab pa yongs su spong bar 'dod pas te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bzlog pa'i sbyor ba la yang nges par gzung ba tha dad kyi rten las mi 'dod pa 'bab pa yongs su spong bar 'dod pas te /
translated: because the proponent of the thesis wishes to avoid the unwanted consequence that the basis of the thesis is different from the example.

original: de yang byed pa na yang de ltar nges par gzung ba na 'thob pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de yang byed pa na yang de ltar nges par gzung ba na 'thob pa kho na'o //
translated: And when that is done, it is obtained just by stating the thesis in that way.

original: de ltar ni ji ltar rtag pa la rtsol ba las byung ba nyid med pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid du rjes su dpog pa de bzhin du rtsol ma thag tu byung ba la rtag pa nyid med pa'i phyir rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid du
analyzed: de ltar ni ji ltar rtag pa la rtsol ba las byung ba nyid med pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid du rjes su dpog pa de bzhin du rtsol ma thag tu byung ba la rtag pa nyid med pa'i phyir rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid du
translated: Just as impermanence is inferred from the fact that what arises from effort is not permanent, so non-arising immediately after effort is inferred from the fact that what is permanent does not arise immediately after effort.

original: rjes su dpog pa dang / @216b ji ltar na chos mthun pa nyid kyis rtsol ma thag tu byung ba mi rtag pa kho nas te rtag pa ni ma yin zhes rtag pa la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid med pa las rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir mi rtag
analyzed: rjes su dpog pa dang / @216b ji ltar na chos mthun pa nyid kyis rtsol ma thag tu byung ba mi rtag pa kho nas te rtag pa ni ma yin zhes rtag pa la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid med pa las rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir mi rtag
translated: Just as impermanence is inferred from arising,üîΩso permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.

original: pa nyid rjes su dpog pa de bzhin du chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis rtag pa ni rtsol ma thag tu ma byung pa kho na ste /
analyzed: pa nyid rjes su dpog pa de bzhin du chos mi mthun pa nyid kyis rtag pa ni rtsol ma thag tu ma byung pa kho na ste /
translated: Just as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.

original: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ni ma yin no zhes rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid la rtag pa nyid med pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ni ma yin no zhes rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid la rtag pa nyid med pa'i phyir na /
translated: Just as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.

original: rtag pa nyid las rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid rjes su dpog go zhes pa'o //üîΩde kho na dam bcas pa'i don nyid sgrub pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid las rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid rjes su dpog go zhes pa'o // de kho na dam bcas pa'i don nyid sgrub pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Just as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs kho na bsgrub bya med pa la med par bstan par bya'i /
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs kho na bsgrub bya med pa la med par bstan par bya'i /
translated: Just as impermanence is inferred from arising, so permanence is inferred from non-arising.üîΩJust as impermanence is inferred

original: nges par gzung bas don ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nges par gzung bas don ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the meaning of the statement.

original: 'o na 'dir bsgrub bya med pa la med pa nye bar bstan na /
analyzed: 'o na 'dir bsgrub bya med pa la med pa nye bar bstan na /
translated: If the nonexistence of the probandum is shown in the statement,

original: mi rtag pa kho na rtsol ma thag tu byung ba'o zhes pa'i nges par gzung ba 'di la ni mi rtag pa med na rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa 'di nges par rtogs pas skyon 'ga' yang med de /
analyzed: mi rtag pa kho na rtsol ma thag tu byung ba'o zhes pa'i nges par gzung ba 'di la ni mi rtag pa med na rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa 'di nges par rtogs pas skyon 'ga' yang med de /
translated: then the statement, ‚ÄúOnly the impermanent is produced from effort,‚Äù is understood to mean that if the impermanent does not exist, that which is produced from effort does not exist. Therefore there is no fault.

original: ci ste yod na de lta na smra bar bya ste /
analyzed: ci ste yod na de lta na smra bar bya ste /
translated: But if it does exist, then it should be stated.

original: de la skyon ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la skyon ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the fault of that?

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: It should be stated.

original: thun mong ma yin pa yang rtag pa la gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa skyon 'di yin no //üîΩdper na rtag pa nyid ni mnyan par bya ba ste /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa yang rtag pa la gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa skyon 'di yin no // dper na rtag pa nyid ni mnyan par bya ba ste /
translated: The fault is that the uncommon reason would be permanent.

original: mi rtag pa med do zhes pa 'di la yang bsgrub par bya ba rtag pa nyid med na mnyan par bya ba med pa nyid bstan te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa med do zhes pa 'di la yang bsgrub par bya ba rtag pa nyid med na mnyan par bya ba med pa nyid bstan te /
translated: For example, in the statement, ‚ÄúPermanence is audible, impermanence does not exist,‚Äù if the probandum, permanence, does not exist, then audibility does not exist.

original: 'jig pa'i ngang can la mnyan par bya ba nyid med pa'i phyir zhes pas gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i ngang can la mnyan par bya ba nyid med pa'i phyir zhes pas gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Because that which is perishable is not fit to be listened to.

original: nyes pa 'di ni med de /
analyzed: nyes pa 'di ni med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: dper na mi rtag pa kho na ni rtsol ma thag tu byung ba'o zhes pa 'dir rtag pa las rnam par bcad de /
analyzed: dper na mi rtag pa kho na ni rtsol ma thag tu byung ba'o zhes pa 'dir rtag pa las rnam par bcad de /
translated: For example, in the statement ‚ÄúOnly the impermanent arises immediately after exertion,‚Äù permanence is excluded.

original: mi rtag pa la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid don gyis brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid don gyis brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: By implication, the impermanent is expressed as arising immediately after exertion.

original: de yang de la rab tu grub ba'o //
analyzed: de yang de la rab tu grub ba'o //
translated: And that is well established.

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni 'di ltar mi rtag pa las rnam par bcad pa /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni 'di ltar mi rtag pa las rnam par bcad pa /
translated: In the same way, that which is fit to be listened to is excluded from the impermanent.

original: rtag pa 'ga' zhig la bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa 'ga' zhig la bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: It cannot be demonstrated that anything permanent is fit to be listened to.

original: de yod pa dang med pa dag thams cad la the tshom nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod pa dang med pa dag thams cad la the tshom nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of doubt about the existence and nonexistence of that.

original: gal te de ltar na don gyi go bas gnyis ka rnyed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na don gyi go bas gnyis ka rnyed pa yin na /
translated: If it is like that, both are understood by implication.

original: de kho bo cag gi rjes su snang ba kho na ste /
analyzed: de kho bo cag gi rjes su snang ba kho na ste /
translated: That is just as we see it.

original: gang yang rung bas gnyis ka rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang rung bas gnyis ka rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Because both are well demonstrated by either one.
